326b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ grong khyer gyi shar ram/ byang phyogs kyi cha 'am/ gang yid dga' bar dkyil 'khor bya'o// lha khang grong khyer skyed tshal gyi// byang
326b5(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs nai ji lta ba'o// sa yi cha ni yongs bzung la// cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// yang na sngar ni brtags zin pa'i// gnas der sbyang ba bya mi dgos// pus mo rked pa lte ba 'am// lkog ma nu bo tsam sa brkos la//
326b6(rgyud 'grel): legs par yongasu brtags nas ni// thal ba sol ba gyo mo dang // gseg moM phub mau rus pa gsal// yum mchog nyid kyis sngags bzlos shing // de bzhin bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi// sngags bzlas pa yi chu nyid kyis// sa ni
327a1(rgyud 'grel): kun la bsang gtor bya// dri zhim pa yi sa yi sa ni// dkyil 'khor sa ni kun tu dgang // de lta bu yi dbus dag tu// zhi ba la sogs sbyin sreg bya// sa yi lha la gsol ba gdab// de nas tshang
327a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa ru// rgyal po'i khru ni brgyad nyid dam// de bzhin khru ni lnga bcu nyid// blon po tshong dpon sde dpon gyis// nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am de yi phyed// khru de dag ni ma nus ni// ci nus par ni bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor de
327a3(rgyud 'grel): yi sa gzhi ni// spos chus gsang gtor bya ba dang // ba yi rnam lngas skyang nul bya// sa gzhi yongasu rdzogs pa ru// thig gdab cho ga rdzogs par bya// sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// // logs par khrus byas lus dris
327a4(rgyud 'grel): byug/ ji snyed gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon nas// yar gyi ngo nas brtsams par bya// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi'i dbus song ste// bdag srung bgegs gzhom la sogs bya// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag
327a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya yi// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du sprul// phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs pa// sngon du song bas sdom pa gzung // khang pa gdan la sogs bskyed nas// dbus su skyil krung gis 'dug ste// bdag nyid spro ba bskyed
327a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas// lce dang dam tshig gis mnyam par// gyur pa bdag nyid the tshom med// byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas// mi ldog
327b1(rgyud 'grel): brla ni bdag gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu ni// deng bdag skye bar the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// ding bdag 'dus
327b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog yi no zhes bya'o// phyag byas bdug spos thogs nas su// yum mchog sras dang bcas pa rnams// thams cad ma lus spyan drang ngo // ma lus phyogs na bzhugs po yi// sangs rgyas thams cad
327b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi// rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor 'bri// dang 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// dngos grub mchog ni stsol du gsol zhes brjod do// sbyor ba rnams gsum
327b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas ni// sgo rnams dbye ba byas nas su// byams pa'i sgro na gnas pa yis// yum mchog sngags bzlos brtson pa yi// rnal 'byor nga rgyal cher ldan pas// dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir// bstod de
327b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya// ma zhig na bar gyur pa la// bu rnams rim gro byed pa ltar// yum mchog bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa yis// nu mkha'i khams kun gang gyur te// bdag gis/
327b6(rgyud 'grel): lus de phyag byas nas// bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid// bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// phyag na rdo rje bdag
328a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan nyid// bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag/ byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro// de nas badz+ra tiSh+Tha ma Ta// mig gnyis dag tu bkod nas kyang // rkang mthil gnyis su a las ni// sna tshogs rdo rje bskyod byas/
328a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phyag rgya rab bsrungs nas// badz+ra satwa badz+ra uta tiSh+Tha// de yis dkyil 'khor bdeg par bya'o// sngar bzhin byin gyis rlabs byas nas// phyag rgya chen po de bcings nas// g.yon pa dril bu legs bzung nas// g.yon
328a3(rgyud 'grel): bas rdo rje gsor bar bya// yi ge hUM gi sgra sgrogs pas// cung zad gar byed goms stabs kyis// bskor ba'i tshul gyis song nas ni// dengs shig ces ni brjod par bya// sgyu 'phrul dra bar gsungs pa ltar// g.yas brkyang la
328a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs stang stabs bya// bsgyings po'i tshul gyis song nas ni// gdug pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// de nas phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgugo bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcings nas// mdzub mo
328a5(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong rdo rje byas// dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM badz+ra maN+Da la hUM// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo yi// phyag rgya dang ni sngags 'di yis// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya// mA hA badz+ra tsakra a tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha hUM// rdo rje rgyu yi
328a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyis ni// phyag rgya nyid ni bshad pa yin// de nas phur bu btab nas ni// 'og gi phyogs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya saurba bi g+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM phaT// brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor
328b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus dang grwa bzhi ru// g.yon pas gzung ste g.yas pas brda ba// seng ldeng phur bu lnga bskyed do// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duny+dzan hUM phaT/ kI la ya ki la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ badz+rA kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ri/ A dz+nyA pa
328b2(rgyud 'grel): ya ti swA hA/ bdug pas bdugs te dbang bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag byas nas// cin da ni gur kum la sogs pas// yum chen gyi ni gnas dag tu// rin cheni zur
328b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad thig le bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dag dang // byang chub sems dpa'i gnasu ni// grwa bzhi zlum por bya ba'o// yum mchog gi ni sngags kyis ni// lan gsum dag tu bzlas pa'o// de nas na mkha'i phyogs
328b4(rgyud 'grel): nAnas ni// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni// gzhug dang bcing dang dbang du bya// mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod// de nas dbang bskur bum pa la// 'bru sogs bcas par chu blugs la// yum mchog sngags
328b5(rgyud 'grel): ni brgya bzlas pa// mchod yon legs par dbul bar bya// bdug pas bdugs nas me tog dor// lhag par gnas par bya ba'o// thun gsum dag tu bzlas byas nas// des ni dbang bskur bya ba'o// lhag par
328b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sbyin sreg bya// de nas phyi rol byung nas kyang // dam tshig can la gtor ma sbyin// nyi reg dag kyang byas nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan gcig bar du brjod par bgyi// de nas me tog la sogs
329a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / sgeg mo la sogs brgyad kyis mchod// slob ma lhug par gnas par bya'o// re zhig dang por khrus byas la// shin tu gtsang ba'i gos gyon la// me tog thogs pa'i slob ma yis// slob
329a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon dag la phyag byas te// 'di skad ces ni smra bar bya// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa byas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid
329a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsal du gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug
329a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rtog pa rnams ni shin tu bsdus nas ni// shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon// brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob// dbang med bdag gis mi
329a5(rgyud 'grel): dge bgyis pa dang // rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid rtsal gang // de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu ni// sngar bshad da ltar ma lus so sor bshags// bde bar gshegs pa sras kyi lha rnams dang // rgya chen
329a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don// sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la'ang // rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo // thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing // blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom// ma
329b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang gzhugs pa// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi// smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin// mi skye ma 'gags na mkha'i ngo bo nyid// so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul
329b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la skyabs su mchi// blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba dang // dman pas 'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byeng tshal// srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ gsung
329b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing // blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'o// brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabasu mchi// srid dang bral
329b4(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid// 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa'i// snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cig yang dag rtogs// mnyam med byang chub yang dgra gzung
329b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi// sems can rnam sa ni yongs su smin pa 'am// yang na yongasu bskyab par bya ba 'am// rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir// 'di dag thams cad rtsa sogs bzhin du gtang // de bzhin/
329b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni// bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir// skad cig re re zhing ni bsgom par bgyi// bde bar gshegs pa
330a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags la mkhas pa yis// chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni// 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir// khyad par gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi zhes lan gsum brjod do//
330a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis de skad brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis// bdag gis lus thams cad yongs su btang bar bgyi'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gis
330a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang // thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu bzhag par bgyi'o// ba dag gis sems can thams
330a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mya ngan lngas 'das kyang sems can 'ga' yang mya don las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjesu rtogs par bgyi'o// bdag gis
330a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yongs pa'i sems dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bsgrub phyir bgyi'o// byA dug gis tI 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyu lnga po thob par bgyi ste// sems can thams cad byang
330a6(rgyud 'grel): chub rnam pa gsum la dgod par bgyi'o// bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas pa so sor rtogs
330b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir brlab par bgyi'o// bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang // so so yang dag par rig pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o// de
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta
330b3(rgyud 'grel): bu yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo s+ho/ 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'o// /
330b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rtogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa// mtha' med par 'gyur
330b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs par byas nas// gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la// spyod pa rab tu dbye bo'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu b.raro bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar ba bya dang // yang dag par gzengs bstod pa
330b6(rgyud 'grel): la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o// de nas sa ma ya a zhes bzlas pas// slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du rdo rje de bzhag la/ su ra te sa ma yas+t+waM ho// badz+ra sid+d+h+ya ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying
331a1(rgyud 'grel): gar bzlas la/ spyi bor spos chus brlan pa 'am gsher ba'i lag pa bzhag la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing rdo rjer bsam par bya'o// dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor traM hrI dang kaM las rdo rje dang /
331a2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang pad ma dang sna tshogs rdo rjer bsams la/ badz+ra satwa/ badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma/ zhes zlos shing snying ga la sogs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas a shAt+tha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyi
331a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshad la rtse mor me tog bcings la/ rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin// de nas shar ram byang du bltas te/ rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o// de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po bzlas te byin la/ 'di ni stan du gding zhing sngas
331a4(rgyud 'grel): su gyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o// de nas dpung pa g.yon par no// srung skud 'dud pa gsum ldan pa// bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing // de nas zab mo rgya che ba'i// chos ni ci nus par bstan pas// thams cad la
331a5(rgyud 'grel): gzengs bstod par byas nas bzhin bzang rnams long zhig/ nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur zhes bsgo'o// lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// de nas nyi ma 'char kha ru// dkyil 'khor ra mkhar brdeg par
331a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas thig godab par bya'o// dang por tshon rtsi sngon po dang // ser po dang ni dmar po dang // ljang gu dkar po dag la ni// dri zhim tshon gyis so sor bsgyur// go rom gyis ni bzhag pa la// de la tsU tra tri a o// rang gi
331b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon der dgod do// dib+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaHmig gnyis dag tu rab dgod do// rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig// mig gis rje su dran pa ni// 'bar po'i lta bas mi bskyod pa la sogs bskul zhing / bcom ldan 'das
331b2(rgyud 'grel): yum chen mo'i dkyil 'khor chen mo'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la gsol cig ces bgyi bas kyang bskul bar bya'o// de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul pas// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yis
331b3(rgyud 'grel): btang ba'i srad bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste/ rang gi lag na gnas pa la// srad bu nges gang bar byas la// oM n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA s+pha ra s+pha ra a nu pra baSh+Ti sarba d+harma/ a d+yan ta ai nu pra bany+tsi sarba d+harma/ oM
331b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+harmA d+hI zhes bsgril bar bya'o// bsgril nas mig g.yas dang g.yon du/ ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta zhes bya bya bas brtan par byas la/ srad bu de dris byugs pa'i rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/
331b5(rgyud 'grel): dridri dang me tog dang bdug spos kyis mchod do// oM badz+ra sa ma ya su traM ma ti kr-i ma hUM zhes rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bau zlo bar bya'o// de nas dris nye bar byugs la/ bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs
331b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa lnga dang // sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la phyag byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brtag par bya'o// de la re zhig sngags bzlas pa'i srad bus mtha'
332a1(rgyud 'grel): mA dkar po dang ldan pas spangs la yid ces badz+ra d+hA tu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas la/ rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par byas nas/ badz+ra karma zhes brjod pas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog rang
332a2(rgyud 'grel): gi snying ga nas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su sprul par bya'o// de nas srad bu de g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi gzung la/ dz+dzany+tsazhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag du slad bu btang la/ phyogs
332a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsgom zhing / shar phyogs su bltas te/ rdo rje srad bu gdab par bya'o// yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la byang du bltas te/ gnyis pa gdab par bya'o// de nas ma'i phyogs kyi char gnas lha byung du
332a4(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab par bya'o// rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa la lho'i phyogasu bltas te/ nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o// de nyid du 'dug te byang gi thig gdab po// yang me'i phyogs 'dug ste/ lho phyogs su
332a5(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab par bya'o// kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o// yang me'i mtsham su gnas te/ rlung gi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi thig kyang gdab pa dang / yang bden bral gyi mtshamasu gnas te/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig
332a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o// slob dpon grogs mchog gnyis ni skor phyogasu 'gro bar bya'o// de la sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'o// sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do// ga byer ni sgo'i phyed do// tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed do// rta babs ni sgo'i
332b1(rgyud 'grel): sum 'gyur du bya'o// da nI lung las 'byung ba'i thog gdab ste/ sar pa lngas ni bkal nas kyang // chad mthun par ni mdzes pa yi// thig ni mkhas pas mdzes pa yi// thig ni mkhas pas ci nus kyis// dkyil
332b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi ni thog gdab po// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// yum gyur dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor dgu// dkyil 'khor dgu yi dkyil du ni// bde gshegs
332b3(rgyud 'grel): yum du gyur pa dgod// dung ltar sku mdog dkar ba la// g.yas pa rin chen mchog sbyin zhing // g.yon pa glegs bramra 'dzin pa ste// seng ge la gnas pad+ma'i gdan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// sbyin pa
332b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims bzod pa dang // bsam gtan la sogs 'khor gyis bskor// phyi'i le'u tshe brgyad po la// phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa bcu// so so'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ni// seng ge la gnas pad+ma'i gdan//
332b5(rgyud 'grel): de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// g+ho ri ma bzhin du dgod par bya// phyogs bzhi'i zla ba bzhin po la// snyoms dpa' rdo rje la sogs ni// pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// de yi
332b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rome dag tu ni// thugs rje 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// pad+ma brgya'am stong dag tu// cho ga shes pas bri bar bya// rdo rje nyi mar yang dag ldan// grwa bzhi phyogs bzhi dag tu ni// lA s+ya la sogs lha mo brgya // pad
333a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// legs pa dag tu bri bar bya// lha yi snam bu dgod bya ba// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi// sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang // pad gnas zla ba'i
333a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la// rang rang mtshan ma bsnams pa bri// sgo khyud bzhi po dag la yang // sgro bri bzhi po dri bar bya// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// grwa bzhi phyogs bzhi
333a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni rlung rnams su// rdo rje rIn rgyun skyes par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi Tim+b+ha b+hi bar bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor legs bris nas// dang por bdag nyid 'jug par bya// de nas slob mo bzhug par
333a4(rgyud 'grel): bya// zhes 'byung / gal te gegs ni byung na ni// stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin mngon du byas nas// de'i 'og a las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas// rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snad mdzad kyi skur yang nges
333a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byas nas/ haM las 'phags pa mi g.yo ba thugs ka nas phyung ste/ badz+ra ban+da d+hi zhes yid la brjod la/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor du/ rlung gi phyogasu dri'i thig le bdun byas te/ thig la re re zhing yang re re'i nang du
333a6(rgyud 'grel): chud par byas la dbus ma dang mtha' ma dang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te/ thig le bdun po de dag dang / rlung lha bdun po ri gas la zhon pa'o// mdog nag po 'phags pa mi g.yo bas zhags pas kun
333b1(rgyud 'grel): nas bcings par bsams la/ de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la/ lhag ma drug ni 'khor yin pas kun nas bskor bar bsams pa'o// de nas kham las ni rab tu bsams la// de'i skyed du a nyid las
333b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyung chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs la/ dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ yi gaM hU~M gI sa bon las byung ba/ mtshams rnams su mdung rtse rnams bsams la/ de bzhin du badz+ra ban d+hA zhes brjod do// de kham po
333b3(rgyud 'grel): de ji skad bshad pa'i thig la bdun gdab par bya'o// de nas kham por dang ri rab kyi steng du oM las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yang bcom ldan 'das
333b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyan sngar g.yon pa brkyang bas ri rab gzung nas/ ral gyi dang zhags pas rlung lha rnams la sngags mdzub mdzad par bsams te/ de lta bus ni rlung thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
333b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ 'od nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas bu ga bkag la mnyam par gzhag go// de nas hri zhes bya bas mig g.yos dang g.yon du nyi ma dang
333b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba bskyang la/ khro bo'i lta bas kun bltas la sgo rnams dbye'o// de nas tshan rtsi byin gyis brlang par bya ste/ oM badz+ra rtsi tra sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsa thams cad la lan
334a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyi bar du bzlas na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyu ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungaso// phyag rgya gnyis las ni mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar bar byas nas/ tshon rtsi
334a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya// hri zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma khro bo dam tshig phyag rgya dang ldan pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mthar sbar bar bya'o// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma yau hUM zhes zlos shing dbye
334a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir yang spos snod bzhi dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klog tu gzhug go// de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas// rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po// yid
334a4(rgyud 'grel): sma ni dbye bar byA/ oM badz+rod+g+ha Ta ya sa ma yA pra ba shA hUM// rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag par// sbyar la dkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni// sgro dbye ba'i mchog yin no// de nus rin po che las byas
334a5(rgyud 'grel): pi'i bu mo pa rtsa bi myi gnag pi/ ga sus pa che bA/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ b+hu ru dang // gser da / dngul dang / mu tig dang / pad ma rA ga ste/ rin po rgya thams cad dang / br-i hA s+t+rI dang / kraN+Da ka ri dang /
334a6(rgyud 'grel): ha sa de ba dang / daN+Dod+ga la dang / shwe ti a pa ra tsit+ta ste/ sman thams cad dang / 'bras dang / nas dang / gro dang / til dang / ma sha sde 'bru thams cad dang / spos chu dri zhim pa dang / me tog dri zhim pas yongs
334b1(rgyud 'grel): su bkang la/ dri kun tu byugs pa'i me tog gi phreng bas btags pa'o// mgul pa ras dkar po bzang pos brgyan pa/ 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pas brgyan pa dang / badz+ra d+hA tu badz+rI hUM zhes lan brgya
334b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o// brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ dpag tu med pa 'am/ bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// ras zung brgya'am stong ngam+ba/ lha bshos dang mar me yang brgya'am stong ngame/ bdug spos brgya 'am
334b3(rgyud 'grel): stong ngam/ bcu lngas nyung bar mi bya'o// glang po che'am d+hA la sogs pa'i tshigs kyang dgod do// rol mo'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / cang te'u dang // cha lang dang / rnga rings dang / rnga bo che dang /
334b4(rgyud 'grel): kun dza dang / ti mi la brdung ba ste/ de dag kyang dbul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mngon sum lta bur bsams la/ phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/
334b5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas pa'i rjes la bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o// de nas de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dem tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlab la snying po
334b6(rgyud 'grel): bzla// zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad pa'i cho ga byas la yi ge brgya pa brjod lo// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa bya ste// dpag meng shes rab pha rol phyin// sdig mdo rnams kyi chos sku gang // skyon rnams
335a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad med gzigs mnga'// rnam rtog mi mang khyod la 'dung // gang gis yang dag nyid du khyod// na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// spros med yi ge med mthong na// des ni de bzhin
335a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa mthong // 'phags pa dam pa rnams dang ni// yon tan phyug mo khyod dang ni// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma dang // khyad par ma mthong zla 'od bzhin// gus byas snying rje'i bdag nyid can// sangs rgyas
335a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi 'gro 'dren ma// khyod la brten bgyis nges par ni// bdag nyid chen po mnyam med 'thob// don yod gzigs ma gang yini// bsam pa dag pas lan 'ga' yang // tshul bzhin byed la blta bgyid po// /
335a4(rgyud 'grel): des kyang nges par 'grub pa 'thob// khyod ni dpa' mo gzhan don la// dga' ba'i bdag nyid thams cad kyis// gso mdzad skyed par mdzad pa ste// byams shing gcugs pa'i yum lagaso// dge ba gang slang khyod kyi
335a5(rgyud 'grel): sras// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla ma dang // thugs rje can lags de slad khyod// sems can kun gyi phye mo lags// ma smang skar ma rnams kyis ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes bzhin du// mi dmigs pha rol phyin
335a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis// khyod ni rab tu bskor ba lags// khyod ni nyag ma gcig lags kyang // de bzhin gshegs pas de de der// skye bo 'dul ba'i rten mdzad nas// sna tshogs mtshan gyis rnam mang bstod// nyi ma'i 'od dang
335b1(rgyud 'grel): mjal gyur na// bilnga pa'i chu thigs ji bzhin du// khyod dang mjal ba dag rnams kyis// skyon dang tshig rnams rab 'jig 'gyur// khyod nyid skrag pa skyed pa ste// byis pa rnams la 'jigs par gdal//
335b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dbugs 'byin skyed pa ste// mkhas pa rnams la zhi bar gda'// gang la mgon khyod dbye ba ste// khyod la mngon du chags mi mnga'// gzhon la 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ji lta bur ni 'byung 'gyur//
335b3(rgyud 'grel): yu ma// khyod ni gang nas mi byon te// gang du gzhud par 'gyur ma lags// gang khyod de ltar mi mthong cing // yang dag nyid du rtogs 'gyur ba// rtogs nas nges par 'grub 'gyur ba// dang 'dir ngo mtshar
335b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu che// khyod mthong na ni btsongs 'gyur te// ma mthong na yang 'ching bar 'gyur// khyod mthong na ni grol 'gyur te// ma mthong ni yang grol bar 'gyur// kye ma ngo mtshar skyed mdzad mo// bangab mo lag so grags
335b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma// snang yang snang ba ma lags ma// shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin// sangs rgyas rnams dang rang rgyal dang // nyan thos rnams la nges bstan pa'o// thar lam gcig tu khyod lags te// gzhan ma mchis phyu
335b6(rgyud 'grel): nges par lags// 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs rdzi yis// lus can rnams la bstan slang du// khyod brjod mdzad pa mdzad ma lags// mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan ma med// tshig lam kun las 'das khyod la// su zhig gis
336a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'dir bstod nus// khyod ni gang la gnas mi mnga'// khyod nyid bstod bya ma lags te// de ltar phun sum tshogs mnga' ba// de 'dra'i tshig gi lam dag gis// bstod pa rnams ni shin tu bde//
336a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa// nyan thos zhi ba 'dod pa dang // thams cad shes pa nyid 'gyur zhing // gang zhig thub mchog sras dag ni// lam gyi rnam pa kun shes 'gyur ba dang // gang gis mchog rnams rgyal
336a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yon tan tshogs// rnam kun mkhyen pa mnyes par 'gyur ba yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum mchog de la ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu 'jug par gyis// ser sna nyon mongs dag pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu
336a4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa yis// khams gsum bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa// dkon mchog 'byung gnas phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs mtha' dag rab bsal bas// khams gsum pa ni thams cad kyi// sdug bstsal rnams kyis ma gos
336a5(rgyud 'grel): pa||mya ngan med la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba de nyid bsgom pa yis// 'od zer brgya phrag rnams 'gyed cing // 'od kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rin chen 'od 'phro phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa nyid la rab
336a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las// rab tu rgyal bar mdzad pa po// rgyal ba'i dbang po phyag 'tshal ba stong // khams gsum 'khor ba la gnas pa'i// 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad nas kyang //
336b1(rgyud 'grel): pad ltar skyon gyis ma gos pa// pad+ma dam pa phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsam gti mug la byams pa la// nya ma 'thar ma yis// 'gro ba'i don rnams rab mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal nyi ma'i dkyil khyud la/
336b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'ad pU d+hAr// thabs kyi dam pa sa 'gyur// 'gro baD+D+ha don rab btsun pa'o// b+hag 'tshal gdugs chen dran pa la'o// spyan gyi smon lam dam pa yis// glang chen
336b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis// khams gsum 'khor ba las sgrol ba// phyog 'tshal ting 'dzin glang po la'o// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// dga' ba'i dam par 'gyur ba ni// byang chub rnam gsum thob mdzad
336b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// dga' ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba 'dam ltar sku mkhrungs kyang // srid pa'i nyes pas ma gos pas// 'gro ba 'khor ba las sgrol ba// pad+ma'i mchog l-i phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor
336b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi phyag rgya bcing ba// bstod pa ni rgyal po dang dmangs kyi tshul yin pas mi dgos so zhes slob dpon kha gcig 'chad do// de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mchod do// dngos grub thams cad
336b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad don mdzad ces// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas grogs mchog dam pa dkyil du bzhag ste/ phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin
337a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas// 'bras can gtor ma chu dang bcas// 'bras chan bcas shing la du ba// snum khur+ya la sogs bza' ba rnams// zhes bya ba
337a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i las bya'o// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni bdun bdun dbul te mnyes par bya'o// de nis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ste// dang por slob
337a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon bdag nyid 'jug par bya ste// de nas slob mo 'jug par bya ba// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// semaso can kun la phan pa'i phyir// slob ma rnamos ni gzhug par
337a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhog pa la snod du gyur pa dang ma gyur pa brtag par mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can kha cig sdig pa chen po mchis kyang //
337a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na// ngan srong thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'od kyis phog pa tsam

337b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dga' tshan khyod bdag sbyin pa bsdu// slob dpon khyud ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul byastan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo//
337b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig de nyid bstan du gsol// sbom po rnams kyang bdag la gsol// de nas slob ma la stod g.yogs dang // skad g.yogs dkon la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go// lag tu me tog bskur te// bshags pa nas gsol
337b3(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab pa'i bar du bya ste// 'di skad brjod par bya'o// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming 'od zhes bgyi ba ni// slob dpon dbang du gnas
337b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba// mi ldog pa'i 'khor los 'byor// thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer cher// gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni// slob dpon chen po byungag
337b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug mdzod// ma~M ldog pa yi dbang bsgyur ba// bskal pa chen po bdag l+ya sgrol// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing // dpe byud rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas rgyu ni yid 'ong po// slob dpon chen po
337b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gsol// dbang bskur chen po smod byung ba// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// de nas slob dpon gyis// che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni//
338a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa// dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi// 'khor lo 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal// yang slob dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa'i// gsang ba yongs su 'dzin
338a2(rgyud 'grel): par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam// des kyang 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// zhes bya ba la sogs pas sdom pa dbog go/ sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de
338a3(rgyud 'grel): la ni dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o// 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug go/ de ltar sdom pa 'dzin pa de laM ni// dang por tshur dbang bskur ro// phyag rgya'i dbang drang / cod pan dang / drar dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang /

340a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi yang gzhan dang mthun// dra dang bshad ba rim gyis bstan// dran bzhi brda bstan gdugs bzhi bri// spos gcig brda bstan 'khor la ba ni// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa yi ni brdad// pang 'dra ba bzhin/

341a1(rgyud 'grel): ba lAr+b+hu pad+ma dam pa dmar skya'i mdog/ chos 'chang phyag rgya can dgod do// phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la// lag na pad+ma mthu chen thob// sman gyi rgyal dang yon tan snying // pad+ma me tog myu gu

341a3(rgyud 'grel): rab snang rdo rje can// gzhon nu rgyan dang sang+ge s+t+waM// pad+ma dang ni me tog nyug/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bum pa ni// rim pa bzhin du thogs pa'o// nub byung pad+ma'i lte ba la// gdugs dam pa ste dmar sor mdog/ chos 'chung pa yi phyu

341b1(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs// mod gal dang shA ri'i bya// kun dga' bo dang 'od srungs te// pad+ma dang ni rin chen dang // bum+b+ha pa khri snyan sa le rnams// go rim thogs te gtso la 'dud// bzhi yi phyag mtshan lhung bskye do//

341b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang 'thun pa'o// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang // kun gyi nang rol mthing bya'o// shar du dkar po che ba ste// lho ru ser po che ba ste// nub tu dmar po che ba ste// byung du ljang gu che ba ste// dbus su
341b6(rgyud 'grel): mthing ka yang dag ldan// mchod dang gtor ma rgyas par bsham// dkyil 'khor rgyan sogs legs par dgod// rang nyid bde ba'i stan la 'dug/ dang po tshogs kyi lam gyi chos// bzhi gsum bcu gnyis
342a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom rtogs bya// de rjes sbyor ba'i lam gyi chos// nges 'byung bsgom zhing rtogs par d+ha// de rjes mthong ba'i l+h+wam gyis tshwas+yA// byung chub bdun bsgom rtogs par bya// da sa bAdz+dza /
342a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lam gyi chos// 'phags lam brgyad bsgom rtogs par bya// de rjes rdo rje lta bu gnas// de de yang ni rtogs par bya// de rjes bcu gcig pa yang thob// bru~M lAs rin chen gzhal yas bsam// kun gyis
342a3(rgyud 'grel): bon a yin te// de zhu mtshan ma lha ru bsam// lam lnga rdzogs pa'i pho brang du// yum chen 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gzugs nas rga shi rtogs pa'i tshul// sbyin nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// de yang spyod
342a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul can rnams// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// ring po ma lon de nyid kyis// yum chen 'khor dang bcas spyan drangs te// bsam brjod yul 'das 'grol ba la// mtshon phyir skye med mtshon
342a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa// skye ba med pa'i gzugs brnyan las// 'gro ba'i don du yum du shar// yum skus 'khor dang bcas pa yang // yon bdag sgrib rgyun sbyang ba dang // dam chos klog dang kha don dang // yi ge 'dri sogs
342a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs bgyis pa yi// yum tshan dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// rin chen pad+ma'i gdan stang du// snying rje'i dbang gis spyan 'dren na// byang chub sems kyiso gshigasu gsol// bsam brjod yul 'das pha rol phyin
342b1(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob 'gro don yum+b+ha gyi sku// yum chen pha rol phyin ma yang // yon+d+ra bdag sgrib rgyun sbyang ba dang // dam chos klog dang kha ton dang // yAM ge 'dri sogs bgyis pa yis// yAm chen dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// rin chen pad+ma'i gdan
342b2(rgyud 'grel): steng du// snying rje'i dbang gis spyan 'dren na// byang chub sems kyis gshegs su gsol// sher phyogs rin chen yod pa yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams ni// bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas la// byang chub
342b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' khyim pa dang // rab tu byung dang khye'u dang // bu mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor du bskor// 'khor bcas ma lus pa dag kyang // yon bdag sgrib rgyun sbyang ba'i phyir// dam chos klog dang kha don dang // yi ge 'dri sogs
342b4(rgyud 'grel): bgyis pa yi// yum chen dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// rin chen pad+ma'i gdan steng du// snying rje'i dbang gis spyan 'dren na// byang chub sems kyis gshe gas su gsol// lho phyogs mya ngan med pa yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na//
342b5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs mya ngan med pa la// bya ba la sogs pa dang / nub phyogs nye bar zhi ba yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs rin chen 'od 'phro la// bya ba la sogs pa dang // byang phyogs rgyal ba can gyi ni// /
342b6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dbang po la// bya ba la sogs pa dang / byang shar ting 'dzin brgyan pa yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs ting 'dzin glang po la// bya ba la sogs pa dang //
343a1(rgyud 'grel): shar lho snying po byang chub brgyan// shin tu yid 'ong zhing khams na// bde gshegs pad+ma dam pa lnga// bya ba la sogs pa dang / lho nub rdul dang bral ba yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde bar
343a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa nyi ma yi// dkyil 'khor snang ba'i nga pal la ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang // nub byang dbang du gyur pa yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs gdugs kyi dam pa la// bya ba la sogs pa dang //
343a3(rgyud 'grel): steng phyogs mdangs dga'i zhing khams na// bde gshegs dag pa'i dpal la ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / 'og phyogs pad+ma'i zhing khams na// bde gshegs pad+ma'i dpal la ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / mi 'jed 'jig
343a4(rgyud 'grel): rten khams 'di na// bde gshegs shAkya'i seng+ge la// bya ba la sogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams na// bde gshegs mar me mdzad pa ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang // phyi dong nad dang rab gnas shing // sgo rnams
343a5(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba la sogs kun// ma lus de dag thams cad la// gnas 'dir mchod kyis gshegasu gsol// rin chen rgyas pa pad+ma'i gdan// shes rab gsal bzla ba'i gdan// thugs rje rgyus pa nyi ma'i gdan// yum/
343a6(rgyud 'grel): tshon sras dang bcas la 'bul// dam chos klog dang kha ton dang / yi ge 'dri sogs bgyis pa yis// dge pa bsdu phyir bzhugasu gsol// oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sarba de ba At+ma na ni r+ya ta yA mi// gdan sogs dbul zhing
343b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med bya// de nas mchod pa 'di skad do// bde gshegs bsnyes pa'i yon chab 'di// 'khor gsum yongs su dag sgo nas// yum chen sras dang bcas la 'bul// dam chos klog dang kha ton dang // yi ge 'dri sogs
343b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyis pa yi// dge ba bsdu phyir bzhes su gsol// de bzhin bsgres te sgra mchod par// rgyal yum sras dang bcas la mchod// bdag gi sgo gsum dang ba yis// yum chen 'khor dang btsas pa la// bdag dang khams/
343b3(rgyud 'grel): bsum sems can rnams// ngag yid dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA de ba sarba At+ma naM nir+ya ta ya mi// phyag byas bstod pa 'di lta ste// rang bzhin mnyam nyid gnyis med kyang // 'gro ba'i don phyir yum gyi sku//
343b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi yum gyis yongs bskor ba// dus gsum rgyal yum phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje sems ma rin chenA ma// chos dang las kyi sems ma ste// rigs kyi yum bzhi phyag 'tshal bstod// mA ma kr-I dang gos dkar/
343b5(rgyud 'grel): mo// sangs rgyas spyan dang sgrol ma ste// mdzes pa'i yum bzhi phyag 'tshal bstod// shar phyogs rin chen yod pa yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas ni// sku che mtshan bzang yon
343b6(rgyud 'grel): tan rdzogs// dam chos rmad du byung ba yi// gsung chen pha rol phyin drug gis// zhing mchog gtsang mar yongs sgrogs shing // thugs chen mnyam nyid rtag gnas shing // mdzes pa'i bde gshegs phyag 'tshal bstod// lho
344a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mya ngan med pa yi// dab pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs mya ngan med pa ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / nub phyogs nye bar zhi ba yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs rin
344a2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'od 'phro ni// bya ba sogs pa dang / byang phyogs rgyal ba can gyi ni// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dbang po ni// bye ba la sogs pa dang / byang shar ting 'dzin brgyan pa yi// dag pa yi
344a3(rgyud 'grel): ni zhing khams nA// bde gshegs ting 'dzin glang po ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang // shar lho snying po byang chub brgyan// shin tu yid 'ong zhing khams na// bde gshegs pad+ma dpal la ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / lho nub
344a4(rgyud 'grel): rdul dang bral ba yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde bar gshegs pa nyi ma yi// dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa yi dpal// bya ba la sogs pa dang / nub byang dbang du gyur pa yi// dag pa yi ni zhing khams na// bde gshegs
344a5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs kyi dam pa ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang // steng phyogs mdangs dga'i zhing khams na// bde gshegs dga' ba'i dpal la ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang // 'og phyogs pad+ma'i zhing khams na// bde gshegs pad+mo'i
344a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ya ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / mi mdzad 'jig rten khams 'di na// bde gshegs shAkya seng+ge ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / yongasu dag pa'i zhing khams na// bde bshegs mar me mdzad pa ni// bya ba la sogs
344b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / bsgres te shes par bya'o// sems dpa' 'od zer kun 'byung dang // rin chen 'od 'phro rin dbang phyug/ rdo rje mi g.yo sems dpa' bzhi// pha rol phyin la rab dad de// mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di ru// byA
344b2(rgyud 'grel): rgod spungs pa'i ri bo la// sprul sku shAkya seng+ge yis// dri med pha rol phyin pa lnga// chos sgra chen po sgrogs pa'i tshe// chos 'byung rtags chen bstan pa'i dus// sems dpa' chen po khyed rnams kyang // rang gis gtso
344b3(rgyud 'grel): la rtag zhus te// gtso bos tshul bzhin lung bstan dus// mdzes pa gser gyis pad 'dab stong // shAkya seng+ge mchod pa dang // pha rol phyin chos mnyan pa'i ched// mi mjed 'jig rten 'dir byon tshe// blo chen khyed la phyag 'tshal
344b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod// sems dpa' mya ngan med pa dang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa rgyal// dbang phyug rgyal te sems dpa' ba zhi// bya ba la sogs pa dang / spyod pa'i blo gros snang mchog dang // phyag rgya rgyal dang spobs pa rtsegs// blo
344b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i sems dpa 'aM// bya ba la thogs pa sa rgyal babyin dang grub pa'i sgo// dag na dnganami g.yo ga// rdo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa hUM'aM// b+ha ba la sogs pa dang / rgyal ba mgo dang /
344b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal skyob pa sel ba ste// blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' ba'o// bya ba la sogs pa dang / lagan pardza mthu chen thog// sman rgyam dang ni yon tan sgyid// blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' ba'i/ khya ba la srogs pa nga //
345a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma rab snang rdo rje can// gzhon nu rgyan dang sad+d+ha s+tha// blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' ba ni// bya ba la sogs pa dang / rin chen mchog dang pad+mo rgyal// pad+ma dam pa thogs mang rgyal// blo dang ldan pa
345a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bzhi// bya ba la sogs pa dang / dga' sbyin dang ni bzang skyong dang // dkon mchog 'byung gnas zla 'od gzhon// blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi// bye ba la sogs pa dang / pad+ma dam pa me tog dang // mya ngan
345a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu 'joms pa dang // blo gros mi zad sems dpa' bzhi// bya ba la sogs pa dang / byams pa sa snying na mkha' snying // spyan ras gzigs te sems dpa' bzhi// 'gro don brtson la phyag 'tshal bstod// maud gal dang
345a4(rgyud 'grel): shA ri'i bu// kun dga' ba dang 'od srungs te// mchog bzhi nyan thos phyag 'tshal bstod// nyi 'od dang ni zla 'od dang // byams pa mai tri skyes bu dam// thabs mkhas 'gro dron brtson la bskyod// nyams 'das bde
345a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs mnyes mdzes pa// nang gi lha mo bzhi lnga bstod// mchod pa yi ni las kyis ni// bde bar gshegs pa mnyes mdzad pa// phyi yi lha mo bzhi la bstod// bde gshegs sgo spangs rab tu grags// sgo smra
345a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// bzhi gsum bcu gnyis chos rtogs pa// tshogs lam gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbang po stobs kyis rab phye ba// nges 'byed rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// sa rab dga'i
345b1(rgyud 'grel): ba rtogs gyur pa// mthong lam gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// sa brgyad rim gyis rtogs gyur pa// bsgom lam rtags la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje lta bu la gnas nas// chos kyi sku yang rab tu gsal// sa
345b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems bskyed la sogs rab ldan pa// rgyu dang 'bras bus rab phye ba// thams cad mkhyen gzhung de la bstod// gang zag gsum gyi lam yang bshad// lam shes gzhung
345b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bstod// shes rab snying rje ldan la sogs// spang dang blang ba'i gzhi rnams shes// thams cad mkhyen gzhung de la bstod// rnam pa thams cad yongs bsdus pa// rnam kun mngon rdzogs gzhung
345b4(rgyud 'grel): la bstod // 'phel ba la sogs rab ldan pa// rtse mo'i gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod // 'og ma kun gyi mthar phyin pa// mthar gyis gzhung la phyag 'tshalo// skad cig bzhi dang rab ldan pas// sangs rgyas sa
345b5(rgyud 'grel): yang rab tu gsal// byang chub gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs sku rnams kun dang ldan// sems can don phyir phrin las gzhung // chos sku'i gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'ga' zhig don
345b6(rgyud 'grel): du rgyas pa dang // 'ga' zhig don du 'bring dang ni// rgyas 'bring gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod// de rnams don bsdus la yang bstod// gzhung rnams rgyas par ma gyur kyang // don ni mi zhan ston gyur pa// don mi
346a1(rgyud 'grel): zhan la phyag 'tshal bstod// de rnams gsal bar rab 'byed pa// mkhas pa yis ni mdzad pa gang // bstan bcos gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na//
346a2(rgyud 'grel): yum sras 'khor dang bcas pa yi// gzugs brnyan ji snyed yod pa la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bstod// smon lam bya ba 'di skad do// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yum// bklag pa dang ni kha tog bgyis//
346a3(rgyud 'grel): bgyid du rtsal dang rjes yi rung // dge ba 'di yi stobs kyis ni// bdag cag 'khor dngo bcas pa rnams// zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog/ dus gsum rgyal po'i yum drag la// mchod bstod bskur sti bgyis
346a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // bgyid du rtsal dang rjes yi rang // bden pa de yi stobs kyis ni// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// bdag dang yon bdag skye bar shog/ zhing de nyid du skyes nas
346a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang / bde gshegs bcu la mchod par shog/ pha rol phyin drug spyod par shog/ lam lnga rim gyi bgrod par shog/ lam lnga rim gyis bgrod nas kyang // mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shog/ mngon
346a6(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// rtog pa dag ni mi mnga' yang // 'gro ba'i don phyir sprul pa'i sku// rgyun mi chad par ston par shog/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum kun la// bdag gis dge ba ci bsags
346b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / dge ba de yi stobs kyis ni// khams gsum sems can thams cad kun// thar pa'i lam la 'dzeg par shog/ bdag gis dge ba 'di dag la// bdud kyi bar du mi chod par// dge ba'i 'bras bu smin
346b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi 'phags pa rtag tu ngus// lus gyi tshe grang sdug bsngal mi lta bar// shes rab pha rol phyin don du// sdug bsngal sna tshogs tshol ba ltar// bdag dang khams gsum sems can
346b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang // 'phags pa rtag/ tu ngu bzhin du// shes rab pha rol phyin don du// sdug bsngal tsa spyod der spyod shog/ ji ltar sngon gyi 'o phags pa rtag tu dus// shes rab pha rol phyin don du// sha khrag rus rnams thogs
346b4(rgyud 'grel): med du// sdug bsngal mi lta gtong pa ltar// bdag dang khams gsum sems can kyang // 'phrogs po rtag tu ngu bzhin du// shes rab pha rol phyin don du// sha khrag rus rnams gtong bar shog/ sngon gyi 'phags
346b5(rgyud 'grel): pa chos 'phags kyis// grong khyer chen po spos ldan du// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// phyin ci ma log spyod pa ltar// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// spos ldan lta bu'i grong khyer du// shes rab
346b6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin pa la// phyin ci ma log spyod par shog/ sngon gyi tshe yi tshong 'dus ni// mar mi can gyi dbus su ni// sngon 'das bde gshegs mar me mdzad// sbrul sku shAkya sang+ge la// mngon par 'tshang rgya lung bstan
347a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / sring mo gaM gA'i lha mo dang // sems bskyed lung bstan thob pa ltar// bdag dang khams gsum sems can la// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing //
347a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon par 'tshang rgya lung ston shog/ mngon dga' phyogs bcu'i zhong khamasu// mgon po bde gshegs bcu rnams kyis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// phyin ci ma log spyod pa ltar// bdag dang khams gsum
347a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams// mngon dga' phyogs bcu'i zhing khamasu// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// phyin ci ma log spyod par shog/ sngon tshe shAkya seng+ge yau// kun dga' bo ni thos ldan la// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni// nam gyis
347a4(rgyud 'grel): yang nas yang du ni// sgro skur bral bar gtad pa bzhin// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// kun dga' bo la gtad bzhin du// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni// nan gyi
347a5(rgyud 'grel): yang nas yang du ni// sgro skur bral bar gtod par shog/ gal te bdag dang sems can rnams// tshe yi 'du byed byed pa ni// yum chen pha rol phyin pa la// bklags dang kha ton byas pa dang // yi ge 'dra sogs bgyid pa
347a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // mchod dang bsnyen bkur ci bgyis pa// dge ba de yi stobs kyis ni// gnang gcod sdug bsngal ma par ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// sngon nas bsus zhing 'dran par shog/ bdag nga
347b1(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum sems can rnams// tshe rabs dag ni gar skyes kyang // thos pa'i shes rab ldan gyur nas// the tshom yul de chod par shog/ bsdam pa'i shes rab ldan gyur nas// ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs
347b2(rgyud 'grel): par shog/ chos nyid don rnams rtogs gyur shog/ de ltar shes rab rnams gsum gyis// spros pa rnam gsum chod par shog/ yum ni mkhyen pa rnam gsum la// dge bya'i las ni ci bsags pa//
347b3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba de yi stobs kyis ni// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// mkhyen pa gsum la spyod par shog/ sbyang bya'i gzhi de spangs nas ni// blang bya'i bzhi la spyod par shog/ lam gnyis tshul bzhin
347b4(rgyud 'grel): shes nas kyang // nges 'byung lA ma la spyod par shog/ rgyu yi mkhyen nyid rgyud la sbyar na sA ni// 'bras bu'i mkhyen nyid thob par shog/ yum ni mkhyen pa rnamA gsum gyis// 'jug tu bya ba'i cho ga'o//
347b5(rgyud 'grel): da ni bar gyi skabs bzhi yi ni// mjug tu bya ba'i cho ga bstan+da// dr-i nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dbus su la tshwa dgu ldan bri// de phyir pad+ma 'dab ldan br-i// pad+ma dwe yi phyi nyid du// le tshe khra bos bskor bar bri// de yi phyi yi
347b6(rgyud 'grel): khyams su'o// sgo sogs legs par bri bar bya// de nas lha ni dgod bya ba// dbus su yum ldan shAka seng bri// phyi yi le tshe brgyad la no// bzang skyong dang ni ri ni 'byung gnas// dkon mchog 'byung gnas de dang ni// rin chen
348a1(rgyud 'grel): snying po rin chen byin// ded dpon dam dang skyes bu byin// skyobs pa sbed pa de dang ni// chu bdag lha dang dbang po byin// bzang po stobs dang blo gros dam// tha ma bzhi ni go rim bzhin// shar nas
348a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas zla gam la'o// de phyi pad+ma'i 'di ba ma la// 'phags po blo grosau 'phel ba dang // blo gros mtha' yas don yod mthong sgrib pa med pa blo gros dang // rab tu zhugs pa de dang ni// rnam gzhan brtson 'grus
348a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas dang // rtag tu brtson dang rtag tu sbyor// mi gtong brtson dang nyi ma'i snying // zla snying blo gros dpe med dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang mthu chen tho ba// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang // bdud kyi sgrib med blo
348a4(rgyud 'grel): gros dang // rdo rje de ni blo gros dang // lag na r-in chen phyag rgya dang // rtag tu lag brkyang de dang ni// snying rje tshwar sems rgyan chen po// rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang // ri bo'i zom dang byams pa ste// pad+ma rnams kyi
348a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma la'o// le tshwa khra bo'i steng du nI// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo sogs// lnga brgya tsam yang rang bzhin dmigs// khyams mchod ldan nyan thos dang // de sogs lnga stong tsam yong dmigs// dge bstan pa
348a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dge bsnyen ma// shin tu mang bar dmigaso par bya// kun kyang yon tan ldan par ro// de nas sngon gyi ting 'dzin ni// sa bcu pa yi bar du bsgom// de nas spyan drang 'di skad do// yang dag don ldan mgon po yum//
348b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i le tshe'i dbus su ni// dam chos glog dang kha ton dang // yi ge 'dri sogs bgyis pa yi// dge ba bsdu phyir spyan 'dren na// thugs rje'i dbang gis gshegasu gsol// gdan dang 'tsham par bzhugs
348b2(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// theg chen chos la longs spyod pas// bden pa mthong zhings thob pa'i// 'phags pa'i tshogs bcos de dag kyang // rin chen pad+ma'i gdan steng du// bya ba la sogs sngar bzhi no// de nas phyag bya mchod
348b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bul// de nas bstod pa 'di lta ste// yon tan 'dus pa sku gsung thugs// ro gcig gyur pa gtso chen mchog/ gtso chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dang po byang chub mchog sems bskyed// mos pa
348b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing lam gnyis 'dzin// bden pa mthong zhing 'phags pa ste// sems dpa'i' tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas byin gyis theg chen spyong // nyan thos tshogs la phyag 'tshal po stod// gzhan
348b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams sngon dang 'thun pa ste// lhag par bya ba 'di skad do// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi po dag/ rgyud la tshul bzhin sbyor nas ni// sku de thogs med thob par shog/ bdag
348b6(rgyud 'grel): dang khams gsum sems can rnams// rnam pa brgyad dang bdun cu gsum// sbyor ba dag ni bcwo brgyad dang // thar dang nges 'byed cha 'thun dang // srid dang zhi ba mnyam pa dang // slob dpon rdo rje lta bu yi// de yi
349a1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang ni// kun kyang tshul bzhin spyod par shog/ mtshan nyid dgu bcu rtsa gcig kyang // ma nor tshul bzhin sbyor bar shog/ bdud las bzhi bcu rtsa drug gis// bar du mi chod
349a2(rgyud 'grel): thar bar shog/ yon tan bcu bzhi thob par shog/ phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang ni// tshul bzhini du ni ldan par shog/ snod bcud sbyong ba'i mthun dang ni// thabs mkhas bcu dang ldan par shog/ bdag dang
349a3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum sems can rnams// sbyor dang mthong dang bsgom pa dang // bar chad med pa'i lam mchog dang // lam bzhi'i rtse mo 'grod par shog/ bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// pha rol
349a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin drug rjes dran drug/ ngo bo nyid ni dran pa ste// mthar gyis lam de bskyod par shog/ bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// zag pa med dang rnam par smin// mtshan nyid myud dang rnam par grol//
349a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bzhi dang rabo ldan te// chos kyi sku yang gsal bar shog/ de ltar sbyor ba rnam bzhi yis// rang bzhin don la brtson par shog/ sbyor ba rnam bzhi'i mjug thog suM// cho ga 'di ni shin tu shis// tha ma skabs
349a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi cho ga bstan// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// mdzes pa'i dra ba 'khor lo cano// rin chen gdung gis gru bzhir bcas// dbus dang phyogs bzhir bri bar bya// zur rnams kun tu rin chen 'bar// kun gyi phyi yang
349b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bskor// sgo sogs legs par bri bar bya// de nas lha ni dgod bya ba// dbus su yum chen dgod par bya// shAr du chos kyi sgra yi yum// mdog dkar yum gyi mtshan nyid can// lho ru longs spyod
349b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i yum// mdog ser yum gyi mtshan nyid can// nub tu ngo bo nyid kyi yum// mdog dmar yum gyi mtshan nyid dang // byang du sbrul sgra shAkya seng // kun kyang legs par dgod par bya// de nas sbyin
349b3(rgyud 'grel): drang 'di skad do// yum chen sku bzhi 'khor bcas kyang // rin chen dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dam chos klog dang kha ton dang // yi ge 'dra sogs bgyis pa yi// dge ba bsdu phyir spyan 'dren na// sngon gyi smon
349b4(rgyud 'grel): lam dbang gis ni// gA nas 'dor mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// gdan dang 'tsham par bzhugasu gsol// de nas phyag dang mchod pa bya// de nas bstod pa 'di lta ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas tham/
349b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// rtog pa yi ni yum gyur pa'i// skye med tsam las chos kyi skur// 'ja' tshon lta bur sher ba yi// yum mchog spu la phyag 'tshal bstod// yang dag don ldan chos kyi sku// long spyod rdzogs su'o/
349b6(rgyud 'grel): yul gyur pa// gnas gyur ye shes ldan phyag 'tshal// thun mong ma yin gnas chen du// sems dpa'i tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i// mtshan dang dpe byad rab ldan pa// gnas 'gyur ye shes
350a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi bdag/ longs spyod rdzogs sku phyag 'tshal brjod // bsam brjod yul 'das nyid kyi sku// rang bzhin mtshan ma rnams bral yang // sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis ni// 'gro ba'i don phyir mtshan
350a2(rgyud 'grel): byang sku// kun gyi thun mong ma gyur pa'i// chos kyi sku yi yul gyur pa'i// brjod bral ngo bo nyid kyi sku// ngo bo nyid kyi sku phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i mgon po shAkya sang // bdud bzhi 'joms pa stobs kyi bdag/ dang po byang
350a3(rgyud 'grel): chub chen po yos// 'gyur med byang chub sems bskyed cing // bar du brtson 'grus drag po yis// mi bzang dka' ba sna tshogs spyad// gnas 'gyur ye shes bdag nyid can// gdul bya kun snang shAkya seng // mgon po khyod la
350a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzhan rnams sngar dang 'thun pa ste// lhag par bya ba 'di skad do// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// ngo bo nyid sku thob nas kyang // gzhan gyi don
350a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir sku gsum po// thogs pa med par 'byung bar shog/ bdagra dang khams gsum sems can rnams// sku bzhi tshul bzhin thob nas kyang // mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis// gzhan gyi don la thogs mang du// phyin ci ma log
350a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod par shog/ chos kyi sku yi gzhung dag la// bklags dang yi ge 'dri sogs dang // mchod bstod bsnyen bkur ci bsags pa// dge ba de yi stobs kyis ni// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnamaso// brjod bral sku
350b1(rgyud 'grel): de thob pa shog/ de nas bdag dang mchod mkhan dang // bsngo bar bya ba'i dge ba kun// thams cad mi dmigs par bsgoms la// de la cung zhig gnas par bya'o// de nas chos skyong dang 'byung po'i tshogs tshim par bya dang /
350b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir gtor ma yang gzhan bzhin du gtang ngo // yi ge brgya pa gdon par bya// ye shes pa gshegs shing ngam tshig pa bsdu'o// 'di don rin chen grags pa yis// yum chen dge rtso bsdu ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dag
350b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi// cho ga 'di ni bstan pa yin// mkhas pa rnams kyi yum kun la// don bsdus cho ga de tsam gcig/ shes rab gsal bas shes par bya// de ltar min na thams cad kyis// cho ga legs par bstan pa min// de byas
350b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga 'di dang gzhan// khyad par yod pa kho na ra zad// kun dge' stong po'i don mthong nas// go bsku phyir bstanA pA yin// kun kyang 'di don 'jug par sh+log+sa// slob dpon chen po rat+na kI sa mdzad pa rtug so//
350b5(rgyud 'grel): bal po mAhA pA NA bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skyed du/ b+hU tiSh+Tha shrI d+hi sang k+ShA bA/ bod skad du/ rab gonas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa zhes bya 'o// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha'o// 'dzami dbyangs chen 'am yin
350b6(rgyud 'grel): tan ni// rin chen 'od kyis brgyan pa la// btung nas rab gnas cho ga ni// lhag par 'dir bsdus brjod par bya// bder gshegs rtag meng go 'phong brnyas// dri med mkha' 'dra'i sgo mnga' zhing // brjod du med pa de dag la// rab
351a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'thud pa ma yin te// de dag su ni kun rdzogs pa// brtse bzung rolas byung ba gang // de la brten nus dge ba ni// mtha' yas ster te 'thad pa'ang yin// rnal 'byor de nyid shes skyon btsun// brtse ba'i rang
351a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rigasu bskyad// myang das ldan sgom pa shes rab can// kun la mkhas shing dad pa yis// tshwa klung chu dag btab pa yis// sems sbyangs mchog ni slob dpon yin// bdag kun slob dpon la phul pa// slob mo de ni legs rnams bzhi//
351a3(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs dang nr-i mchod rten dang // ngam chos gtsug lag khang legs bzhengs// nye bar 'tsho kun sel ba rnams// 'dir ni bla mas rab gnas bya// gang zhig 'jim pa rdo dngul ra gan gser dang shing bzang las// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i
351a4(rgyud 'grel): ngade tshul mnga' ba'i sku gzugs byed pa de// yun rang dus su sa bdag bde longs spyad nas tha mar ni// skyob pa'i go 'phang mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// gang na sku gzugs bzhengs zin cing // yun ring ma mchod bzhugs
351a5(rgyud 'grel): pa der// mi shis pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bla mas thog mar cha rkyen kun// ji ltar rnyed bzhin rab bzung nas// gos rgyan bdug pa la sogs pas// rnam bkra mchod pa'i khang par ni// zhag bzang po la cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor
351a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag la bri bar bya// bgegs bsal nas naM der sngags kyis// mgul rgyan rin chen shing thog la// sogs dang kha brgyan me tog gis// mtshan pa'i bum pa lhag gnas bya// sku gzugs la sogs pa dag la bsang gtor dang
351b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lha la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// phyi nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa rnams la mchod pa rnam pa lngas
351b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par mchod la/ spos snod thogs te tshigasu bcad pa dag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o// sku gzugs mngon du phyogs byas te// rdo rje dril bzang legs bzung zhing // lus bsgoms gyur pas gus par ni// snyan/
351b3(rgyud 'grel): gsan dbab pa'i tshogs bcad gdon// bcom ldan che ge rdo rje bzang // rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dus// mgon po thugs rje'i bdog nyid can// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed la mchod pa bgyi slad du// bdag ni rab gnas
351b4(rgyud 'grel): bgyid par 'tshal// de phyir gus pas bdag la ni// bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad par 'os// 'jig rten mgon po thugs rje can// sangs rgyas dgra bcom byang chub sems// gsang sngags lha gzhan gang dag dang // lha dang 'jig rten
351b5(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams dang // 'byung po gang dag rdzu 'phrul che// bstan la mngon par dga' ba rnams// gang dag la la lha mig dang // ldan pa thams cad bdag la dgongs// rdo rje can bdag che ge mo// ci nus par ni mchod pa yis// rig pa'i rgyal
351b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i dkyil 'khor du// rab tu gnas pa 'gyod pa lags// de phyir thams cad slob ma dang // bcas pa bdag la 'artser dgongs te// rab tu gnas pa 'di la ni// nye ba nyid du mdzad pa'i rigs// sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM// rdzogs songs
352a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun dga' ldan dang // lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums na ni// ji ltar rab tu bzhugs de bzhin// sku gzugs 'di la bzhugasu gsol// che ge mo yi don dang ni// byang chub sems ra ba bskyed slad du// mgon
352a2(rgyud 'grel): po rtag tu 'dir bzhugs nas// me tog la sogs 'di rnams bzhes// zhes lan gsum brjod la gus pa snyan gsen dbab par bya'o// // slob dpon gnyis su med pa yis// sbyor ba dang ldan mkhas pa yis//
352a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gso sbyong btsas pa la// sku khrus gsol bya bgegs gzhil dang // sa bon zla bo mtshan ma sogs// bsgom dang ye shes sems sku gzugs// dgod dang na bza' ser po yis// g.yogs dang gtor ma'i las rgyas
352a4(rgyud 'grel): pa// byas te dra nas brjod par bya// yi ge brgya pa len gsum gdon// oM hUM hrI zhes bya sngags kyis// gtsug lag khang ni lhag gnas bya// yo gaM b+h+rUM gis rnam snang las byung ba'i// mchod rten dam chos glegs bam rgyal yum
352a5(rgyud 'grel): ma mA// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rnams bsams nas// lag par gnas pa bdag ni 'dra bar bya// rmi lam dag dang mchod pa yang // gus pas slob ma byed du gzhug/ ji skad bshad pa'i so shing ni// lan bdun bsngags
352a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin par bya// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya// a s+ya sarba pA paM da ha na swA hA// zhes bya bas so// oM badz+ra hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis de la chu khyor ba gsum yang spyon// lag g.yon srad bu dang bcas shing // dag pa'i mal lhag
352b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyanas bcas te// de la tha mas rmi lam gyi// mtshan ma rnams ni bstan par bya// lhag par gnas pa'o// / de nas rab gnas nyin par rnal 'byo tsan+d+ra// rgyun tu byas pa'i las ni yang dag bsgrubs// mchod phyir
352b2(rgyud 'grel): thogs dang ldan zhing dar dbyangs bcings// lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi sor gdub mtshan// lags par khrus byas lus dri zhim// gtsang mar gyur pa'i bgo ba bgos// byams dang snying rje rje su 'brel// rtag sngags byas ma tan
352b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan lhur lin des// mchod khang tshogs ni rgyus pa yis// mdzes par yid du 'di ba yi// stan la 'dug ste bsrung ba yi// 'khor los phyogs sogs bgegs mang bya// byib pa rnams ni byin brlab dang // dkyil 'khor mAm
352b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag bsgom pa dang // mchod pa byas nas sngagaso rnams kyis// mnga' sogs mdzes par dgod par bya// i trAM dz+nyA yak+Sha hU~M// tshon sna lnga pa'i srud pa yis// yongs su dkri bar yang bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te// oM badz+ra shi kha
352b5(rgyud 'grel): re ru Ta ma Ta di shrI ban+d+ha hUM zhes bya ba'o// bgegs zhi byas nas na bza' ser// bsal byed de nas mkhas pa yis// cho ga bzhin du sku khrus gsol// gang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das do ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
352b6(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i khaM lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ mchod
353a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sku khrus 'di dbul bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du gang bcom ldan 'das glang zhes bya bas kyang ngo // yon tan dam pa'i sku mnga' zhing // lha dang mi yi mchod 'os pa// sku byang
353a2(rgyud 'grel): blta bas mi cho ga la// bdag gis sku khrus gsol bar bgyi// mchod rten rin chen chos sku'i bdag/ yon tan dam pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// bdag gis dad pas sku khrus gsol// bud med gzugs kyis 'dul rnams la//
353a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes rgyal ba'i sku bzhugs pa// lha yi rnam pa de la ni// bdag gis sku khrus gsol bar bgyi// slob pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs bzhi// gtsug lag khang 'di bdag gis
353a4(rgyud 'grel): no// dad pas khrus 'di dbul bar bgyi// bdag gis rab tu gnas par bgyi// zhes thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu
353a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa bsags pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus skye mdzes pa/ blta bas chog mo shes pa/ mi shes pa/ mi mthun pa med pa/ sku'i gzugs mthar phyin pa/
353a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mtha' dag gis gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rab tu gnas pa bgyi'o// thugs rje che zhing zhi ba ste// dul zhing bsam gtan go 'phang gnas// thugs kar gnas po'i gsang sngags ni// thugasu
353b1(rgyud 'grel): chung phyir sangs rgyas zhes// de yi mtshan can de ltar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni// sku gzugs 'di la spyan drang gyi// zhes bya 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku// shin tu 'od gsal bkug byas te// sgra gzugs
353b2(rgyud 'grel): la ni bzhugs par bya// de bzhin du/ na mo b+ha ga pa te ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mr-i na swA hA// zhes bya ba dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'ag bad gis bris te/ de bzhin bsod nams
353b3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas gdung bkrus nas// gdan khri la sogs nang du bzhugs byas la// sngags kyis rdo rje'i zhal mang bya'o// de la tshog su bcad pa ni 'di yin te// ya d+harmA he tu pra b+hA wa ha tun+na ShAM ta thA ga to d+yA byA dat+te ShAny+tsa yo ni
353b4(rgyud 'grel): ro d+ha a baM wA dI ma hA shra ma NaHzhes bya'o// gzhan la rang rang snying po ni// yang dag bris te gzhug par bya// sngags gzhug pa dang rdo rje zhal gyi sngags ni// oM d+harmA d+h+r-i tu gar+b+ha swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang // oM badz+ra d+ha tu gar+b+he
353b5(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// rol cha rnam pa sna tshogs dkrol bas rgyal ba'i glu rgyun gyis// gsal bar snying rgyas sim pas bud med rnams kyi gar dang ni// bkra shis sgra ni rnam par bde ba ster ba byung ba'i tshe// sngags pas
353b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal bum pas dbang ni bskur bar bya// sngags pas sku khrus tshul bzhin du// byas nas gser gyi thur mang gis// lha bshos bzang po sngon btang ste// spyan dge wal gyis dbye bar bya// oM tsik+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shur bi na
354a1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha swA hA// oM di bya an na sa mA d+hi d+hA na pri Na ne swA hA// gos mchog dri zhim bkra dang nor bu ni// sngags kyis ngag rnams rab mchod nas// mchod pa'i sprin tshogs mang por snang smyos pas// snying
354a2(rgyud 'grel): ga'i sa bon gnas ta gsang sngags brjod// oM su pra tiSh+Ta ti badz+ra ya swA hA// oM hAM trAM hrI aH/ rgyal ba'i tshogs ni g.yo ba rnams// sku gzugs dag la bzhugs par bya// badz+ra gI ta pA t+yaiHbi sa bi sa zhes bya bas// da
354a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas te/ hU~M gis yang dag par mchod la// phyi'i mchod pa dang / de bzhin du gtor ma dag gis tshim par byas te/ mkhas bsgo bstod pa dang / smon lam gdon par bya'o// mchod
354a4(rgyud 'grel): rten byin gyis brlab pa ni// 'di ltar yin te/ oM hUM hrIHb+h+rUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ de bzhin du yi ge 'bru a las grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la// oM pradz+nyA prad+d+he shru ti smr-i ti bA dze ye swA hA zhes bya ba'o// dam chos glags
354a5(rgyud 'grel): bam la sogs gzhan// gang gis rab tu gnas bya ni// bdag po de dang de 'am ni// yang na rdo rje 'chang dgod bya// de bzhin mchod rten gtsug lag khang // sa bon la sogs legs bsgom pa// sngags pas 'bad de bum
354a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// de bzhin rgya cher gsang bar bya// oM badz+ra u da ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM hUM hrIHde nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi// rnam pas nag po chen po dgug/ de la rgyal ba'i bka' dran bya// de la yun ring skyob byed 'gyur// /
354b1(rgyud 'grel): kha cig las ni lus ngan la// gtwor ma rgya chen sbyin zhes 'byung // b+h+yAM khaM badz+ri b+ha ba dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha b+h+yAM khaM// ma tshang lhag pa zhi bya'i phyir// yi ge brgya pa gus par gdon// cho ga bzhin du tsI nus par// sbyin sreg gi ni las
354b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang bya// 'bras bu mtha' yas dge 'dun mchod bya zhing // skye bo phongs dang gzugs dbang ma tshang dang // sems can chu rgyu sa rgyu mkha' rgyu dang // 'gro ba dag ni yongs su tshim par bya// sdig med gnyen
354b3(rgyud 'grel): bshos pa bcas mtshan mo sad dga' ba// glu dbyangs rol mo'i sgra snyan gyis sang dga' ba yi// bdud rtsis sems dpa'i dngos po shes che'i gar ldan zhing // 'khor ba'i mtshan mo zhi bar byed la gus
354b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'bad// nyi ma bdun gyi mtshan tsam gyis// dga' ston rgya cher bsgrubs rnal 'byor pa// mchod pas yang dag g.yengs pa yis// de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas
354b5(rgyud 'grel): dang lha rnams dang // gang de'i sras dang tshangs la sogs// lha tshogs rnams dang 'byung po gang // mthu bo che rnams bzod pa mdzod// sbyin bdag la ni thams cad du// zhi dang bde legs
354b6(rgyud 'grel): char mdzad de// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni// slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// gang na bskal pa 'am bskal pa las// lhag par sku gzugs 'di bzhugs par// sa dang
355a1(rgyud 'grel): chu dang me rlung gi/ lha rnams kun gyis bsrung du gsol// shin tu dga' dang yid bde bar// gyur nas rab gnas bzang por gshegs// slob dpon slob mar bcas pa
355a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // bu dang tsha bo 'ang bsrung du gsol// bla mas tshul bzhin rab gnas byas pa yis// mchod pa byas la lung bstan sbyin par bya// de tshe slob mas bka' 'di 'dod 'jo yi// ba ltar rtag tu bsams
355a3(rgyud 'grel): te mchod las bya// de nas 'jigs pa dag ni myur du ldog/ de nas ngan 'gro ma lus chad par 'gyur// de nas mngon 'dod 'bras bu rtag tu 'byin// de nas nam yang mngon mtho 'jig pa med// rang
355a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dad pa'i 'byung gnas po chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka waR+Ya dang /
355a5(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi lo tsab pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
356a1(rgyud 'grel): phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa bzhugs so//
356b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ aR+tha pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya da sha TI kA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa/ gsung rab 'di'i lo rgyus bshad na/ sngon
356b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mi yul na lo brgyad cu bzhugs pa'i tshe na sarba bud+d+he sa ma yo ga dang / gu h+ya sa many+dzu la sogs pas 'dul zhing theg pa de dag gi snod du gyur pa 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi yul na med pas rgyal chen ris bzhi dang / sum
356b3(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa gsum dang / dga' ldan la sogs pa'i gnas na lha rnams dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa snod du gyur nas/ de'i tshe mdo sde de na bzhug so// slad kyis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das
356b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'og tu za hor gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa ngo mtshar du chos la dad pa dag cig 'dug pa thig pa de'i 'dul bskal du gyur cing snang du gyur nas/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa snga chen po bco brgyad phyag na rdo rje
356b5(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs kyis za hor gyi yul du gshegs pa dang / ze hor gyi rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdo sde dag bltas na brda ma phrad nas sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa thob pas bltas na yul gyi dbus yul/
356b6(rgyud 'grel): ma la pa na AtsAr+ya ku ku ru nyin zhing ni khyi stong tsam la chos 'chang / mtshan zhing ni khyi de dag la dam tshig longs spyod mdzad pa khyi'i slob dpon mdzad pa zhig bzhugs pa de theg pa'i snod du gyur la/ bdag gi 'dul bskal
357a1(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa yang 'dra nas rgyal pos pho nya btang ste slob dpon gshegs su gsol ba dang / slob dpon de yang sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa lta dang ldan nas/ rgyal po de bdag gi 'dul
357a2(rgyud 'grel): sbrul du 'bab bam mi 'bab mdo sde de dag gi snod du bdag gyur ram ma gyur brtags na/ bdag gi 'dul skal du yang 'bab bdag kyang mdo sde snod du yang 'gyur/ rgyal po'i the tshom yang sel bar 'gyur mod kyi/
357a3(rgyud 'grel): 'on kyang mdo sde dag sngar ma bltas na brgya la rgyal po'i the tshom dag ma sol bar gyur na shin tu ma legs pas pho nya la slar spring ba/ mdo sde dag kho bos sngar blta 'tshal gyis tshur bskur cig ces spring ba dang / de nas
357a4(rgyud 'grel): mdo sde dag pas gshegs te bltas na mgo mjug gar lta ba'i cha ma mchis nas de nyid du lus brdabs te mgon mdo// skyabs mdo zhes bos pa dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par gshegs te khyod ci
357a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod ces drig pa dang / bdag mdo sde 'di bltas pa tsam gyis shes par 'dod ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gnang ngo zhes nas de nas sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa'i glegs blam rnams ma phyi bar de dag gis
357a6(rgyud 'grel): don yid la mngon supa du gsal bar gyur to// de nas slob de za hor gyi yul du gshegs nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la d+harma de dag bshad de/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yis lung bstan nas rgyal po 'jo
357b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar bsgom du stsal te/ dbus su rgyal po nyid btsun mo dam pa bzhi yum gyi sar bkod// blon po bzhi rigs bzhi'i sar bkod// sras mo rnams nang gi lha mo'i
357b2(rgyud 'grel): sar bkod/ btsun mo phal pa rnams phyi'i lha mo'i sar bkod/ blon po phal ba rnams sgro bsrung bzhi dang / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' ltar bkod pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa bdag cag 'khor
357b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa rig 'dzin gyi gnas su grub pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'di mi nub par bya ba'i phyir sras shA kra pu tI rgyal tshab tu dbang bsku re nas/ Ats+tshar+ya ku ku sa/ lung dang man ngag bstan pa rgyal bu de la bstan te
357b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas bsgoms pa dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa stongs la blanas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rig 'dzin du grub bo// de'i sras sha kra pu tis kyang de bzhin du bsgoms pa dang / 'khor bsgoms pa bdun
357b5(rgyud 'grel): brgya dang yang rig 'dzin gyi gnas su grub bo// yang rgyal bu sha kra pu tis sras ni chung ste/ sras mo go ba de byi la dpal dam pa'i nang nas tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bkod de bshams nas/ oMn+d+ra b+hU tI'i lung de sras mo
357b6(rgyud 'grel): yul dang sa 'dzin du stsal pa de la bstan pa las sras mo de yang 'khor dang bcas pa brgya dang yang rig 'dzin du grub bo// de nas sras mo des rgyal bu la lung dang man ngag bzhag pa las 'phel ba ni deng sang du
358a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag lags te/ mdo la ni de rnams bsgrubs te de tshun chad ni gsung rab 'di'i don khong du chud par byas te/ bsgrubs pas sngan chang grub pa yang grangs med phyin chad kyang nan tan cher byas na gdon mi
358a2(rgyud 'grel): za bar 'grub par gzhung 'di nyid kyi nang nas bshad pa yino// gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// zhes 'byung ba ni bdud bzhi bcom ste yon tan drug dang ldan po de bzhin ga
358a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad 'byung ba'i yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpal dam pa phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di yino// yum smos pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab kyang spros dgos te gang zhe na/ yab ni tan twe tad tA sang gra ha
358a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba sngags kyi mdo sde zab mo yin par bstan to// de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ste/ de yang mdo sde zab mo 'di la dad cing mos nas gsung rab la 'jug pa'i phyir bsnyen bkur
358a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te phyag 'tshal na bsodade nams kyi tshogasu 'gyur zhing 'phags pa kun gyis byin gyis rlob pas nyan cing sgrub pa nan tan du byed pa la bgegs dang bar chad du mi 'gyur po'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ 'di skad bdag gis
358a6(rgyud 'grel): thos po'i dus gcig na zhes 'byung ba mdo sde'i tan tra mgo mjug tshang ba ni ma yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di skad smos zhe na/ gsung rob 'di yang mnyan cing gzung sla bar bya ba'i phyir tan tra chen po'i nang nas gud du phyung mong
358b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ tan+na tra de'i mgo las smos pa 'dir brjod pa 'gal ba med do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pas gsungs pa'i don 'di skad dpal rdo rje sems dpas mngon sum du thos kyi/ gzhan las brgya
358b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa grangs med mod kyi/ gzhung 'di gisungs pa thos pa de la dus gcig ces bya'o// gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin
358b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag gi ye shes dang ldan pa zhes 'byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshogs 'dus pa yang
358b4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing lus dang ngag dang yid gsum rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa bar chad du byed pa rnams
358b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du zil gyis mnan te rgal ba'i glags med pa'i phyir ro// spyi'i dam tshig ni byang chub kyi sems mi btang ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos mi gtang ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po mo gtang ba dang /
358b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdo rje mi gtang ba dang / rdo rje'i slob dpon rdo rje samos dpa' dang 'dri bar bsam pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la ngan sems mi bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dang / zhugs kyang dam tshig
359a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bsrung ba la sngags kyi gtam mi bya ba dang / don med pa'i phyogasu lus chud mi gson cing nyon mi mongs pa la sogs pa'i rnam grangs kyang mang mod kyi/ skabs 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam
359a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du sbyor zhing tshul 'di mi gtang ba dam tshig lta bu yin te/ dam tshig gi khyad par thams cad mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / me long lta bu'i
359a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang / chos so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes lta bu rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag gi ye shes thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi
359a4(rgyud 'grel): cod pan gyis khams gsum du chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur pa thob pa zhes 'byung ba dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ni rin po che'i phreng bas dbang bskur bar byed// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang rin po che sna bdun
359a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyal thabs chen po dbang bskur na gling gzhi la dbang byed par 'gyur te/ de dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam por snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
359a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur te/ khams gsum thams cad la mnga' ba/ chos thams cad la longs spyod pa/ phyogs bcu thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ sems
359b1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzod cig ces dbang chen po dbang bskur ba thob pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor pa dbang phyug chen po de
359b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen po thob pa zhes 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chos thams cad kyi dbyings stong pa nyid du mkhyen pas ma nor ma 'khrul pa'i
359b3(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i phyir rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la rgyun du 'jug pas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po zhes kyang bya ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
359b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po man chad kyi longs spyod dang yang ldan la/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid las kyang ma gyur pa'i phyir chos so cog thams cad la dbang mdzad cing 'byor pa'i long spyod chen po dang yong ldan pas na dbang phyug chen
359b5(rgyud 'grel): po zhes bya'o// yang rnam pa gcig tu na sku'i phyag rgya chen po dang rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / gsung thams cad du yongasu dag pas chos kyi phyag rgya dang / lus dang ngag dang yid
359b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdo rje nyid kyi las mnyam pa nyid du spyod pas las kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di rnams kyi tshul du gnas pas rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug ces bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan
360a1(rgyud 'grel): pa longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i phyag rgya dang / lus kyi phyag rgya ni g.yon pa'i mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang du bcug ste rdo rje dang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba bsnun pa'i phywa rgyu dang / shes rab k+Shi
360a2(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa gnyisu med pa'i tshul du spyod pa'i dum tshig gi phyag rgya dang / lus las 'od zer mang po 'phros te/ sangs rgyas kyi sgyu grengs med par sprul te las kyi phyag rgya dong de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
360a3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi phyag rgya chen po thob pa dang ldan pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud cing sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems pa lus pa
