360a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang / ngag sems thams cad rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhes 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du thugasu chud cing
360a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du sbyor ba'i don spyod pa sna tshogs ni sems can thams cad yongasu smin par mdzad pa yang sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba'i thabs sna tshogs grangs med de
360a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi skabs 'dir ni chos mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa 'dul ba'i sems can ma lus pa ste lus pa med pa'i re ba thams cad yongasu bskang ba'i las mdzad pas thabs de lta bus 'dul ba'i
360b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs la bab pa'i sems can rnams smin par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba stong pa rnam par snang mdzad long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chen po ni chos kyi sku la bya'o// rnam pa gcig tu na
360b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyisu med pa'i tshul du sbyor ba yang rtag par dus gsum du mnyam po 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang sems can thams cad la 'khrul
360b3(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyir na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// gzhung las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod de zhes 'byung ba ni rnam par snang mdzad gnyisu
360b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / las kyi rigs kyi gtso bo sangs rgyas dang / 'khor byang
360b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' phyogs phyogs na bkod pa'i tshe dam tshig la ma zhugs pa rnams la gsang ba'i tshad ni byams pa byang chub sems dpa' yang na 'od du mi gnang ngo zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
360b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa dang / byams pas gsol ba bdag ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ dus phye ma la mngon par 'tshang rgya bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan
361a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi yon tan+da bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdag gis mthong ste/ sangs rgyas
361a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa la dar las bsgribs po tsam du byas te ci la yang gsang ba ma mchis na/ dkyil 'khor 'di mdzad pa la bdag la gsad du ci mchis zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
361a3(rgyud 'grel): byams pa khyod kyis thams cad mthong gis kyang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor 'di'i dam tshig tu sngar ma zhugs pas bstan du mi rung ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ phyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang dkyil
361a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i tshe phyogs bzhi dang / dbus kyi gtso bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga sems
361a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis gtsang mar 'du shes te yon tan du blta ba dang / pany+tsa a mr-i tar yang khyad paR+Sha med pa mnyam par spong ba mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ sngangs nas ye shes kyis brtags na chos thams cad
361a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyis khyab pas rnam pa sna tshogasu spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba yang med de/ rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la rdul tsam yang gyur pa med la/ sems can gyi long spyod chen po
361b1(rgyud 'grel): dang yang ldan zhing shin tu rgya che zhing langs pa'i chos shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod yul gyi sgo 'phags pa bzang bar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mgu rangs te mod la bstod pa// sangs rgyas
361b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bsam mi khyab// byang chub sems ni bsam mi khyab// chos mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste shin tu ngo mtshar che zhing dge'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bstod// bya mas
361b3(rgyud 'grel): kha gcig pus bstod par yang ma zad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang shin tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i chos don chung mi za ba ma nor ba'i chos nyid yin par rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i phyiraro// /
361b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku'i tshul dang spyod lam chen po 'di lta bu yin na/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i gnas khang ci 'dra zhe na/ gzhung lngas/ bzhugs pa na nor bu rin po che chen pos rab
361b5(rgyud 'grel): tu spras pa/ dril bu sna tshogs brgyus shing dkrol ba/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bres pa/ dar gyi ba dan mang po'i dril bu rlung gis bskyod da me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab dang / do shAl dang / san mo do dang /
361b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba lta bus shin tu mdzes par byas pa zhes 'byung ba ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas khang gi yon tan ni 'di yin te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so so'i kha
362a1(rgyud 'grel): dog sna tshogs dang 'thun pa/ rgyan thams cad kyang zla ba'i 'od dang / 'dra zhing mdzes pa'i phyiraro// khang pa'i yon tan de dang 'dra na yul gyi tshugs gang zhe na/ gzhung las/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad la
362a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na zhes 'byung ba ste/ sems can gyi khams gsum ma gtogs pa ma yin gyi khams nyid na dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pas sems can so so na dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba'i las
362a3(rgyud 'grel): yod pa rnams kyang zhugs shing dam tshig ma nor bas don grub cing thar pa yang grangs med pa'i phyiraro// dkyil 'khor de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nyag gcig gam/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas
362a4(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ gzhung las/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying
362a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgyad
362a6(rgyud 'grel): stong rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bdar te/ zhes 'byung ba ste/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig ma yin gyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de snyed yod par bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de snyed kyi nang nas nyung zad kyi
362b1(rgyud 'grel): ming smos pa/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo dang / chos kyi rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / las kyi rigs kyi gtso bo nyi tshe'i mtshan smos pa ste/ gzhan ni grangs tsam du bzhag pa'i phyiraro// byang chub
362b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' de rnams kyang phyogs bzhir so so'i rigs rigs ma 'dres par snum bu snyam bur bkod de/ nang dang phyi rim du dngar nas kun gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du bdar te/ gral rim bzhin du
362b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas so// de'i tshe dkyil 'khor so so na bzhugs par zad dam chos kyang 'chad ce na/ gzhung las/ chos 'chad pa de thog mar dge bar du yang dge tha mar yang dge/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ mu 'dres pa/ kun tu rdzogs
362b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston cing chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// ces 'byung
362b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas semaso can gyi don gyi phyir dar ma mdo sde bcu gnyis la sogs pa grangs med pa cig bshad mod kyi/ 'di skad du yang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
362b6(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa gnyi su med pa'i don rgya cher ston pa dang / kr-i ya'i gzhung gi brtags pa dang / kha zas gtsang mar byed pa dang / 'jom dus gsum du 'dzin pa lta bu ma yin gyi gnas la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas 'dam du med// kha zas
363a1(rgyud 'grel): la gtsang mar mi 'dzin pas gtsang sbra mi 'byed/ dus la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas dus thams cad du mnyam par 'jog pas dus gsum du dbyer med de/ thams cad du dge/ shes rab dang thabs
363a2(rgyud 'grel): su 'brel bas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bas don bzang ba/ mnyam pa nyid ma nor bar ston pas tshig bzang ba/ don bzang po'i chos dang kre ya'i cho ga mang po dang ma 'dres pas mnyam
363a3(rgyud 'grel): bar spyod pa/ 'di la chos gzhan gang gis kyang bsnan mi dgos pas kun tu rdzogs pa yong su dag pa'i chos nyid pas bkru bshal bya ba ma yin/ 'khrul pa med pas sgrib par mi 'gyur te/ yong su byung ba ma yin/ gnyisu
363a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sbyor ba yang sems mnyam pa dang / bsngo ba rgya che bas tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i chos rgya tshon po ston cing chos so cog thams cad ngo bo dang rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ grub pa med
363a5(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam por dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i don bshad pa'i phyiraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ci yod ce na/ gzhung las 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rnam par dag
363a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go ces 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bskal par dga' ba'i phyir nyan thos la sogs pa sems rgya chung ngu'i chos las 'phags pa dang // /
363b1(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas shin tu grol zhing dag pa'i dga' ba dang / rdo rje pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi dga' ba phun sum tshogs pas
363b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lha dang phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad la yongasu bsngos na/ 'phags pa thams cad la yang bdag dang gzhan zhes dbyed mod pa mnyam pa rab tu dga' ba yang bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med pa'i
363b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pas 'phags pa ma lus pa la yang bsngos pas bsod nams kyis tshogasu 'gyur te/ 'di lta bur spyod pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// don ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
363b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig go// tshig gi rje su 'brang zhing nan tan bsgrub pa ni byang chub tu 'gyur ro// gzhung las/ 'dod chags kyi mdo'i rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshi go zhes 'byung ba ni sems can thams
363b5(rgyud 'grel): cad la phan pa dang bskyab pa'i yid kyi mda' sngon du btang ste/ rjesu bsgrub pa dang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i yod kyi mda' sngon du btang ste/ rjesu spyod pa dang / 'dod pa
363b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i yon tan dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs te/ mtshungs par byed pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi mda' sngon du btang ste long spyod du byed pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ sdug pa bcing ba'i rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub
364a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po bsnyen par bya ba'i phyir ni sdug pa'o// mi btang ba'i phyir ni bcing du ste/ bdag gi shes rab dang phrad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs
364a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngo ba dang dpyad pa ma nor bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ longs spyod thams cad kyi dbang phyug rnam par rig pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni 'jig rten gyi long spyod thams
364a3(rgyud 'grel): cad dang ldan pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ste/ dbang phyug che bas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor zhing 'dod pa lnga la mtshungs par spyod pa ni 'jig rten gyi longs spyod thams cad dang /
364a4(rgyud 'grel): yang ldan la nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par dag pas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i long spyod thams cad kyi yang mchog phul du byung ba'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ lta ba rnam
364a5(rgyud 'grel): par dge ba'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas yang dag pa'i lta ba yin te/ rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod kyang nyon
364a6(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa'i bcing bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'thun to/ mdor na
364b1(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i lta ba dang bsngo ba mya no rlabs rnam par dag pa'i phyiro// gzhung las/ skyed pa rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshwa go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid tu/
364b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i sred pa dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa dbyar med par mnyam par spyod pa'i sred pa dang / sems can thams
364b3(rgyud 'grel): cang bla na med par sgrol bar bya ba'i thabs la sred pas na rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni// stong pa nyid kyi
364b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang phyag rgya chen po dang ldan mod kyi/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las
364b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'dra lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i sku mnyam pa nyid yin pas nor bu dang gos la sogs te/ bzang po'i bya ba'i rgyan thams
364b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang / 'phags pa bdag gi lha nyid la yon du phul ba dang / bdag gi lha dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas su yang khyad par dbyer med de/ 'phags pa thams cad la mnyam par bsngos pas bsod nams kyi tshogasu
365a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching par mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i gyur// kAzhung las/ 'dod chags rnam par dag pa tshig dran 'ad smra ste/ byang chub sems dpa rtag glu zhus 'byung
365a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rtag tu 'dod chags kyi mnga' bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ mdor na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na 'dod chagasu snang po'i rnam pa sna tshogs ci spyod kyang sem
365a3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi ma rig pa'i spyod pa dang 'dra ste/ nyon mongs po'i 'ching brla 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung lus/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i tshig da ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshi go zhes 'byung
365a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas mngon spyod byed pa'i tshe sems can ma rungs pa 'dul bya dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnas na sdod cing bskyod pa
365a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngo bas zhe sdang du snang ba'i chos spyod kyis kyang sems can ma rig pa'i spyod pa dang mi 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'tshong bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par drag pa'i phyiro// gzhung las/ gti mug rnam par dag pa'i
365a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems pa'i cho go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid du sbyor te/ bdag dang gzhan du khyad par gyis mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas rnam pa sna tshog su spyod kyang
365b1(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci log gI gti mug ma yin gyi mi shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pas na rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go//
365b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na dbang po drug yul drug la sogs te/ thams cad lo spyod kyis kyang / yang dag pa'i
365b3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba dang bsngo ba ma nor bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ spyod do cog kyang bsod nams kyi tshogasu 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ mngal rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di
365b4(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi yo shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mchod pa sna
365b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'od zer las bkye ste/ mchod pa bsngos pa dang / dga' ba phul bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar+ya mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dga' bri'i phyir ro// rnam pa gcig tu na tshul 'di ltar spyod pa'i 'bras
365b6(rgyud 'grel): bu yang btsun pa rig 'dzin byang chub kyi gnas par 'gyur ro// gzhung las/ mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshi go go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab
366a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i dus na chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid ci la spyod kyang de nyid dbyer med par mnyam pa nyid pas mtshan mas bcings pa'i nyan/
366a2(rgyud 'grel): mongs par mi 'gyur rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro gzhung las/ yid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta labyang chub sems dpa'i tshi go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
366a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du sbyar pa phyag rgya chen po'i skye bos yid mgu ba dang dga' ba dang rangs pa kun kyang bdag gi nyid la mchod pa dang yang 'dra/ da du i lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du yang dbyer med pas//
366a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa thams cad la yang mchod par bsngo// yid dga' ba dang mgu ba'i long spyod sems can thams cad lngas kyang myong bar bsngos na bdag la/ yid dga' ba dang nyon mongs bcang par mi 'gyur bas su dga' bar
366a5(rgyud 'grel): byed rkyen po yang bsod nams thob par 'gyur pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ snang ba rnam par dag pa'i cho ga de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang sams pa'i tshi go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes
366a6(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mam par sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i sku bas zugs snang ba thams cad kyang bdag gi lha'i gzugs mtho ba pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'byung bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las
366b1(rgyud 'grel): lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na lus nyid bdag gi lha'i gzugs pas
366b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis med pas na lus shin tu bde ba yin te/ lus kyi bskyod par thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas bskor bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rnam
366b3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ ngag rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na ngag
366b4(rgyud 'grel): gi rang bzhin thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi snod ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i byin gyis smras so cog thams cad sngag su gyur pas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyiro// gzhung los/ yid rnam par
366b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshigo zhes 'byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ci byung yang chos
366b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid pas bsngo ba ma nor na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te rnam par thar pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go//
367a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na gzugs so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir gzugs dang kha dog dbyibs ji ltar
367a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba phyag rgya chen po'i sku nyid la mchod par bsdog pa nor pas sems can nyon mongs po'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi/ rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ sgra rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
367a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na sgra bo cog rang bzhin med pas tshig dang ro kun snyan dbyer med par thams cad rol mo'i sil snyan sna tshogs bdag
367a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid lha'i gzugs la mchod par bsngos na sgra thams cad kyi nang na spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung lngas/ dri rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa
367a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na dri thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir dro zhom pa dang mi zhim pa khyad par du mi byed par dri mchog gis lha nyid
367a6(rgyud 'grel): la mchod par byed pas bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nam su 'gyur pos rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ ro rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshi go zhes 'byung
367b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni stong pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na ro thams cad rung bzhin gyis stod pas mkha zas zhim po dang mi zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / skye ba med de thams cad
367b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang zil ngar bdud rtsi lta bu'i lha la mchod par bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ reg bya rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go//
367b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gnyi ga yin pa'i lus kyi reg bya thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong
367b4(rgyud 'grel): pas na bde mi bde'i khyad par ni dbye ba thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog gis bdag gis lha nyid la mchod par bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod namasu 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// /
367b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ chos rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshigo// zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na chos thams cad
367b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye mi 'gag rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas chos thams cad du spyod pa la 'jug gis byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// de bzhin
368a1(rgyud 'grel): du skye mched bcu gnyis la sogs pa chos kun la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur/
368a2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod cing bsngo ba ma nor ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhung las/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas ngo bo nyid rnam par dag ste/ chos thams
368a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyi steng pa nyid kyis phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// zhes 'byung ba ni/ rtag tu spros pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la ma gtogs pa'i chos zhes bya ba gud na med de/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul dang byis pa ma
368a4(rgyud 'grel): rabs kyi spyod yul yang chos nyid 'di la spyod par zad do// chos kyi mtshan nyid shes pa dang mi shes pa'i khyad par gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang rnam par dag par 'gyur bar zad do// de'i phyir na rtag tu smyos pa'i chos so cog
368a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ chos nyid kyis rnam par dag pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ji ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang stong pa'i mtshan nyid de
368a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma sna tshogs la spyod pa yang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pas shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i 'brel pas spyod do cog kyang chud mi zos shing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs
368b1(rgyud 'grel): su rdzogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro// gzhung las/ lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par bsgrub pa'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
368b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa dang / chod pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa chen po mang du bsags kyang
368b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can dmyal ba dang ngan song du skye bar nam yang mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par 'gyur ro// zhes 'byung ba ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo lag na rdo rje la bshad de/ su la la zhig tshes rgya chen po 'di
368b4(rgyud 'grel): la dad pas 'jug na chos 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i chos/ 'di ni 'ching ba'i chos/ 'di ni spyod pa'i chos/ 'di ni mi spyod pa'o// zhes rnam par dbye ba medo// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa ni stong pa nyid de ye shes dang gnyis
368b5(rgyud 'grel): med par mnyam par sbyor ba ni rnam par dag pa'i sgo mo yin te/ chos rgya chen po 'di lan cig thos na yang nam byang chubo kyi snying po'i bar du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi bar du
368b6(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa la sogs te sgri'i par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i chos thams cad kyi nang du zhugs te spyod kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pas sgrib ces bya ba'i chos thams cad
369a1(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes par rang bzhin stong pas na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang / 'bras bu med pas dmyal ba dang ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur zhes gsungs pa yi no// sdig pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
369a2(rgyud 'grel): med pas spyod pa nyid kyi tshe na 'ching bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med pa'i phyiraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / nan tan ji ltar byas na 'grub ce na/ gzhung las/ gang 'dzin pa dang /
369a3(rgyud 'grel): nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na zhes 'byung ba ste/ bcangs te mnyan nas gzungasu 'dzin pa dang / 'dris par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang gnyisu med pa'i sbyor bas nan tan du
369a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i phyiraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos sgrub pa'i don ji lta bu thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gzhung las/ des tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting 'dzin rab tu thob pas
369a5(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad la rab tu dbang bar 'gyur/ mos pa dang / dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad myong / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe bcu drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes
369a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du sbyor ba thams cad nan tan du byed pa ni thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'a nge 'dzin rab tu 'dzin pas chos so cog thams cad na chos kyi
369b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las tha mi dad pas sems bskyed pa'i phyir dge ba dang sdig pa'i chos mtshungs par spyod kyis kyang 'ching ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad la dbang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi ljongs spyod thams cad
369b2(rgyud 'grel): myong bar gyur kyang 'ching ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur bas dus thams cad du gnod pa'i mi bde ba med pos tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur ba yang tshe shin tu ring ba'i gnas
369b3(rgyud 'grel): nas bsgrubs pa yin/ hUM zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bsdus pa'i don te/ thog ma med pa tshun chud nyon mongs pa'i las kyi bag chags thams cad bsdus nas med par bya ba'i don to// yang rnam pa gcig tu na rdo
369b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa bon 'di las bskyed pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad sdus pa'i phyiraro// yang rnam pa gcig tu na rdo rje lta bu rAg shul che ba'i snying po bas sems
369b5(rgyud 'grel): can 'dul dka' ba ma rungs pa thams cad bsdus nas 'joms shing 'jig por byed pa'i don to// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po zhes 'byung ba nas khadz+nyA hUM/
369b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'dir yang rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin sngon
370a1(rgyud 'grel): du thugs su chud pa/ gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad ma lus pa rdo rje 'dzin sems can kun las 'phags pa'i phyir mchog/ 'dod pa'i khams dang
370a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par 'dul zhing mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i don la sems can thams cad btsud
370a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rig 'dzin gyi gnas thob par byas pa dang / bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas sgrib pa med pa'i phyir don thams cad grub pa ni lag na
370a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ste/ dam tshig thams cad dang yang ldan la mnyam par sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po yang mi gtong ba'i tshul du bzhugs shing zha 'bring ba 'khor yang rdo rje gnod sbyin mang pos byas nas shes rab dang /
370a5(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis don bstan pas sems can yang de la mdzad par mdzad de/ sems can chos rgya chen po 'di la zhugs pa rnams don chung mi za bar thugasu chud pas shin tu dgyes pa'i tshul gyis
370a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal 'dzum ste/ rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs dang yum lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lag pa g.yon pas gsor te/ cis kyang mi 'jigs mi skrag pa'i bsnyems pas rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing
370b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams dang ye shes chen po'i tshogs mnga' ba bde ba chen po'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i dam tshig sems can thams cad yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i chos thugasu
370b2(rgyud 'grel): chung nas rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying por gsungs te/ badz+ra hUM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi snying po brtan par bya ba'i don bstan nAs/ badz+ra sa bstan to// gzhung las/ dwe nasna bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces
370b3(rgyud 'grel): ba nas myur du b+hA nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// a zhes 'byung ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bstan
370b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul du zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rdo rje'i mtshan nyid ni/
370b5(rgyud 'grel): slu ba'i phyir phyag mtshan rdo rje bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bi dang / gtso mo'i mtshan nyid lta bu ste mnyam par gnas so// rin po che'i
370b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i don ni dbang bsgyur ba yin te/ phyag mtshan yang rin po che bsnams te/ chos stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang rin po che'i rigs/
371a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che lngas dbang bskur na gling bzhi la dbang byed pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dngos grub thams
371a2(rgyud 'grel): cad sbyin pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ron po che'i cod pan la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi don mdzad cing mnyam par rdzogs pa'i gnaso// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams
371a3(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos pa bzhin te/ phyag mtshan pad+ma bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bar yang chos kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan
371a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid du ldan pa mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs par gnas so// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad dbyings kyis khyab ste ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// dngos grub kyi bya ba sna tshogs mdzad pas
371a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan yang las kyi rdo rje rgya gram bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang las kyi rigs kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas gnas te/
371a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar so so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang longs spyod kyi tshul 'di ltar zhugs/ dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug 'dod pa rnams kyang chos stong pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la goms
371b1(rgyud 'grel): byaste/ chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan thos la sogs pas nan tan du byas na chos so cog thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing bar mi 'gyur bas snying po byang chub
371b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las 'das par 'gyur/ chos nyid la gnas pas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul te/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs shing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
371b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// a zhes bya ba ni de bzhin po'i snying po ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa spros pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don ston pa'i phyiraro// gzhung las/ de nas de ni skad ces bka' stsal zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra aM
371b4(rgyud 'grel): aHzhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ zhes 'byung ba rtag tu brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang ngag yid gsum rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bya bas chos mnyam pa nyid
371b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi don bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i don du 'gyur bas 'dzum dmul te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba nyid kyi phyir snying po// badz+ra
371b6(rgyud 'grel): aM aHzhes gsungs te/ stong pa ma skyes pa'i don aH'di las brtan par bya ba'i phyiraro// oM zhes bya ba'i don lta ba'i tshig go// gzhung las/ thams cad 'dul ba na zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
372a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang sems can gyi don gyi phyir stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i
372a2(rgyud 'grel): don ni 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsdu ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yangs pa 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa rig
372a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yab yum lnga mnyam par gnas pa yang chos thamapa cu dra stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'tshong ba med pas 'dod chags spros pa med pa'i phyir bdag dang gzhan du lta ba med par mnyam pas
372a4(rgyud 'grel): nan zhe sdang mi 'byung bas zhe sdud spros pa med do// rin po chu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tI/ snying rje chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can ma rungs pa 'dul ba dang / gnas bde bar bskyed par bya ba'i phyir mngon spyod kyi dbang byed
372a5(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas zhe sdang gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur pas zhe sdang spros pa med pa'i phyir ro// /
372a6(rgyud 'grel): cici'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug gis gzung ba med pa'i phyir spyod pas gti mug spros pa mdo// gti mug gis gzung ba'i 'dod tshogs dang zhi sdang ni bcings par 'gyur gyi/ gti mug med pa'i 'dod chags deng zhe sdang gi las spyodapa
372b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod de/ rnam par mi rtog pa nyid pas mi
372b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/ gti mug gi rang bzhin myed pas gauta mug spros pa med pa'i phyir chos so cog thams cad spros pa mang ngo // las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pas
372b3(rgyud 'grel): na gnyisu med pa'i mnyam pa'i tshul du sbyor zhing dngos grub thams cad kyi las byed kyang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba med pas chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong
372b4(rgyud 'grel): ste spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 'di ltar zhal nas gsungs dkyil 'khor 'di'i don la 'jug cing shes rab kyi pha rol
372b5(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa la sogs pa nan tan du byed na de 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir chos so cog thams cad stong pa nyid pas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song
372b6(rgyud 'grel): du mi 'gro bar 'gyur to// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid kyis sdig pa rang bzhin yod lo 'bras bu bsags na sems can gcig gsang
373a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sdig pa bzhin du mang du bsad pa tshogs che bar yang mngon na/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pas sems can
373a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir sdig pa'i rang bzhin yang med de 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir sdig pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ hUM zhes bya ba'i don 'di lhag ma
373a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rtag tu gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos mnyam pa
373a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i don sems can bstan pa yan chud mi za zhing rnam par dag por 'gyur ba'i phyir zhol 'dzum ste/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas lus gzi brjid chen po
373a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan thams cad skrag cing spa skong ba'i tshul du bsgyur te/ badz+ra hUM zhes bya ba gsung so// badz+ra hUM gi don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'dra/ gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'dos de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag pa'i chos nyid ces
373a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// hUM zhes 'byung ba'i bar du ste/ chos kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi gtso bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bstan te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par
373b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i chos rgya chen po yangs pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di bstan to// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na 'dod
373b2(rgyud 'grel): chags kyi spyod yul thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin gyo 'drong chags kyi nyon mongs pas bcings par mi 'gyur te/ stong pa nyid dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos dag pa'i mtshan nyid pas nyon mong/
373b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdud thams cad kyis gnod par mi nus pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir bdag gi phyogs mi
373b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas zhe sdang mi 'byung mod kyi snying rje chen po'i gzugs kyi sems can ma rungs pa 'dul ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnas ngan pa las gdon pa'i dbang mdzad mod kyi/ zhe sdang gi nyon mongs par
373b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur pas zhe sdang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ thams cad la dbang du spyod pas nA rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yin te zhes sdang gi mtshan nyid rang
373b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis stong ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur bas sgrib pa med pas chos nyid stong pa nyid kyi dbyings pas dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// chos nyid kyi ngo bos chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
374a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshan nyid bstan to// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de dri ma'i chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste sdig pa'i tshogasu mi 'gyur pas sdig pa'i chos rnam par dag pa ste/ dngos grub kyi chos
374a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la spyod cing grub pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o// rdo rje rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de sdig pa'i chos thams cad chos nyid kyis skyong ste nyon mongs pa'i 'ching
374a3(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur pos chos thams cad rnam par dag ces bya ste/ chos thams cad yongasu dag na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba'i bdud thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin
374a4(rgyud 'grel): che'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab ste/ rang bzhin gyis dag pas chos la sems can tha dad pa medo/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// /
374a5(rgyud 'grel): chos stong pa nyid kyis sems can dag pa'i dbang du byed po'i rin po che'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma grub
374a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par na sems can dang / ye shes stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du dbyer med pas ye shes rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad dbyingasu mnyam pas chos kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil
374b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ste/ 'ching ba med pas
374b2(rgyud 'grel): sa grub thams cad grub par byed pa'i long spyod pa'i phyir las kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa me pa'i phyir ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par
374b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du chud cing rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i spyod yul tu 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyang gcig gis gcig bskyed pa yin te/ chos kyi
374b4(rgyud 'grel): phyog rgya chen pos mnyam par don 'od nyan pa la sogs te/ grub pa nan tan du byas na 'dod chags la sogs pa chos sna tshogs kyi nang na 'dug kyang nyon mongs pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur te pad+ma 'dam gyis mi chags pa
374b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ de bsdu na stong pa nyid kyis ye shes gnyis med par mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes pas nyon mongs pa gsum yang mi spang ba'i dam tshig tu blang zhes 'byung // sna tshogs la spyod
374b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// hrIHzhes bya ba pa ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa bon 'di
375a1(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i phyir te/ don mi skye mi 'gag spros pa med pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i mtshan nyid du blta'o// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba nas badz+ra hrIHzhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'phags
375a2(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rtag tu gsungs pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang gsungs te/ chos rgya chen po'i spyod yul 'di sems can rnam par dge ba'i don du 'gyur bas 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma 'dam gyis mi chags
375a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du chos mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la nyon mongs pa'i dri mas mi gosau par mkhyen tAM/ snying po badz+ra hA zhes gsungaso// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// trAM hUM
375a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bos stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum thams cad kyis dbang pos dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor
375a5(rgyud 'grel): bostan to// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khrims chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob pas khams gsum thams cad kyi chos
375a6(rgyud 'grel): la mnga' mdzad pa/ log par lta ba thams cad kyi gnyen po ste/ mthu che ba'i phyir rdo rje dang 'dra bas rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad don dam pa man chad ci nas kyang
375b1(rgyud 'grel): phan pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i don sbyin pa'i dbang mdzad de/ sems can re ba thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa yid bzhin du thob par 'gyur bas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/
375b2(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa mo skyes pa'i don shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i sems can thams cad la ston to// chos kyi sbyin pas kun kyang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di la 'jug cing stong pa nyid kyi yi
375b3(rgyud 'grel): shes dang gnyisu med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
375b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas dngos grub kyi las thams cad thob par byed pas yid bzhin gyi rin po che las nor rdzas sna tshogs 'byung zhing rdzas kyi sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ste/ sems can dbul phongs pa thams cad lus
375b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang sems bad pa thob par 'gyur bas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// so so'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnamasu zhugs shing stong pa nyid kyi yang shes dang chos mnyam pa nyid du nan tan gyis spyad na dkyil 'khor/
375b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi yon tan 'di rnams kyang thob cing dbang byed par 'gyur ro// dz+dza zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ 'di'i sa bon las rin po che'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir te/ mi skyo mi 'asag spros/
376a1(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don to// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba nas/ dam tshig rin po che'i snying pos smraso// badz+ra traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rin po che'i rigs kyi
376a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi gtso bo na mkha'i snying pos rtag tu bshad pa'i don 'di rtag tu bshad pa'i don 'di brtan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di bstan na don yod par mkhyen pas bzhin 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo bo la
376a3(rgyud 'grel): rini po che'i phreng ba 'ching ba yang gzhan thams cad la dbang byed pa'i tha tshig ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad du stong par
376a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pas stod par gyur pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyi stong pas na yang dag par ma nor bas mtshan nyid la sus kyang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rdo rje lta bu ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi
376a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par byas pas mtshan me med pa mo yin gyi chos nyid kyis mtshan ma med paso shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod
376a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang du byed pos rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad smon pa med par byas pas smon pa med pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyis smon pa med ste/ gnyisu med pa'i
376b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos nyid pa sna chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
376b2(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang yongasu dag pas chos nyid kyis dri ma med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku man chad dngos grub thob par byed pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// a'i don ni rtag
376b3(rgyud 'grel): tu smos pa dang 'dra/ gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra a zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pos kyang rtag tu bshad
376b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir bzhin 'dzum bzhin du bstan te/ badz+ra a zhis gsungaso// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab chen pos chos thams cad
376b5(rgyud 'grel): la gcod pa'i ral gri lta bu yin pas na shes rlab zab mo'i don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shig gsungs shig pa'i skul ba'i tha tshig pas ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
376b6(rgyud 'grel): 'debs zhes bya'o// gzhung las// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa zhes bya nas/ traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
377a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzad pa la 'jug pa'i don to// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad
377a2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong la gnyis su med par sbyor ba la mnyam par 'jug pa ni cis kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par 'gyu ro// rin po che'i rigs
377a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas chos mnyam pas sems can ma lus pa'i don thams cad mi gtong ba'i dbang du byed pa ni rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil
377a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la byed par 'gyur ro// rnam pa gcig tu ni rin po che ni dbang bskur ba'i los byed pas dbang bskur ba yang 'ga' tsam la ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad l-i dbang bskur bas na mnyam pa zhes bya'o//
377a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de gnyisu med par mnyam par sbyor ba dus thams cad du mnyam pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par 'gyur ro// las kyi rigs kyi
377a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor bas mnyam pa nyid du dngos grub kyi las thams cad du 'jug pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par
377b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// dz+dza zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bshad pa'i don dang 'thun no// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu zhes bya ba nAs/ badz+rA tsakra hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
377b2(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed ma thog tu chos kyi 'khor lo bAskor bas rtag tu bshad paSh+Ti dkyil 'khor gyi don shin tu rgya che bar mthong nas bzhin 'dzu ma bzhin du 'khor lo yongasu bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
377b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug po zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa yin no// badz+ra tsak+ka hUM zhes bya ba'i don rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bsdus pa zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/
377b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// trAM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin
377b5(rgyud 'grel): pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor ba las byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mchod pa sgo/
377b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs de'i rgyud los 'byung ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyang shin tu rgya che la yangs te/ mthu che ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la me chod pa'i cho ga rgyas
378a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba las 'od zer mang po phyogs bcur 'phros te/ sems can thams cad kyi mgon
378a2(rgyud 'grel): dang skyabs kyi dbang du byed pa dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dul zhing gnas bde ba bskyed de/ snying rje chen po'i dbang du byed pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// chos kyi rigs
378a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod do// stong pa nyid kyi ya shes dang mnyam par sbyor bar dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod
378a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i las byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge 'dri ba la sogs pa'i ni las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// tAM zhes bya ba'i don
378a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rtag tu bstan pa'o// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas/ oM ga gan swa b+ha ba badz+ra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu bstan pa'i don 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' na mkha
378a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod kyi don de dang 'thun par bsnan te/ smras pa'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub ho ha ho zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de
378b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad 'dul nus pa rdo rje'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems
378b2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad rang bzhin gyis grub pa mdo// stong pas mnyam pa'i phyir khro ba yang mnyam pa ste/ chos stong pa khro ba stong pa sems can stong phra bas chos nyid kyi don ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mthu che ba'i phyir rdo rje'i
378b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil lta bus 'dul lo// rin po che'i dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad chos kyis 'dul zhing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba'i dbang du byas pas khro ba 'dul te/ stong pa nyid gnyisu med par mnyam
378b4(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba'i phyir sems can sna tshogs kyi don gyi don gyi phyir khro ba spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams
378b5(rgyud 'grel): cad stong pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir khro ba yang chos nyid de/ chos kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can
378b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang zad pa'i mu med pas rdo rje dang 'dra/ khro bas 'dul ba yang de bzhin du sems can rgya che bas khro ba yang rgya che ste/ sems can khro ba gnyis kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing sems
379a1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dus thams cad du byed pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// ha ha zhes bya ba'i don ni sems can thams cad yongasu dag pa'i phyir spro ba'i las byed pas mgu
379a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am rangs pa'i tha tshig ste/ rgod pa'i mtshon mas ha ha zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra kro d+hau ha ha zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang sems can
379a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad smin par 'gyur ba'i don pas lus chud mi za bar dga' bsnun pa'i phyir/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu pha rol 'jigs skrag par byed pa'i gzugs bsgyur nas/ rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i gad mo snying po 'di smras// /
379a4(rgyud 'grel): nga las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las su rig par bya'o// hrI zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab
379a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pos chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de sems can thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ rang
379a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis mnyam pas shes rab dpa pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang stong pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil
379b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dbyer med cing mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos por grub pa med pas stong pa'i mtshan nyid/ mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing chos thams cad la spyod
379b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ bgegs thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje lta bur mthu tsho bas na rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i
379b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas dbang bskur te don byed pa yang sems can 'ga' la byed pa mu yin gyi/ dbri bkol med par sems can thams cad kyi don du byed pas na shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang sems/
379b4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don gyi phyir na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad chos kyi dbyings nyid las gzhan ma yin pas shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor/
379b5(rgyud 'grel): ba yang chos kyi dbyings te chos nyid pas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad spyod do cog kyang las zhes bya ste/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa
379b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang dngos grub la sogs te rnam pa sna tshogs grub kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// hrI zhes bya ba'i don no rtag tu
380a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa dang / 'thun no// gzhung lhas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra a mo g+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rno rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
380a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don 'dod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dam tshig mi gtong ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs
380a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin la bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba med pa'i snyoms par zhugs nas sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa'i don yod pa thams cad kyi ngam chog ces bya ba rang gi snying po smraso//
380a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra a mo g+ha hUM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i gdon mi za bar btus pa zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam por snang mdzad ces bya ba nas traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
380a5(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shos rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sems can thams cad la byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di
380a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang thugs thams cad dang ldan pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba
380b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas kun kyang bla na med par mngon par 'tshang rgya bas na sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las gzhan ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang brlabs che bas rdo rje'i rigs kyi kyi
380b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i snying pos
380b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur nas/ sems can thams cad kyang de'i spyod lam la 'jug tsung mAnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i snying posra dbang byed par 'gyuraro// dam tshig rin po chu'i dbang bskor ba yin te/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas lus thams
380b4(rgyud 'grel): cad spyod du 'jug pa'i dbang sbyin par byed pa sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang /
380b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan pa la 'jug pas/ sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po ste/ chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tAM/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
380b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas sems can thams cad bya ba byed pa la rab tu sbyor gyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas/ sems can thams cad las kyi snying po ste/ dngos grub thams//
381a1(rgyud 'grel): cad mngon par spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// trAM zhes bya ba'i don ni rin po che'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem+b+hasna dpa' thams cad bskyed pa'i sa bon te/ rin
381a2(rgyud 'grel): po che'i rigs dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra hrI b+h+yo swA hA zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim dang ra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
381a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang khyad par med de/ mtshungs shing 'dra bas rgya cher bstan nas snying po mchog sngags rnams byin te/ de yang gnyis meng pa mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi snying po
381a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// gzhung las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med cis bya ba nas/ b+h+yo badz+ra oM sarba d+har+m+ma ta/ a pra ba ni tsa/ hi li hi li/ sarba d+harma taM/ mi lI mi lI/ sarba d+harma ta/ oM nu rA ga gi ni swA hA zhes bya/
381a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med thug pa med pa'i chos kyang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i long spyod chen po dang ldan par
381a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas cho ga 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang 'thun po'i phyir cho ga 'di yang mtha' yas mu med thug pa med par yongasu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mnyam
381b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma sbyor bas spyod yul thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i tshul 'ang bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba bsdam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas pas de
381b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mtha' yas te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs spyod chen po nyid yin pos de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ni bdud thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir/
381b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos thams cad du mnyam ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i mthu dang 'dra mu med cing
381b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis zil gyis mi gnon to// dbang du grub pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba nI du ma'i don ma
381b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ mnyam pa nyid gcig tu zad pas chos thams cad kyang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid gcig tu zad de dbyer med pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// los kyi rigs kyi dkyil
381b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba chos mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi spyod yul la zhugs kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'tshong ba dang sgrib par mi 'gyur/
382a1(rgyud 'grel): bas shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pas na chos thams cad kyang mthar thug pa yin no// zhes bya ba yin te/ dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil
382a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ badz+ra b+h+yo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ shes rabo dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor
382a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul 'di nyon pa la sogs te bsgom pa'i bar du nan tan byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dge ba'i mthar phyin te/ chos mtshan mu sna tshogs kyi sgor zhugs kyis kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi don gyis smra
382a4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba yauno// gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin ga
382a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad skyob pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pas de dang nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir gus pa zhes ri mor bya ba'i phyir phyag 'tsha lo zhes bya ba yi no// /
382a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ oM b+ha ga bAn na rong ba ri bid sha d+ha ya swA hA zhes bya ba nas/ oM zhes bya ba ste sngags kyi yi ge 'bru drug po 'di rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o so so'i rigs kyi snying po
382b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i don ni spyod pa thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba'i don yino// rig pa chen po'i snying po 'di bshad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par
382b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i don to// ma nor bar ston pa'i dam tshig gi sgra dang sngags kyi snying po yi ge 'bru drug brjod pa bar snang la grag go// sngags kyi snying po 'di rnams ni rog 'dzin thams cad kyis rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya zhing rjes su
382b3(rgyud 'grel): dran par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te chos kyi rnam grangs snying po bstan pa 'di dngos grub thams cad thob par byed pa'i don yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang myur du 'grub par bya
382b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byin gyis brlabs nas legaso zhes bya ba byin no// oM zhes bya ba'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku lta bu'o// bor ma ni ak+Sho b+h+ya dang / rat+na saM b+ha ba dang / a mo g+ha sid+d+hi 'dus pa'i sku lta bu'o//
382b5(rgyud 'grel): tha ma ni chos kyi sa a mI tA b+hA lA bur baul+yA'o// yang rnam pa gcig tu na thog ma ni pha rol tu phyin pa thu ma ni rab/ bar ma ni byang chub kyi semasna lta bu yin no// gzhung las/ sems dpa' tshan po zhes bya ba nas/ blo gros
382b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rigs kyi yum rnams kyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor so so'i yon tan rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ni sems dpa' chen po legaso zhes bya ste/ rdo rje
383a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi slob dpon lta bu ste/ stong pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor zhing bdud la srogs pa log par lnga pa thams
383a2(rgyud 'grel): cad zil gyis gnon par mdzad de ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i gnyen po bas de'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad song pa nyid mnyam pa las ma gyur par 'jig rten gyi chos dang ldong spyod thams
383a3(rgyud 'grel): cad la yang mngon par spyod pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas legaso zhes bya bas bstod // rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ni bde ba chen po legs so zhes
383a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yino// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi yang shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang ldan thabs dang /
383a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab zung du 'brel te mnyam pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur pas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pas theg pa chen po legaso zhes bya
383a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yino// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas dngos grub kyi las sna tshogs mdzad kyis kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid
383b1(rgyud 'grel): las ma gyur pas ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du yang 'grub la/ shes rab dang thabs chen po chus mi za bas shin tu blo gros dang ldan pa yin pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir blo gros chen po legs
383b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba yi no// gzhung las/ cho ga 'di ni dge bar smras zhes bya ba nas/ bshad pa la ni mngon par bstod ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor
383b3(rgyud 'grel): bas 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la 'dzam pa med par spyod/ shes rab drang thabs kyi spyod yul yang ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo
383b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyang mos shing dad par 'gyur pa'i chos chen po yin pas dge bor smraso zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad
383b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang phyag na rdo rje bsnams te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du zhugs nas/ mdo sde zab mo 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i tshul tu bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
383b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin gyis kyang kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyar ba ste/ de bas na mdo sde'i don 'di bstan pas thos
384a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes rab bskyeng de chos nyid kyi rigs pa la brten nas bsam pa'i shes rab kyis don gang yin pa la lcags par byas nas mnyam sbyor ba'i don la bsgoms na/ 'bras bu byang chub kyi
384a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'dzin la sogs te bla na med pa'os man chad dngos grub ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu yod pas sems can kun kyang dam pa'i chos spyod pas 'di la 'jug cing sdom par 'gyur bas 'dul ba'i
384a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces bya'o// mnyam par sbyor ba'i sgo yangs pa 'di la kun kyang mos shing dad par 'gyur la/ longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du bla na med pa'i sa thob par 'gyur byas thob pa'i rgyal po ste/ shes rab dang thabs
384a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mnyam par spyod pas ldog pa'i chos gud na med pas sangs rgyas kyis thob pa las thob pa'i sa che ba bsgrub tu med pas bla na med pas bla na med pa zhes bya'o// sems can gang yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos
384a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam 'di la nyan pa dang sems pa dang bsgom pa la sogs te/ nun tan du byed pa la ni gdon dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur bA dang / 'tsha bar byed mi nuso// sangs rgyas
384a6(rgyud 'grel): dodang byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par bya ba dang / dngos grub dam pa ci 'dod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kun gyis ring por mi thogs par ster bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yang mi 'gal bar myur du thob par 'gyuraro//
384b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa'i chos chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba byin gyis brlabs pas
384b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i don 'di yang rdo rje can gyis grub par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos yangs shing rgya che la longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du 'grub pa'i chos bshad pa 'di la don chen po yong bar mthong nas mngon
384b3(rgyud 'grel): par dga' zhing bstod do// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bA naswA/ s+t+waM badz+ra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni khams gsum
384b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba yin pas gsang ba'i chos nyid pas na stong po nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyisu med par mnyam par sbyor ba spros pa mang pa bde ba chen po'i don yod pa mnyam par
384b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba mi gtong ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa chos yangs shing rgya che ba'i sgo 'di thog ma dad pas rtsom pa nas zhugs nas 'jug bla na med pa thob kyi bar du nyon mongs pa myed par sgrib pa thams cad spangs
384b6(rgyud 'grel): pos na thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi khyad par med par dus thams cad du bde ba mnyam pa'i chos gsung so// mur thug la sogs pa chos zab mo'i don ma mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyi su
385a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos nyid mi shes pa rnams kyis ni dka' thub pa nyon mongs pa sprad kyis kyang 'bras bu bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro// des na spyod pa kun las 'phags pa'i
385a2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyang thugs rje can gyis bstan par zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid kyi ye shes gnyisu myed par mnyam par sbyor bas
385a3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod dang ldan zhing / bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob pa sems can thams cad kyang byang chub tu sgrol bar byed pas thog ma dang pa la zhugs nas tha ma bla na mad+ma pa lnga sgrol ba la thug gi bar du dus
385a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cod du badre bas 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub kyi dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod yul du bstan nas de bzhon
385a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba las long spyod chen po dang ldan zhing bde
385a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di yang thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab ste/ don dam pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
385b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su mnyam par sbyor byas bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa phyogs bcu'i sangs
385b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyis rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum gyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar byed pas na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong
385b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po byed pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dag po'i spyod yul la dgod pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i nang
385b4(rgyud 'grel): na gnas shing sems can gyi don lo brtson gyis kyang 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pas mi tshogs pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan lngas 'dus te/ sems can thams cad kyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i
385b5(rgyud 'grel): las 'jug tsang dngos grub dam pa thams cad thob pa'i las spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yang / dkyil 'khor la la rin lngar gsungs
385b6(rgyud 'grel): lal la rin bzhir gsungs/ la lar ni gsum du gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po
386a1(rgyud 'grel): che'i rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / las kyi rigs te 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang yon tan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang yum lnga'i don bstan to// dkyil 'khor
386a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bstan pa ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsdus te dkyil 'khor bzhir bstan to// gsung rab kha cig las dkyil 'khor gsum du bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang
386a3(rgyud 'grel): du rje rje'i rigs bsdu/ las kyi rigs kyi nang du rin po che'i rigs bsdus pa dang / chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 'di ltar gsum yang dpe ci dang 'dra zhe na/ phyin ci log gi dbang gi lus dang
386a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ngag gsum gyi spyod yul 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum byung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas bcings pas 'khor ba'i nang du sdug bsngal ba yang lus dang drag dang yid gsum 'khrul pa'i
386a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis gyur to// phyin ci log med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dag pas lus rdo rje zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// ngag rdo rje
386a6(rgyud 'grel): ste don dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang 'thun pas de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// yid rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas na sems can gyi don bya ba sna
386b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mdzad pa dngos grub kyi las thams cad mngon par spyod pa'i dbang du byed cing las rnams la spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rigs gcig tu bsdus pa'i dkyil
386b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid gsum rdo rjer 'gyur pas 'dod chags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ zhe sdang ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang lus
386b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ gti mug ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pas na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid
386b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pas nyon mongs pa'i chos zhes gzhan gud na med pas chos so cog thams cad rnam dag pa'i rang bzhin yin par mngon no// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi dbus lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
386b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang spyod yul sngar sngar so sor 'gyur te/ gcig tu na spyod yul gcig las med pa ma yin gyi/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la yang rigs kyi lnga tshur gyi mtshan nyid yon tan dang spyod yul dang tshogs shing
386b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas ming tsam du dkyil 'khor yang lnga'i mtshan nyid du dbye bar zad do// dkyil 'khor lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste chos kyi dbyings nyid yin/ rigs kyi yum dang gtso bo nyid las sprul to// mchod
387a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo bcu drug kyang rigs kyi yum las gzhan ma yi no// s+t+waM badz+ra oM zhes bya ba'i swA ni dpal dang ldan pa 'am bkra shis pa'i mtshan nyid badz+ra ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid/ oM nI de bzhin bya sh+loH/
387a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba nas s+t+waM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen mo// de
387a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tha mi dad pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos don d+hi lnga bzhin du mkhyen pa'i chos so// chos thams cad kyi dbyings las tha mi dad pa'i phyir don thams cad bsgrub par gsungs te swA hA zhes
387a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bkra shis kyi don yin/ hUM dang phoT ces bya ba ni mngon spyod dang dgug po dang 'jigs par bya ba'i don yin te/ 'odi rigs kyi yum gyis chos thams cad dge zhing bkra shos par gsungs pa'i phyir zhe
387a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// gzhung las/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gan su ni zhes bya ba nas dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rigs kyi yum gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes ra
387a6(rgyud 'grel): dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la mkhas pa'i mchog thob par 'gyur zhing / sems can 'khor ba'i mtha' med pa de srid du don mdzad pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs
387b1(rgyud 'grel): bar shes rabA dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgya chen po 'di la don chud mi za b.raru mkhyen nas tshogs bcad du bstod pa yin no// 'khor ba'i thogs ma dang mtha' meng pa'i phyir mtha'i mtha' yang modo gra rdzab/
387b2(rgyud 'grel): tsam du 'khor ba'i mtha' med pa'i bar du stong pa nyid drang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni de dang mnyam par sbyor ba ma yin no// de ltar 'khor ba mtha' med pa'i don la sems dang po skyed pa nas zhugs pas bla na med pa'i
387b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyis kyang thog ma snying rje chen po dang smon lam chen pos sems can gyi don la 'jug par bya ba'i shugs kyis sems can gyi don chu'i rgyan dang 'dra bar mdzad pas nyan thos dang rang
387b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar mi mdzad do// shes rab ces bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad
387b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid de/ de shes rab dang dbyings gnyis su sbyor te mnyam par gyur pa'i dus na/ shes rab dang yong su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zhes bya'o// thabs ni
387b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la byang chub kyi sems skyes te/ sems de las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod kyi mchod pa
388a1(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa bskyed pa dang / dngos grub dam pa thams cad bskyed pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs su 'brel na
388a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis gzung ba'i shes rab pas shes rapo kyang thabs shes rab kyis gzung ba'i thobs pas na thabs kyang shes rab ste/ de ltar shes rab dang thabs dus thams cad du mnyam pa'i dus na ye
388a3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi byin brlabs pa'i sa pas chos so cog thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na rang bzhin med pas dag par gyur/ ji srid du sems can 'khor ba'i mtha' med pa'i bar du 'jig
388a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang / 'dod chags kyi nang na spyod kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'tshod par mi 'gyur gyi rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na de bas na sems can thams cad kyang mnyam
388a5(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba la 'dzud cing sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir/ ji srid 'khor ba de tsam gyi bar du sems can 'dul zhing dge ba'i bsheso gnyen byed do// chos thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa
388a6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis grub pa mang ci la yang mi gnas pa'o// nam mkha' zhes bya ba yang sems can gyi phyin ci log gis las kyi 'bras bu la nam mkha' yang dngos po mi snang ba'i phyir med par 'dzin gyi/ chos
388b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste mnyam pa'i dus ni nam mkha' la ci zhig med na med ces bya ste/ med par lta ba yang mi 'byung ba na de bas na nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid grub pa med pa'i phyir ro// chos
388b2(rgyud 'grel): so cog thams cad kyang na mkha' bzhin te grub pa med pas mnyam/ rang bzhin gyis drag po'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas na kun gyis mchog mngon pa nyid rdzogs zhes bya'o// /
388b3(rgyud 'grel): dper na pad+ma tshon gyis sgyur kyang man gyi kha dog gis mi 'gyur ba bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gaunyisu med pa'i mnyam par sbyor bas 'gro la phan pa'i don byed kyis nyes pas 'chang bar mi 'gyu ro// shes rab dang
