388b4(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas long spyod chen po'i nang du bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i don byed kyang rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na ljongs spyod chen po dang
388b5(rgyud 'grel): yang mi 'bral ba'i phyir na don che/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mnyam par sbyor ba la gnas pas sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ni bde ba che ba ste/ de ltar spyod pa na bsod nam
388b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs te/ sku gsum lhun gyis grub pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yongasu smin par mdzad pas
389a1(rgyud 'grel): na sems can gyi hA zhes bya ba ni chos rgya chen po 'dis sems can smin par 'gyur pas dga' ste rgod pa'i tha tshig po// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
389a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos ni de nyan pa la sogs te bsgom pa'i nan tan chen por byas na bde ba thams cad thob pa dang dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i don ni rtag tu
389a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa dang 'thun no// gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs par
389a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems 'a can gyi mig chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa yongasu ston pas na/ oM ni chos
389a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la dbong byed pa'i phyir thog mar 'gro zhes bya'o// de man tshed ni tshig gi mjug rgyan te/ yi ge'i nang nas dngos su zer bar zad do// zhal na/ gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni ma rabs kun la dka'
389a6(rgyud 'grel): yis kyang tshig go tsog gi don de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa yin no par gzhung las/ mngon sum du gsungs pa'i phyir sems can gyi phyir bstan pa rnams ma nor ba tsam//
389b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga brtsa ba'i 'grel pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+han mi ngas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

390b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sha tA kA ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje sems pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang //
390b2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid drang ni// de bzhin spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ mkha' snying rdo rje khu tshur dang // 'jam dbyangs chos kyi 'khor lo can// mkha' mdzod de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // bsdus pa dag tu
390b3(rgyud 'grel): yongasu bskyugs// zhi bo mdung gri mtshan dkyil 'khor// ma mo ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang // sring mo rnams kyis bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor bcu dang lnga rnams ni// pha rol phyin dum la bshad de/ pha rol
390b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa'i sgo nas gsungas+ya// dak+kol 'khor rdo rje can gyi nyid// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pa'o dang // rdo rje mye ltar 'bar nyid dang // 'jig rten dbang dang mkhre'i snying po// bsdus dad ming po'i gang yin dang // sring
390b5(rgyud 'grel): mo lha dang klu dag go/ lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dag kyang // de bzhin mchog gyur bshad pa yin// rdo rje can dang rgyal nyid dang // rdo rje me 'brar pad+ma gnyis// rin chen ming po sring mo dang // klu dang sdugra bsngal
390b6(rgyud 'grel): grags bsdus pa// 'di rnams nyid kyis ras ris rnams// gong nas gong du bshad pa yin// rdo rje can dang bde gshegaso nyid// phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang // mkha' snying bsdus par bshad pa ste// nyi shu rtsa
391a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dag tu bshad// dpal mchog dang po'i gsum pa las// de ni dkyil 'khor bdA bya ste/ rdo rje can bde gshegs pad+ma// mkhar snying ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang // sring mo k+Sha dang
391a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal grags// gsum pa bcu par bshad pa yin// ras ris lnga pa gnang bar grags// lha mo lnga yi dkyil 'khor rnams// bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// dpal mchog dang por bshad pa yi ni// dza
391a3(rgyud 'grel): rje rnam snang nyi ma dang // 'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying dang // meng pa rnams dang sring mo klu/ sdug bsngal gdon dang bsdus pa'o// rasA res dkyil 'khor lnga rnams dang // bzhi pa dag tu yongasu bsgrags//
391a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams ni 'byung ba yi// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad bya n+ya// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa dbu ste// 'i de la rnam rtog+ha tAm+b+hi dgos// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi grangs byas nas// dA ni du lta nyid du yang // phyag rgya'i
391a5(rgyud 'grel): dum bu bsdus pa dang // mdor bsdus nA sa nAM bshad byar bya// dang po phyag rgya chen po nyid// de bzhin gnyi sna pa dam tshi ga ste// gsum pa chos kyi rgyur grags pa// bzhi po las kyi rgya nyid do// rgyu yi dum bu bsngos pa
391a6(rgyud 'grel): cen// skye med nyid du shes bya ste// gang gi mchog tu gtser gyur gang // phyi nang thams cad yang dag 'dus// 'di yi legs sbyor gtso bo yang // da ni ma lus bshad par bya// gang zhig gang dang yang dag sbyar// phyag rgya rim bzhin
391b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya che dang las su grags// yang dge sbyor bar bshad pa yin// dam tshig rgyu dang chos kyang ni// 'debs pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod// 'di dag nyid kyi sdus pa dag/ ci 'dra ci phyir bshad bya ste// phyag rgya che dang yang/
391b2(rgyud 'grel): dge sbyor// las kyi phyag rgya zhes pa yin// gang phyir bsnams po med nA ni// nga rgyal 'byung bar mi 'gyur la// nga rgyal med pa nyid kyis na// phyag rgya chen po brtan mi 'gyur// chos med par ni bsgrub bya yi// dam tshig phyag rgya brtan
391b3(rgyud 'grel): med pos// gang zhig bsgrub par bya sngags l-i// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod bya// lus ni gnas pa med pa dang // dngos po med cing mtshan med la// skye ba med pa'i sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po zla ba byung ba la//
391b4(rgyud 'grel): 'og yi ge'i gzugs can te// yi ge les ni mtshan ma byung // mtshan las rdo rje 'dzin rang nyid// me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang // so sor rtog dang bya ba'i bozhi// rnam par dag pa'ang na mkha' ste// dngos med gnas pa lnga pa yin//
391b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po sar gyur cing // chu nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// chos kyi phyag rgya ma nyid de// rlung ni las la rnam par gnas// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yang dag sbyor// de bzhin khams dang skye mched dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu sna tshogs
391b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // de bzhin sa dang pha rol phyin// 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rnam pa bzhir// mdor bsdus na ni 'byung 'gyur bas// de bas de dag nyid du dgrol// las ni chos la dgrol bar bya// chos kyang de bzhin dam
392a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig la// dam tshig kyang ni rgya chen la// rgya chen zla ba skyong ba la'o// ye shes sems dpa' snying rdo rje// lU la yang ni rtse gsum pa// bzhi pa'ang sna tshogasna rdo rje ste// phyag rgya'i dam tshig yin par bshad//
392a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gis bzhi po 'di dag gi/ sbyor ba yang dag mi shes par// spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid// de las dngos grub rgyab kyis phyogs// dam tshig ye shes sngags rnams kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshan ma nyid// gal te dngos grub
392a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'dod na// bzlas brjod kyang ni 'di ltar bya// nyon mongs thams cad zlog byed pa'i// yi ge brgya pa dang por brjod// thog ma dbus dang tha mar yang // byin rlob byed pas bzlas par bya// bdag la byin brlob byed nyid dang // tshe yid

396a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams nas byon// glegs bam la ni bris nas su// de bzhin brgya rtswa brgyad pa ni// dbus su ga bur bcug nas bcang // khyim du dus gsum dag tu mchod// de ni dbul por mi 'gyur la//

396b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya rdo rje rgyal po'i sgo nas so// ma nu pA la ya rdo rje nags pa'i sgo nas so// badz+ra satwA te no pa tISh+Tha rdo rje legs pa'i sgo nas// d+ha D+ho me b+hu ba rdo rje rin chen gyi sgo nas so// su to b+h+yo me b+hA ba rdo rje gaN+DI brjid kyi sgo na so// a nu
396b2(rgyud 'grel): rak+to me b+hA ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi sgo nas so// su po ts+yai me b+ha ba rdo rje bzhud pa'i sgo nas so// sarba bidi d+har+m+ma pyA yats+tsha rdo rje chos kyi smyo nas so// sarba karma su tsA mi rdo rje rnon po'i skyo nas so// tsit+taM shre yAHku ru r+No
396b3(rgyud 'grel): d+h+r-i rgyu'i skyo nas so// hUM ha ha ha hA d+ho rje smra bya'i sgro nas so// ho b+ha ga ba na sar+b+ba ta thA gA ta rdo rdo rje las kyi sgo nas so// mA me muny+dzu badz+ra b+ha ba rdo NAM sru ba'i sgo nas so// ma hA sA ma ya satwe rdo rje ge nod
396b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas so// AHrdo rje khro tshur gyi sgo nas so// yi ge brgya pa bshad pa las/ bsod nams legs par gud+ma bsags pa/ des ni 'jig rten maM lus pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig/ yi ge ban+d+ha pA'i byA shed pa/ slong
396b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon pad+ma'i rdo rje lcags kyus/ stong phrag brgya pa las ji snyed pa rnams brjed du dogs nas bris pa yin no// / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags
396b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
397a1(rgyud 'grel): mi ga rgya pa'i chog 'jug go/
397b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sha tA k+Sha ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// dang por sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sa phyogs der sangs
397b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cid mdun gyi bar snang la dmigs te/ de rnams la dang por mchod pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sdig pa bshegs pa dang / bsod nams
397b3(rgyud 'grel): lo rjes su yi rung ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lim la gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu bdag dang dngos po thams cad mi snang bar byas shing / sngags 'dis stong
397b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du bsgom mo// au sr-i b+ha ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmaHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM de nas oM tsit+ta pra tI bya d+haM kA ro mi zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis a yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs
397b5(rgyud 'grel): can bskyed par bya'o// de nas oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pa dA ya mi zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis de nyid spro bar bya'o// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes bya ba/ hUM las byung ba na mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par
397b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas po'i rdo rje bsams la de nas rdo rje'i gzugs de las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa dang / rdo rje dang zla ba yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
398a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams par sngags 'dis bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// sar+b+ba sarba ta thA ga ta thA ma haM/
398a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu hUM las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bsams la/ de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje de'i lta bya la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par bsam mo// shar phyogs su
398a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa/ lhor rin chen 'byung ldan/ nub tu 'od dpag med pa/ byang du don yod grub pa'o// shar lhor rdo rje sems ma/ phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po// phyag yon pa skur brtan bya// phyag rked par
398a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jog pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// lho nub tu rdo rje rin tshon ma sku mdog ser ba/ phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yon pa bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na rin po che bsnams pa'o// nub byang du rdo
398a5(rgyud 'grel): rje chos ma sku mdog dmar be/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yon pa bkur brten pa/ phyag gauyas na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// byang shar du rdo rje la su ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis po/ phyag
398a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o// 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ skor phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs po
398b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bcu drug la bsam par bya ste/ de la rtsibs kyi dbus su thums cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o// de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su
398b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog ljang go g.yon pa bsnyems pas bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na rang gi thugs khar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyi bsnams pa'o// rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser
398b3(rgyud 'grel): po rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pi'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje chags pa smyo mdog dmar po phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// rdo rje legs pra sku mdog mA ra kA te lta bu/ phyag
398b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa'o// rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gri dbang bskur ba'i gnas su phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching ba'i tshul gyis
398b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje ny+tsau ma sku mdog dimyur po phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rgyal mtshuna? sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sto stangs/ phyag gnyis
398b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bzhed pa sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar po// phyag gnyis kyi so'i phreng ba gnyi ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis bsgoms
399a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rdo rje chos sku mdog dmarA sgra phyug g.yon pas pad+ma'i stong bu 'dzin cing phyug g.yas pas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'byung pa'o// rdo rje rnon po sgra mdog gur gum
399a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can+da/ phyag g.yon pas thugs ka re shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa'i glegs bim bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rAli gri 'phyar ba'o// rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can chos
399a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje smra ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pa na dung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa lce'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag
399a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams nas spyi bor 'dzeg cing gar mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje srung ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go che bsnams pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin skye naug
399a5(rgyud 'grel): po phyag gnyis kyi mche ba gnyis rang go zhal gyi thad kar bsnams nas gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pas bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog kar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje
399a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa dang ldan par bsam mo// // de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya hi zhes bye bas bdag nyid la bltas la/ sa ma
399b1(rgyud 'grel): yA s+t+waM zhes bya ba 'dris mdun du ye shes sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms lA// sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM zhes bya ba 'dis snying gar bcu gA ste/ bdag dang mi
399b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i dog nyid du bsgrim mo// de nas yi g+he hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje 'od da ldan pa'i tshul can gyi lce bsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lta
399b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bum po'i dbang bskur ba dang cod pan gyi dbang dang / phreng po'i dbang dgra rdo rje'i dbang la sogs pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa/ yum rnams kyis bskur

400b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis sdig pa mang po byas pa dang / thams cad spangs pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rkang pa gcig pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa 'dzin pa yis// bzlas na lha'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// phyed kyi tshod kyis bzlas ni
401a1(rgyud 'grel): de rtswa dang l+h+wa ma'i rje mthong ngo // s+yA p+na yIs ban+d+has+thAn+ta bAn+d+han d+ha'i dag sbyangs pa'o// rlung gi la bsgrusmra pa sa yon tan glu cig 'byung ngo // lung tung la bzlas pas yon tan gnyis 'byung // lcags smra gazlas pas smon
401a2(rgyud 'grel): tan gsum 'byung // te l+yA la bzlas pas yon tan bzhi'o// nor bu mr-i tig b+hu ru'i la bzlas pas yon tan bcu dran no// dbang po'i dmigs lnga bzlas pas yon tan+ti 'byung ngo // pad+ma la bzlas pas yon tan bya ba'o// yon tan bye
401a3(rgyud 'grel): ba phrag byA b+hA ru dAk+Sha la'o// bo de tsaM lnga bzlas pas bcu drug dang 'dra bar dus 'das pa yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung // bzlas pas phreng ba'i yon tan 'di dag rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o// mkhas pas lhag pa dang tshod
401a4(rgyud 'grel): par mi bya'o// lhag pa chad pa la bgegs chen po 'jug go// des na mnyam par bya'o// bzlas pa'i dus song nas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// sdig 'dzub snying gar byas te/ mdzub mos bzlas nas bgegs bkug nas char
401a5(rgyud 'grel): gcod par 'gyu ro// d+ma mos bkra s+yA p+tas b+h+rUM tshom me par+ya da sgra grub 'amyong ngo // srin lag dang bgrangs pas gan da ts+tshinI myod s+yai rmAba~M 'grub go// chung dung bgrangs byas sha za dgug pa dang bskyed pa 'gru g+h+ra/

401b1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ sku khrus kyi cho ga/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// dang po rnal 'byor pa man ngag thob pas rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo thob pa'i bsod nams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas la sku khrus

401b3(rgyud 'grel): ga shra pha la go yu tr-I ti phra la la sogs pa dang / sman lnga nI ha sa de ba krar+b+ha ka ri gr-i ha de ba b+ha la/ mu tra la sogs pa dang / dr-i zhim po'i sman dang dri zhim po'i mar khu mar zho dang 'o ma dang / ma su ra'i phye ma dang gro'i bag
401b4(rgyud 'grel): dar kha dog lnga pa'i 'phan spangs la bum pa byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bya'o// de'i cho ga 'di'o// mdun du gang 'i kha dog la sogs pas maN+Dal bya'o// g.yas su ci 'byor pa'i rdzas bzhag lo// de nas maN+Dal skyon
401b5(rgyud 'grel): du bum pa bcu 'am gcig gi nang du/ srog chags mod pa'i dri zhim po'i chus yongasu gang 'bru dang gr-i ha de ba la sogs pa gos srog can gyis mgrin pa bcings la/ g.yon du snod gcig yang dag par bzhag go// mchod
401b6(rgyud 'grel): yiyon gyi snod dri zhim po'i chu dang zho dang po gA ling dang spyan dang yungs dang kau suM ma dang go yu rnams yang dge bar bshams la/ yi dam gyi lha'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla sa la/ de nas las thams cad pa'i spyod

402a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya'o// pad+ma lnga la hUM gyur pa las rdo rje hUM gis mtshan ma las 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par bya'o// de zhu bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa dkar po zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/ rdo rje dril bu 'gying
402a3(rgyud 'grel): pabapas 'dzin po/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying gar zla ba rdo rje hUM gi rnam pa'o// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo// mi bskyed pa'i dbu rgyan pasam gtAn bya'o// de bzhin du bum+b+ha par rnam par snang mdzad rin chen
402a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan/ snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub pa/ spyan ma mA ma kI/ gos dkar mo// sgrol ma bdud rtsi 'khyil ba mtha' mar rdzogs po ni phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig po rung gi mtshan 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyun
402a5(rgyud 'grel): pe/ rlu gi sa bon+da dang mtshan mA las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g.yon brkyang ba'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sdigs mdzub dang / rdo rje gsor ba bsgom mo// yi ge byA rgyu ba ldan gsum brjod cing sor
402a6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rdo rje dang / yi ge gsum gyis me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod ngo // de nas dril bu'i sngags kyis mchod/ de la sngags ni/ oM AHhUM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+Te rat+na/ rat+na/ br-i rat+na/
402b1(rgyud 'grel): pra rat+na saM pra rat+na saM pra rat+na/ sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa le ta ma hA prAdz+nyA pra rA mi tA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra hr-i da ya sAn+to ShA ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dwe nyid g.yas pa'i sor+ya mo yisa? rdo rje dang smos khang gzung la gAyon
402b2(rgyud 'grel): paMs dril bu dkrol lo// yi gre brgya pa l+yen gsum brjod do// oM badz+rA d+h+r-ika AHhUM swA hI/ oM badz+ra dzi na dzi kra IHhUM swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+rika AHhUM swA hA/ oM A ro li ke UHhUM swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA d+hik+ka A
402b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA/ oM ru ru sU ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM shA ra ka ri shan+ti kA ri go tra ni go tra nI ga tai ga taM ku tra ni swA hAM/ oM ka To bi kA TaM ni ka Te kA Ti ka ro tI bi ri sI hI/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu ra
402b4(rgyud 'grel): sne hAn maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM na mo/ badz+ra kro d+ha ya mA hAd daMSh+Ta ud g+ha b+hai ra pA ya a si mu sa la pa rai shu pA sha hastA yA/ oM badz+ra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hI tISh+Ta ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
402b5(rgyud 'grel): he na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pA tsa/ gardzi gar+dz+dza/ bi b+h+yo Ta ya sarba big+h+nAM bi nA yA kaM ma hA ga Na pi ta dzi be tan+ta ka rA ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni spyan drAng ba'i sngags so// dwe naMs sngagAs 'di ri mA pa dzi wI
402b6(rgyud 'grel): bar rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum par mchod yon me tog la sogs pa sbyin no// sngon du brjod pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing sbyin no// snang gsal mor me dri mchog zhal zas kyis gang ba'i sbyin no// de nas g.yon
403a1(rgyud 'grel): pan+d+ha dril bu bkur brten la g.yas pa'i sbyor ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rtsa gsum du'i phyug rgyu zlum pa'i sted du yang dag par bzhag gyu yang me tog la phyogs pas mchod do// na

403a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ni snod kyi stengs su gro gsum pa'i shing bzhag la/ de'i gru la tshangs pa gnyis dang me'i snod dang mar ma gsum bzhag la sngon du g.yas pas/ yungs kar lus bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags

404a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du badz+ra d+h+r-i ka la sogs pa dang / oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hU ces pas dbang bskur ro// de nas dri zhom pa'i bdug pa la rus dag byas bdug ste/ ma
404a2(rgyud 'grel): long gi chu dag par bya'o// dri zhim pa'i rjes kyis me long la mUN+Dal lnga'i mtshan ma byas te/ der me tog bzhag ste bzhag par bya'o// dril bu dang bdug spos thogs te/ sngon du brjod pa'i bdug pa dang /

405a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ldan ni bsting chos mdzad pa'i mchod rten brgyu pa'i chog bzhugaso//
405b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ tsa tu b+hI bi d+hI/ bod skad du/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshalo// gang gis sku gsum brnyes
405b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don mthar phyin pa// de la phyaga'i'atshal nas ni de nyid bsgrub bya'i sbyor// rang gis brtag pa gtsor byas lung kun tshul mi 'gal// rnal 'byor gzhung lugs mchod rten bshang bar bya// de la dang
405b3(rgyud 'grel): bor gnas dben pa yid du 'ong b+h+r-i ji skad bshad po'o swA snang ba lo sogos cho ga byas te/ der stegs po ji ltar mos pa byas la ba'i lci ba dang ldan dang gur gum la sogs pa nam
405b4(rgyud 'grel): chuchu spyad dul byas te/ me tog gi sil mya k+Sham/ nye 'khor sgros chus chag chag gong pa/ tha re dang 'phan lA sogs pa dag dang / rol mo'i rnam pa dag dang / gledugs dang rgyul m+b+had+hAn l+ya sogs pa
405b5(rgyud 'grel): dag dang / mchod pa'i bye brag rnams 'byor tshad bshams la bzhugs/ gzhan yang mchod rten nam tsha tsha'i yo byang skor phor dang / sku gdung dang / rtsa ba'i snying po 'am rten 'brel gyi snying po dang / gtsug
405b6(rgyud 'grel): tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs dang / 'bru mar ga bur la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos bsgyur ba dang / phag za dang gang gi don du bya ba'i ming dang / me tog la sogs te mchod pa lnga dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa
406a1(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang bshams te bzhag/ tsha tsha 'debs pa'i slob dpon la sogs pa kun kyang ji skad gsungs pa'i khrus dag byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgo ba dang rgyan gyis brgyan te/ shar dung nub gang bde ba
406a2(rgyud 'grel): bting ste/ sdig pa bshags dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang phyag bzhi pas phyag bya s+t+wa~M/ cho ga'i rim pa rang gi lugs bzhin byas la mnyam par bzhig nas rtag tu
406a3(rgyud 'grel): byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mchod rten gdab por bya'o// mchod rten gdab pa'i sa gar bsgo ba'i gnas der brtag cing byin gyis brlabs te/ bgegs bskrad pa dang / gtor ma byin te tshon skud kha sngags oM
406a4(rgyud 'grel): smr-i trA sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya ba dang / rdo rje'i skud par bsams la/ sa khyon tsa ran tsam cig tshon skud kyis bskor te/ seng ldeng ngam lcags phur byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa dang sngags bzlas te gdab bo// oM badz+ra kI li
406a5(rgyud 'grel): li ya sarba dur+m+ma hU~M phaT/ phur bu'i sngags de ldan bdun bzlas la dbus dang phyogs pa ning gdab bo// yungs kAr dang spos chu bsres la sngags bzlas la phyogs der gtor ro// bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags rgyu bya'o// de nas
406a6(rgyud 'grel): ci tsam 'dod pa'i sa de nas brko'o// sngags la oM badz+ra kha na kha nA ya hUM phaT ces brjod do// sa gzhi de nyid rin po cher gyur par bsam mo// de nas brkos te chog pa dang hUM bzhis phur bu thams cad bton la// oM ru ru s+phu ru
406b1(rgyud 'grel): dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA zhes lan brgya rtsa brgya bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu bkrus te bu gAr blugaso// sa blangs pa rnams kyang phyogs gcig tu snod gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ sa brdung ba'i tho
406b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tho ba la rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags/ oM badz+ra mud ga rA A ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT tsas brdung ngo // de nas 'jim pa smra ba'i tshe spos chus oM a mr-i te hUM phaT ces bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te byin gyis
406b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs la spos chu de a dkar po la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ de'i 'od zer gyis spos chu nyid khyab par 'khyil nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur bar bsams la sgra'o// sngags la oM badz+ra pra marda nA ya swA hA zhes paso//
406b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'jam pa de la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo phang bar bkan la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bos mnan te/ sor mo gsum nas re tsam phye ste bzhag po'i steng du lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo kha
406b5(rgyud 'grel): sbub la/ g.yon pa ltar byas te 'jim pa'i steng du bzhag la rig pa chen mo'i sngagaso// au suk+Sh+me suk+tha s+yAk+tha a nA ga te/ niri ku le nir baN sarba bud+d+ha yA nu ga te ya shro ba ti ya sho dzi ni d+har+m+ma d+ha tu gar+b+he/ d+har+m+ma rA dzA bA shi te/ sarba
406b6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la byin gyis brlabs pas de las mi shes kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can gyis don byas te slar bsdus pas 'dzom pa de nyid rin po ches
407a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i gong bu'i rang bzhinan du gyur par bsam/ de nas 'bri 'bi bya ba'i sngags la oM badz+rod b+ha b+h+ra swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas pas ye shes lnga'i 'od zer gyis sprin phyogs bcu mtha' yas
407a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'phros shing khengs te 'gro ba mang po'i don byas nas slar 'dus pa 'bi 'bi'i nang du zhugs te thim par gyur pas/ ye shes lnga rgyas te shelnga sgong dag pa ltar bsam mo// rang rang gi sa bon gyi sgang la stsogs
407a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rin po che'i gdan dang nyi zla dang pad+ma'i gdan khrir phyogs phyogasu gdan bshams la/ de rnams kyi dbus su sa bon gyi yi ge dang 'dzom pa'i yi ge sa rang rang gi sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs pa dang / ting 'dzin
407a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang ldan pa dang / rnal 'byor gsum gyi lus rdzogs pa phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rim pa bzhin du rang rang gi sgrub thabs las bstan pa ji bzhin du bya ste/ tsun gyi lde gus thig le zlum por byas
407a5(rgyud 'grel): la byin gyis brlab pa ni hUM dmar po las ye shes kyi me dpung rab tu 'bar bas de dag nyid du rab tu sbyangs te/ gzhi de yang rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsam mo// de nas re re'i gden du pad+ma
407a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab brgyad pa'i lteng oM dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo// de'i dbus su gong du bshad pa ltar lha re re nas rang gi rtog pa las 'byung ba ltar bzhugasu gsol te/ dam tshig sems par byas so//
407b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dbang du byas te/ sgrub par bya'o// bdag nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas snying gar zla ba'i dkyi
407b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsams la/ ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa sprin phung ltar mu 'byam
407b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'phro shing / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don mdzad cing byin gyis brlabs nas slar 'dus te/ dam tshig sems dpa' de nyid la thim par bsam mo// de nas mchod pa lnga la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag
407b4(rgyud 'grel): par mchod nas lha so so'i bskyod pa re re nAs byas la so so'i phrin las dang dam rgyugi sgo nas skyon lam gdab bo// de la 'di nyid kyi cho ga'i rim pA ni 'di yin te/ 'bri 'di nang du lha so so'i snying po/ oM ts+tsha dz+nyA d+hI a zhes bya
407b5(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa dang snying po grong ma gnyis bcug la/ sngags badz+ra d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he dz+wa laM swA hA zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes de de'i nang du zhugs par byasam mo// de nas skor phor du yungs
407b6(rgyud 'grel): mar ra til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags oM a ra dze bi ra dzaM swA hA/ zhes gsum brjod pas byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgos par bsam mo// de nas skor phor du gzhug po'i sngags oM badz+ra d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA zhes brjod pas thab
408a1(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyingasu bsam mo// de nas brdung ba ni oM badz+ra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM gong ma'i snying po gnyis kyang brjod la/ dbyung ba'i sngags a
408a2(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA ra te swA hA zhes brjod pas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi skur grub par bsnams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+har+m+ma kA ya ma hA su ka su ra ta sa ma
408a3(rgyud 'grel): yaMstaM/ de las gzug sku rnam pa gnyis byung bas 'gro ba'i don bsamA gyis mi khyab par bsams te/ oM sarba tA thA ga ta saM b+h+yo gA kA ya sa ma yas+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma Na kA yaM si ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dang por
408a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes smos te/ swa dang rdo dang shing dang gser dngul la sogs pa drag las sems can gyi rtsol bas bsgrubs te/ dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas pa de dag ni gzugs brnyan zhes
408a5(rgyud 'grel): gdags te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhung dag las chos kyi sku med na mkha' 'dra zhes 'byung ste/ brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin yang chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bros bu'i don gyis mchod rten gyi dbyings lta bur grub pas
408a6(rgyud 'grel): des na chos kyi skur ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa de la chos kyi sku zhes 'dod do// de bas na 'di ltar snang ba ni gzugs brnyan yin par shes par bya'o// yang na gzugs 'di ltar grub pa ni
408b1(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum gyi tshul yin te/ rmang dge ba bcu dang / bang rim dang po nas kha khyer gyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / srog shing shes pa bcu'i bar du rgya'i chos bsod nams kyi
408b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yin te sprul pa'i sku yin pa dang / 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu dang / ma 'dris pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / char khabs thugs rje chen po dang / zla tshes byang chub kyi sems rnam
408b3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa dang / me long ye shes bzhi dang / tog mngon par shes pa drug dang / dar gyi cod pan dang / gdugs kyi chos kyi skur mnga' gsol te/ chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa dang / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan
408b4(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyan chen po ste/ na mkha' lding gi khams byung ba ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ye shes kyi shugs mnga' ba dang / ba dan chos kyi grags pa chen po dang / dril bu snyan
408b5(rgyud 'grel): pas phyogs bcur khyab pa dang / rdo rang mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa dang / tham skas bsrung ba med pa gsum ma ma/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ rnam par thar pa bzhi ste stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
408b6(rgyud 'grel): ma mdo pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pa'i lam mkhyen pa dang / dril bu tshangs pa'i dbyangs sam gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas de /
409a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bras bu'i chos ye shes kyi tshogs yin pas chos kyi skur bstan pa dang / a ma las rin po che'i phreng ba dang / gzhan yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis spras pa mdzes pa dang blta bas
409a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga mi shes pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ de dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos te/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs
409a3(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi la bstan pa'i chos shin tu rgya che'o// de bas na 'di ni sku gsum gyi dam tshig sems dpar byas la dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dam/ dkyil 'khor gang la mos pa'i lha rnams sku
409a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum brnyes pa 'am/ ldan pa de dag gyi sku gsum ye shes kyi sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nas stan drangs te bstim nas bsgrub pa ni lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya gong du bstan pa'i sku gsum gyi
409a5(rgyud 'grel): snying pos bya'o// srog shing gi sngags la oM badz+ra a yu She swA hA/ sems can thams cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par gyur cig/ bdo bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring du mi nub par gyur cig/ sems can
409a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la 'jug par gyur cig/ 'khor lo'i sngags la oM pra marda na ye swA hA/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma wu/
409b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum thob par gyur cig/ rnam par thar pa brgyad thob par gyur cig/ ye shes bzhi dang ldan par gyur cig/ dar gyi cod pan gyi sngags la oM pa kaM ba la swA hA/ sems can thams
409b2(rgyud 'grel): cad dus dang rnam pa thams cad du dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyi rnam pa mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dri dag gi mchod rten dang sku gzugs dang gsung rab la sogs pa
409b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa la mchod pa byed par gyur cig/ ba dan gyi sngags la oM pra te ka swA hA/ sems can thams cad chos kyi grags pa snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sngags la
409b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ku bI ra d+h+wa dza swA hA/ sasems can thams cad 'khor ba mo spong ba'i bdud bzhi las rgyal zhing chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig/ gdugs kyi sngags la oM pA ma na ya swAhU~M// sems can thams cad bla na
409b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i skyabs dang ldan+d+ha zhing chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur cig/ me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags la/ oM rat+na ma le tra~M zhes bya ba 'am/ nA maHshra ya d+ha nu ga ta pra dISh+Tha ta/ puSh+pe ke ta bA tA thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sam+b+haka sa ma
409b6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+hA ya/ tod+ya thA/ oM puSh+pe swA hA/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan te blta bas tshig mi shes pa phun sum tshogs pa thob pa ra cig/ gdan dbul ba'i sngags la oM su na da ri dzi yai swAhA/
410a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad gdan gyi khyad par stobs bcu dang ldan la glang po che'i gdan dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa sing+ge'i gdan dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa rda'i gdan dang /
410a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bcu dang ldan pa rma bya'i gdan dang / thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shugs dang ldan pa'i na mkha' lding gi gdan dang / dgos 'dod ra ba yid bzhin du byung ba rin po che'i gdan dang / chags pa'i skyon gyi
410a3(rgyud 'grel): mgos po pad+ma'i gdan dang / thams cad du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan thob par gyur cig/ de nas mchod rten kha nA bza' gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba bI shud+d+ho d+harmA
410a4(rgyud 'grel): tAM swA hA// gzhi la yas khang du gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags la oM d+ha ra d+hA ra kA TA ga ra ye swA hA// bzhugasu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ zhes brjod byas/ rin po che'i gzhil med khong chos
410a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bsams/ de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mi'i phyag rgya bcings la dbur bzhag ste dbang bskur bar bya'o// sngags la oM badz+ra d+hA tu A d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ de lhur dbang
410a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur pos de'i ngo bo nyid du brtan par gyur pa yi no// de ltar mchod rten gdab pa yang sngar bshid pa lta ro rim pa bzhin bya ste/ dang por mnyam par bzhag s+ho/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyod nas
410b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mtha' dag dang gang gis don du bya ba de la byams pa dang snying rje 'di skad brjod par bya'o// ngo mtshar chen po grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la dgongs su
410b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ngo // bdud la sogs pa phas kyis rgol ba bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad pham par bgyi'o// mtsham sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal bar bgyi/
410b3(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal gyi ri bo brnyil bar bgyi'o// skye ba'i ljon shing rtsa nas bcad do// 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlag go/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar bgyi'o// ma dad pa dang phyi rol pa dag dang lta ba phyin ci log pa dag yang
410b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i lta ba la gzung cing dad par bgyi'o// las kyi chu bo zlog par bgyi'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho bskam par bgyi'o// chos kyi sgrol ma rab tu spar bar bar bgyi'o// byang chub kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// bzod pa dang des
410b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la gzung bar bgyi'o// bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to// 'dod chags kyi me dpung zhi bar bgyi'o// zhe sdang gI mtshon rnon po bcil bar bgyi'o// bde po la gzung ngo // phrag gi chub ma zhi bar bgyi'o// ser sna'i
410b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dud pa dgrol bar bgyi'o// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// 'jigs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'jug cing gnas par bgyi'o// de bas na bdag la las kyi dngos grub mchog stsal
411a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ snang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas gong du bshad pa ji bzhin du byas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la stsogs pa dag dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas te/
411a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin du so so'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang / sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga'i go rim ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// yang na ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten rang bzhin gyis dag cing gsal ba de dag gi
411a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i dbus su gong du smos pa'i snying po gang yang rung ba bcug la dri dag las ye shes kyo 'od zer grongs med pa 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra grangs med pa'i srin pung gis na mkha' mtha' kla
411a4(rgyud 'grel): shing chos kyi dbyings mu re thug par brgyan cing klas par gyur nas 'jig rten thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus de nyid kyi dbu'i spyi btsug dang
411a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar thims pas sgrub par bya ba de'i las la nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par bsam la/ i sarba ta gaM thA ga ta k+Sho ye bAkr-it+tha
411a6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod do// sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bya ba 'am/ phyag rgya bzhis brtan par byas te/ dung por gyi nang du dro spos sna tshogs dang 'bras yos dang 'o mar ldan pa'i
411b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon gsol te/ arga'i phyag rgya'i steng du dud phor bzhag la yon chab kyi nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis yon chab nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/ so so'i
411b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi snying po bzlas lA dbul lo// oM a mr-i ta ar+g+haM d+hU pe pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes lan gsum spyi bor bzhag ste sbreng ngo // 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig/ phyag rgya rgya mtsho'i sprin nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug tu gr-i ste ye
411b3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi 'od zer 'dus pa'i sku nang du thim zhing phun sum tshigs pa'i dbang bskur bar bskum mo// de nas mchod pa lnga dang mchod pa nyi shu dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyi mchod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad
411b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sbyang zhing dag par bya ba'i sngags/ oM sarba pU dza a yu Sha swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM las byung ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyang sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas te dbulo// de nas rdo d+ha dang dril bu blangs la bstod pa bya'o// 'gro ba
411b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud lnga'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gyis gzir 'gro gzigs nas// thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems can smin
411b6(rgyud 'grel): cotso grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir// sems can khams na bzhugs shing spyod gyur kyang // chags pas mi gos pad+ma ltar dag pa// 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyed la 'dud// sems can bkres pa chos kyis phongs gyur
412a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// ma rig thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams// 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshom mdzad pa// ye shes sgron ma khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la// thugs rjes thabs
412a2(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab grur zhugs nas// zhi ba rin chen mtsho grong skyil mdzad pa// kun gyi deng dpon khyed la rnam par 'dud// sems can las kyi chu bos 'das pa rnams// dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad cing // 'phags
412a3(rgyud 'grel): lam yan lag brgyad la sbyor mdzad pa// gsung gis mnga' bdag khyad la phyag 'tshalo// de nas sgo lam cha cher gdab bo// bdag cag gis che ge'i don du chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs gsol te/ mchod cing bstod de
412a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i mtshams sbyor ba'i bag chags thams cad rtsa nas bcad de sku gsum yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ mchod rten
412a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig byas pas kyang che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshe rab byeng bar bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad byung bar gyur cig/ la sogs pa smon lam gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bya'o// de ltar mched can
412a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i rtags gsungs pa// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam// dri dang dud pa 'od kyang rung // snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam// lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs
412b1(rgyud 'grel): bar snang sbyang gyur tam// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang // me tog la sogs 'bab pa dang // dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra// dril bu pi wa nga la sogs rnams// ci sde mtshan ma de dag ni// sdig
412b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blos ni ma mthong na// 'bum gyi phrag ni brgya snying ngam// ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas pa bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas
412b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang // mtshan gcig mi nyal thog mar bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid du nges par mthong zhes smos so// mchod rten cho ga bdag gis cung zad tsam// byas la bsod nams rnam pa ci yod
412b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ des ni 'gro kun skye shi rgyun bcad ngo // b+hU mang sku gsum rdzogs te sangs rgyas shog// bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs las// mchod rten sgrub
412b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang sdebs te/ slob dpo na zhi ba'i snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
413a1(rgyud 'grel): // dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa'i mi 'khrugs pa'i rtsub thabs bzhugs
413b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ ak+Sho b+h+yaHsA d+ha nAM nA maH/ bod skad du/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ de yi sgrub thabs
413b2(rgyud 'grel): byi bar bya// dal 'byor thag chen rigs can dang // snying rje shes rab yon tron can// byams dang snying rje ldan pa dang // dad tsang bla ma le gus pas// skyabasu song zhing sems bskyed pa// dam tshig sdom ldan dpyad thob pas// las dang
413b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga shos nAs ni// dgon pa'i gnas dang grong gi mthar// las bya ba de ba'i stan 'dug nas// khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis// rang lhar gsol ba'i thugs ka ru// pad+mo zla da'i steng du hUM// dwe las 'od zer 'phros pa yis//
413b4(rgyud 'grel): tha ma dang ni myi brgyud pa// spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la// ng+kan+d+ha po rnam par dag par bya// tshad myed bzhi dang ldan par bsgom// chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa// sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni// b+h+rUM dang
413b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs bsgom// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// rang gi sa bon dbus bsams nas// dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dag/ bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du sbyar// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgrub par bya// lho yi rnal 'byor tshul du
413b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// g.yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje dang // g.yas pa sa gnon tshul can no// rgyan dang ldan par rang nyid bsgom// thugs kar pad TI'i steng du mi/ ji stang rang gi sa bon dang // phyag mtshan
414a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas byin gyis brlug/ rang nyid mi 'khrugs par bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas bzhi po phyogs dang bstun// rang rang phyag rgya ldan par sgom// hUM las 'od 'phros pad+ma yi// 'dab ma brgyad la lha
414a2(rgyud 'grel): mo brgyad // phyag mtshan brgyad las sku bskrang ngo // rtsa sngags brgyad po brjod pa la// dri za'i phyogasu pad+ma can// sku mdog dkar mo dpal be'u bsnamos// mi yi phyogasu 'jigs byed ma// sku mdog dkar mo 'khor lo bsnams//
414a3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i phyogasu rnam rgyal ma// sku mdog sngon mo rgyal mtshan bsnams// bden bral phyogasu mdangs ldan ma// sku mdog sngon mo gdugs bsnams pa// klu yi phyogs su 'od ldan ma// sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma bsnams// ru
414a4(rgyud 'grel): gi phyogasu dkar sham ma// sku mdog dmar skye bum pa bsnams// gnod sbyin phyogasu dri meng pa// sku mdog ljang gu 'bud dud bsnams// dbang ldan phyogasu yod gzhungs ma// sku mdog ljang gu nye bsnams pa'o// sgom ban/
414a5(rgyud 'grel): po 'dod lha ste// phyogs dang bstun zhing phyogs bskyong dang // gzhal yas rim par bsgoms par bya// de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed de// thugs ka'i rdo rje'i hUM lus ni// 'og min gnas su 'od 'phos pas// mi 'khrugs mang nu nam/
414a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor bsam// rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgom snyim la// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// lha yi go ri mo ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bsgyur ro// yang na rang nyid lhur bsgoms la// mi 'khrugs mdun du bsgom
414b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// gzungs bgrang ba yi ting 'dzin ni// thugs las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// de nyid sum brtseg rang rang gzhan// lha dang bum pa mchod rten gtor// bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang // rgya mtsho zla ba pad+ma la// lha bskyed
414b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bstim par bya// dang pa dang ni dam tshig gis// bdag la rab tu dgos par mdzod// oM ak+Sho b+hu dza A bidz+nyAn ta kr-it+taM hUM phaTaH/ thal sbyar sor gnyis phyir bkyed de// ta thA ga tod+b+ha b+hA ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHde nyid gdan la
414b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa la// mchod bstod la sogs dbul bya ste// oM ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha puSh+pe/ d+hu pe/ A lo ke/ gan+d+he/ nai bi d+yA/ shaMb+da/ ba li te/ pu tsa khA hi khA hi/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // thugs rjes rtag tu mya ngan
414b4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' zhing // phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// gtor ma mgron du dmigs la bsngo// sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol// yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa
414b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ rang don bsnyen pa yin// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o// dngos grub sgrub pa'i bzlas pa ni// ngag dang shub bu rdo rje'i bzlas// yid kyi bzlas pa byas pa bzhin// ma dang sgra mthar gsum// brjod pa med pa'i bsam
414b6(rgyud 'grel): gtan te// thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa bya// gtong na mchod bstod gtor ma gtang // ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu// de ltar thun gsum sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa sngom du song ba dang // gang 'dod dngos grub bab
415a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// nga nas las la sbyar bar bya// bzlas brjod ma la tshul khrims rlung gI stAr// brtson 'grus chan zar mAM lces sdig sgrib sreg/ pad+ma'i drong la rgyur rmA yi// kha zam 'od kyis 'byed pa dang / nyam/
415a2(rgyud 'grel): shel ma 'byung zhing // maM y+r-i lus la dngos grub ster// mi gnas bsod nams ster bar byang // sgra yis thar pa ster bar byed// 'di ni yod bzhin nor bu r-in tshon wArA// spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur bar 'os// ngan
415a3(rgyud 'grel): song rnams la thar lam 'dis sgrub bo// rang gzhan mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub stararo// mgon po mi 'khrugs pa yis ni// sgrub pa'i thabs mchog 'di bris pa'i// bdag gi dge ba'i las 'di yis// bdag dang 'gro

416a1(rgyud 'grel): ra Na bi sho d+ha ni maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ lus kyi slob pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// bden par gsung

416b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mtshams skyong ba dang // 'dod pa'i lha rnams bri bar bya// so so'i sngags kyi rim pa bzhin// de nas spyan yang drang bar bya// bdag po rnams kyi snying po yis// de yi 'og tu mchod par bya// bum pa gang ba de

418b6(rgyud 'grel): nang // rgya mtsho pad+ma zla ba la// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'dir// bdag gi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang // mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad// oM big+h+nAn ta kr-id hUM phaT/
419a1(rgyud 'grel): thal sgyur sor mo gnyis phyir bkyed// ta tha ga tod+b+ha thA ya swAhA/ dzats+tsha baM hoHde nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la// mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa b+ha// sgra dang sems dang gzhi lha gzhol// yan lad/
419a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum// gzhan don bsnyen pa byed ni// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o// dngos grub sgrub rgyu'i bzlas pa ni// ngag dang shub bu rdo rje bzlas// yid kyi bzlas brjod bcas pa bzhi// me dang sgra dang sgra
419a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' gsum// brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te// thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa dang // gtong na mchod dang gtor ma gtang // ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu// me gnas bsod nams ster bar byed// sgyu mtha'
419a4(rgyud 'grel): thar pa ster bar bya// bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa byon nas zhes pas rang lhar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bzlas pa dang / bsgom pa byas pas dngos grub
419a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar gyur pa'o// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang / thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi mda' zhing // phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa l-i phyag 'tshal bstod//
419a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod ma la tshul khrims rlung gis spar// brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg/ nyi ma ma shel zhugs la me 'byung ltar// mi yi lus la dngos grub stsol bar mdzad// 'di ni yid bzhin nor bu rin
419b1(rgyud 'grel): rkyen lhur// spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur bar 'os// ngan song rnam sel thar lam 'dis 'grub bo// rang gzhan mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ste// mgon po mi 'khrugs pa sgrub paSh+Ti thabs// sgyob
419b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon dzi tA ri sa mdzad pa rdzogs// / bla ma gnyan gnyen gyis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pA la phyag 'tshalo// skrad po dam tshig ldan pa yis//
419b3(rgyud 'grel): dgon pa khyim grong mtha' la sogs par// khrus byas gtsang mar byas pa yis// las byas bde ba'i sten lnga 'dug/ rang lhur gsal ba'i thugs ka ru// pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM// de ltas 'od zer 'phros pa yis//
419b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa// spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la// bdun po rnam par dag pa bya// tshad med bzhi dang ldan par ni// chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni// a
419b5(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// rang gi sa bon de dbus su// bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya bcul// de nas rang gi sa bon dang // phyag mtshan phyag rgya de byin brlab// de rnams gyur pas mi 'khrugs po// zhal gcig
419b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// g.yon pa bang bzhag rdo rje dang // g.yas pas sa gnon tshul can bsgom// lhag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms la ni/
420a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsam// rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms la bstim// thugs ka'i pad zla'i hUM las ni// dbus su mi bskyod pa nyid bsgom// phyogs bzhir sangs
420a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bzhi bsgom bya// mchod dang bstod pa bzlas par bya// sgra dang snrums dang gzhi la gzhol// yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum// gzhan dang ring don bstan pa ni// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o// /
420a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bzlas po'i rim pa ni// ngag dang shub bu rdo rje bzlas// yid de brjod dang bcas pa bzhi// me dang sgra dang sgra mthar gsum// thun gsum dag tu bzlas par bya// gnyis ni mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin//
420a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar thun gsum sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa sngon du rab song bas// gang 'dod dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir// de ni las lo sbyar bar bya// pad+mo'i 'od la chur chu yis// kha zum 'od kyis 'byed pa yis// nyi ma mi
420a5(rgyud 'grel): shal mo 'byung bzhin// mi yi lus la dngos grub ster// bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten ni myur du sangs rgyas shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston byed cing // sems can
420a6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal gzir las sgrol bar shog/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi b+hi/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'dra/
420b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin sreg chen po'i rim pa ni// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni// thabs khung zlum po khru dro bya// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bri// yang na ma bris pa yang rung // bud shing //

425b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gshibs te mdzub mo gnyis bkug lo pad+ma lta bu dang / badz+ra d+hirma dr-i sh+ya zhes bya ba 'dis blta bar bya'o// ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas// rang gi lus la rab tu bsgo mo// yong dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
426a1(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod pas rang gi lus la dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas// rgyab tu zla ba drug nas ni// sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod// drer bdag
426a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i lus su bsgom// badz+ra d+harma zhes bya ba'i snying po dang / oM badz+ra d+harma hrIHzhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o// de nas lce la rdo rje bsam la sarba kA ri zhes chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya'o// de nas snying gar
426a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la rdo rje sna tshogs bsams la// las kyi phyag rgyu tsa bar bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gar byas nas/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du
426a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsams la sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dang / gzhugs tshul la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo// dam tshig
426a5(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya bcing ba l-i ni su ra tA s+t+waM zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod de/ yid kyis legs par sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad gzhugs par bya//
426a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas sbyor ba 'dis de rnams kyis rang gi dam tshig dong // chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ badz+ra d+ha tu dr-i sh+ya rU baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma yos
426b1(rgyud 'grel): a haM zhes brjod do// de nas badz+ra d+hA tu/ zhes ldan gsum brjod la/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo gI shA ra hUM zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags lan gsum brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du mi bskyod pa
426b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'odri dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad tsas brjod do// badz+ra d+he tu dr-i sh+ya dziHhUM baM hoHsa ma yA staM sa ma ya stu a haM zhes bya ba dang / badz+ra d+hA tu zhes bya bo spyi
426b3(rgyud 'grel): snyi po lan gsum brjid par bya zhing / oM badz+ra swatwA hUM zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i snying po dang / oM badz+ra rat+na traM zhes bya ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi snying po dang / oM badz+ra d+harma hrIHzhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po dang /
426b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra karma a zhes bya ba don yod grub pa'i snying po yang lan gosum brjod par bya'o// de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje bsnams pa dam byas la// gung mo myu gu wAr mnyam bsgrung / gung mo nang du
426b5(rgyud 'grel): gshibs pa ni/ sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad// gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang / bung mo pad+mo 'dra bar dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni/ de bzhin mdzub gnyis bkug pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi
426b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcing ba la ni/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ badz+ra dz+nyA na zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya yi no// snga ma bzhin du
427a1(rgyud 'grel): ljags la rdo rje bsams la sbyar ro// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni// rdo rje khu tshur ngam bcings te/ mnyam par bzhag sa gnyis su dbye// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// de nas bcing bar rab tu
427a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni// g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yi sau reg pa// rin tshon gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o// tshe dpal mang po'i
427a3(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za ba'i myi 'jigs sbyin// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni snying kAr sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni sku mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil
427a4(rgyud 'grel): klung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse mo lnga po bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' bag/ dar la'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs myanabus pa rin po che'i cod pan+ya dang / dar dbyangs kyis dbang de skar po dang

427b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa'o// de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yi no// mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa'i gnas ni//
427b2(rgyud 'grel): snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams yino// de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya dang / satwa badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes bya bas snying gar byin gyis brlabs la/ snying gi'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs
427b3(rgyud 'grel): de bsam par bya'o// rdo rje rIn tshan ma'i phyag rgya dang / rat+na badz+rI A d+hi tISh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes bya bas rdo rje rin chen ma ni dbang bskur ba'i gan su rdo rje rin po che'i rnam par ro// rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya dang / d+har+m+ma badz+ri a d+hi tiSh+Tha
427b4(rgyud 'grel): swa mAM/ zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje chos man+ti lkog ma'i phyogasu rdo rje pad+ma'i rnam par ro// rdo rjes las ma'i phyag rgya dang / karma badz+ra a ti tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes bya bas rdo rje las ma nI spyi bo sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyug rgyu dang
427b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan par bskyod par bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra d+harma sa ma ya/ ma nu bA la yA/ badz+ra d+harma ya tI no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+hau ga/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ga a nu rak+to me b+ha ba~M/ su po Sh+yo me b+hA/ sarba sid+d+him+me ba lats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsi me/ tsat+ti
427b6(rgyud 'grel): yaHku ru n+tu/ ha ha ha he hoHb+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA mi muny+tsa/ badz+rI b+ha ga ma ha sa ma ya satwa AHzhes bya ba yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas pas brtan por bya'o// de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'kho
428a1(rgyud 'grel): sprul la/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de nyid kyi gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blangs te/ sa ma ya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor

428a3(rgyud 'grel): satwa swa yan te tsik+Shu ga Ta na/ tad pa ra ud g+ha TaM ya tAM sarba k+Sho/ badz+ra tsakU ra nuta tA ro// he badz+ra pa sh+yaM zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o//

429a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o// rdo rjes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba// yang rdo rje de rang gi mgo la bzhag la/ oM badz+ra satwa tAM a d+hiriny+tsa mi badz+rA nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ che ge mu~M zhes bya ba

429a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs brten// oM sarba tathA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma yA tiSh+Tha I Sha tAM d+ha r-i yA mai badz+ra swatwA hi hiM hI hi hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o// oM badz+ra dra tra su saMrba ha / dz+ra rat+na ya nung tA \u0f7f/ badz+ra d+harma g+ha ya na paH
429a4(rgyud 'grel): kar+m+ma rod b+ha gaM zhes bya ba de glur blang zhing / re re zhing rdo rje'i ga ra~M t+yais la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyi las kyi phyag rgyas yang dag par mchod de/ laka pa g.yon pas rdol du blings la/ g.yas pas

430a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i myos pa byas la/ oM sarba sA mo hUM zhes bya ba 'dis bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gis lha'i ngo bo nyid du bsams la/ tsa srang
430a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon par gyur pa de srid du thun bzhir rim pas bsgom par bya'o// bsgom pas skyo na snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la kun nas 'khor ba'i tshul du/ yid kyis bzlas pa'i sngags bris la// bsam gtan gyis

430a4(rgyud 'grel): denas phyug rgya chen po 'am skyugs gtong 'dod na yi ge bar+m+ma b+ha rdo rje'i tshig ma yid kyi bzla'o// de nas ye shes sems dpa'i yid kyim mdun du byazlugs par bsams la/ ma tog la sogs pa dang /

432a4(rgyud 'grel): ra 'gyur// ral gri spu gri nags tshal gtams pa yis// lcags bsregs sa gzhi rdo rjer des shes pas// phyogs 'di nas ni myur du 'bros par 'gyur// bcom ldan mgon po 'jig rten phan phyir gshegs// ngas ni gnas
432a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di dag kun bsrungs pas// gnod byung bgegs kun 'di nA ma gnas shig/ hUM hUM hUM na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM sarba ta thA ga te/ a nu gA te/ ban+d+ha si ni/ ma hA sa mA ya nir dz+nyA te/ s+pha ra Ni/ a pra ti hi tA/ ka TA ka Ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
432a6(rgyud 'grel): da shi ti sha na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a nu gan taM/ pra ba d+harma la ma ta bi dzA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti ku ru bo ku la/ le lu pu raM swA hA/ de yis bdud srin rod rod bor// rigs lnga'i 'phra men g.yog bcas kun// ci bgyi zhes su brjod pa dang /
432b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyis bgegs bskrad tshar gcod dang // las kyi bdug pos grogs bya'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mngag gzhug pho nya'i las mdzad pa// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// bgegs kyi sbyor ba rgyun chod cig na mo
432b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra rat+na tra yA ya/ na mish+tsar+N+Na badz+ra prA NA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha saM na pa ta ya/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA daSh+To Tu Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hAstA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ai a mr-i te/ kun+da li/ kha kha/ khA hI khA hi khI hi/ tiSh+ma tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha//
432b3(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gardza gardza gerdza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn ma hA ga na pa tiM/ dzi bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ de bzhin du swa dang oM dang hAs bsgyur te/ rat+na pad+ma ka/
432b4(rgyud 'grel): mas mtshams bcad do// bsrung ba'i las dag bya ba yang // de bzhin stegs bu brtsigs nas su// lugs ma'i phyag rgya 'am 'drag gnas te// rgyan ldan daM yis bdag gzhan srung // srung chen mo dang phyag rgya lnga// brtan rgyal
432b5(rgyud 'grel): brjid legs bde bar gnas// badz+ra bzhi yis bsrung bar bya// sa rnams gzhan gyis mya gtses dang // 'bab chu rgya mtshor ma gyur la// nyi zla'i mig dang yig 'bru'i tshogs// sbyang zhing sbal ba'i las bya'o// kun rdzob don dam gnyis su
432b6(rgyud 'grel): brtag/ gleng bzhi rgyu dang bsnyen pa dang // nges pa'i tshig dang byang chub sems// sta gon gnas dang phan yon rnams// mdor bsdus yan lag bdun bshad rigs// ci don gang la gang zhus bshad// chos rnams don bsgrubs bstod
433a1(rgyud 'grel): gleng bzhi'o// ngo mtshur don zhus bshad thos langs// dran pa dang skyes gleng bzhi rgyu// mtshan ma dus dang grangs la brtson// thub la ma reg bsnyen pa'o// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan gsum// sngag
433a2(rgyud 'grel): dang de don maN+Dal te// dga' ba chen po de nges tshig/ byang chub mchog gi sems ldan po skyed// sbyangs pa don dam kun rdzob bo// lha dang mi dang yo byad gsum// ting 'dzin nan tana? sta gon bya// lha rnams sta gonA rje gnas ti//
433a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa mi rnams sta gon no// tha ma yo byad sta gon bya// rim pa de yi las rnams 'grubo// dkyil 'khor dag la las kyi skal yod gang // de bzhin gshegs dang 'khor gyi lha rnams dag/ sgrub pa'i don phyir lhag par
433a4(rgyud 'grel): sngar mchod la// dri zhim maN+Dal gsol btab sta gon gnas// rtse gcig dul ba'i sems ldan slob ma rnams// chos gtam rim pas shin tu dbugs phyung ste// ku shu tshems shing phyag rgya mchog rnams dang // dag pa'i chus
433a5(rgyud 'grel): rig gtsang byas sta gon gnas// ston pa rdo rje gdan dag la// nam gshegs zhes ni brgya byin zhus// ku sha phul dang dbang ldan gyis// tshod 'dzin gzhung ces de bzhino// phyag na rdo rjes ston pa la// bil ba phul nas u du dang //

433b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal// khro bo bcu yis srung skud brlab// oM badz+rA a mr-i ta kudz+ha laM b+han+d+ha rak+Sha haM/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i go char ldan// 'jig rten 'di 'am 'di nas gzhan// yod med ming nas bos nas bri// 'phan dang nor bu gdugs ldan

434a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung tshig dbang lha mos brlabs// oM badz+ra ha sa pa sha traM hri/ maM ga la tiSh+Tha hUM/ ngag gi nyes bzhi dag par byed// srung ba chen po chen mos brlab// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha rak+Sha haM/ badz+ra ka pa tsa man du lus kyi

439a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bzhi'i hom ldan bya// yang ni ting 'dzin bye brag las// las bzhi'i cho ga rdzogs po mchog/ cho ga mo tshang las mi 'grub// de phyir sta gon rdzogs par bya// A dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin// ston pa po ni shin tu yang/
439a3(rgyud 'grel): de bas kyang ni 'jig rten du// 'byung ba yang nau shin tu dkon// dam pa'i chos kyang ston pa dka'// dam pa'i chos ni ston srid kyang // gsang sngags ston pa shin tu dka'o// gal te gsang sngags ston kyang rung //
439a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug pa dka'// bskal par yang ni sngags spyad pa'i// las dbang gis ni ding mthong bas// rgyal po yang ni ma yin yang // rgyal po nyid ni chen por gyur// bde gshegs rnams ni thams
439a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// yon tan gyis ni mchog kyang mthong // tshe ring zhing nI longs spyod kyang // phun sum nyid ni tshogs par 'gyur// las rnams kun ni thams cod kyang // btang snyoms pa naM yan lag go/ dkyil 'khor bri
439a6(rgyud 'grel): las ngag dang // cho 'phrul bzhi yi che ba dang // gang zhig dkyil 'khor nang gzhug pa// gsum po de ni gzhan don gsungs// dang po las gsungs rim pa ni// tshes grangs chos klog bzhi dag dang // srad bu tshad
439b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan bgegs bsal bsrung // thugs dam bskul g.yog dbang bskur sbyang // rang bzhin sa thig skur+ya bAn+d+ha dang // tshon bgyi phyag rgya rgyun rnams dgod// gasmAm+b+ha lnga bdun dang bcu gtsag+na dung // bcu gsum
439b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga yar gyi shis// zhi dang rgyas pa mchog tu bshad// bcu bdun nyi shu gnyis brgyad do// dbang dang drag po'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ dus dang mtshan ma kri ya'o// nyi ma dge zhing rgyu skar bzang // mtshan ma'i sems rtogs mi dmigs
439b3(rgyud 'grel): pa// de ni chos dbyings gnas pa yin// de ltar dus dang mthun pa dang // phyogs bzhir dag snyan gtsang sbra can// sha dang chad bcad bud med spangs// tshul du shis pas rgyun mi bcad// shar du sdud pa tshigasu bcad // lhor ni
439b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po spyod pa'o// nub tu snang brgyad gsang ba'i mdo// byang du gser 'od dam pa gdon// gus par mchod cing bden pa bklag/ tshon sna lnga skud bu mos bkal// de nyid kyis ni brgyar bzlas te// rgyu bzang chad la phebs pa dang //
439b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i lho stangs sbyor nas ni// mkhas byas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po// lag na rdo rjes bgegs bskrad bye// bsrung ba chen mos bdag gzhan bsrung // phyogs bcu gtso la sogs pa yi// thugs dem skul nAs srad bur thim//
439b6(rgyud 'grel): dede lta'i rigs bzhi'i thugs las byung // gtso bo gang yin thugs zhugs phyung // de nas gtso bo gang yin gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams sbyang pa dang // myur du sems can don bsgrub dang // las kyi dngos po gang byed pa'i// las rnams ma
440a1(rgyud 'grel): lus khyod kyis byos// las kyi rdo rje don yod grub// kha dog sna tshogs byung ba la// oM AHhUM swA hA// karma zhes ni dbang bsku ro// bdag nyid shar lho mtshams 'greng ste// sngags g.yog byang shar mtsham su ni//
440a2(rgyud 'grel): bus btsugs thal sbyar 'dug pa yis// dkyil 'khor gang bzhengs lus rnams ni// gang bzhengs gtso bo'i bka' bzhin du// las kyi byeng por bdag gyur pas// thams cad ma lus bdag gis bgyi// de nas thub dbang
440a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur byas nas// de nas sbyangs par bya ba ni// bdag po gang yin ting 'dzin las// yam kyase phrag dog gtor lung dkyil// de na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// 'od 'phros dngos po'i mtshan ma bsregs// bdag nyid yi ge khar
440a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur gau tso// mnga' bdag do yi byin rlabs chu// rgyun gyi khams dag de nyid rang // de yi byin brlabs yon tan bcu// de mthu las byad las rnams 'grub// mkhas pas thig btab tsa thI'i dmig/ lha mos gshegs
440a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul skud la thim// hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// lte ba'i thad kar thal bkan la// g.yas pa bkan bzhag mtheb ngos sbyar// de nas sgrub mdog na mkhar gdab// lan cig gnyis sum btab po'i mthus// rang bzhin byon
440a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ting 'dzin gsal// ngan song gsum bde zhus bshad bstod// mchog gsum lha tshogs mchod phyag 'tshal// oM bru~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pa rang bzhin thig gdab bya// bdag nyid shar lho mtshan
440b1(rgyud 'grel): song ste// las bdag byang shar mtshams 'dug ste// de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// dam tshig bskul dang las bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tri mA ti krA ma hUM/ tshad ldan sngags g.yog med phur mchog/ sems can don
440b2(rgyud 'grel): byas bdag nyid kyi// slar yang thugs kar bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra saM ha ra Na hUM hUM hUM// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phyin las rigs lnga ya// gtso bo gang yin de nyid la// gsang gsum zhesu bsgrags pa'
440b3(rgyud 'grel): chog/ tshon ni dr-i dang pa tsan dang // rin chen phung po gsum du bstan// yon tan sgo 'dra las thugs bzhin// dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin// 'khor lo rdo rje ra pa ni// phye ma dkar pos nyis rim bri// las kyi lha las ma
440b4(rgyud 'grel): gtogs pa// phal pa dang ni bsrungs bkra shis// phye ma dkar po tshig rkyang bri// sgo yis tshon swA pany+tsa'o// gnyis pa tri la sgo gang brtsig/ brkyang bris phyag rgya dgod pa yang // gtso bo gzugs la 'khor phyag rgya// phal la
440b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yig 'bru'o// tha mal pa dag thig le'o// tshon la sogs pa'i las rnams kun// dbang ldan phyogs nas bya bar shis// dbang ldan 'dren pa'i lha dbang phyogs// tsher ni nad nas dgye bar bya// dri nas phyag rgya
440b6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu bum// dgod pa nyid du bya ba yin// gzungs thag slob dpon bzung ba shis// de 'og tshon rnams rim gyis bting // de nas phyag rgya 'am yig 'bru bzhag/ tha mar sgo yi tshon bkye nas// de 'og sgo yi phyag rgya dang //
441a1(rgyud 'grel): glang seng rnams kyang dgod par bya// maN+Dal thams cad byi dor ni// dang po ba lci de 'og tu// dri yi chus ni byug par bya// tshon bkye dus su thugs dam bskul// sems can khams ni zhi byed pa'i// 'di ni chos
441a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ro yin pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te// dA bas bdag gis bka' bzhin du// tshon 'gyed pa yi las bgyid na// rgyal ba kun byin dbang ba cig/ byug rgya dgod phyir thugs dam bskul// sku
441a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs rtags mtshan ma 'di// 'gro la phan phyir dgod do zhes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskar cige/ rgyan rnams dang po nor bu ste// dau la sogs pa dgod paR+Sha byA//
441a4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po ches// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// sngags rnams gong ma dre las ni// tISh+Tha dadz+r-i bsnun par ba ma rin tshon sna tshog rgyu las byas// kha dog dbyingasu ldan pa yi//
441a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab yum gyi bum pa 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rten gyi 'bras bu mtshan 'brel rtags// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pa/ thugs rjes gzung zag chen po yis// dkyil 'khor 'di lnga
441a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis rlobs// phrin las yon tan lhun grub pa'i// bla ro kun bzang dang nyid rtags// 'bras bu rtags kyi phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// sku yi phyag/
441b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshon mdzad tsang // mtshan dang dpe byang 'phan chen gyis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// nyon mongs gdud pa sel mdzad pa'i// gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan// skyabs chen byams pa chen po
441b2(rgyud 'grel): yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// nyon mongs bdud las rgyal mdzad pa'o// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rgyal mtshan te// rtags kyi rgyal mtshan chen po 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// phrin las cho
441b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul bzhi bzhi yis// las rnams rgya mtsho rdzogs mdzad pa'i// snyan po'i ba dan gsung sgrogs pas// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba'i rtags// kha dog sna lnga 'bar ba yi// lhab lhu
441b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga lnga chen po yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// thugs rjes gzungs thag ye shes bzhis// sangs rgyas bzhi yi phyin las thugs// thugs rjes srang bu 'phel gzungs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin
441b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlobs// tshad mang bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhis// 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs mdzad pa// dri zhim rta babs phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor 'dra la byin gyis rlobs// mgo rmongs 'khyams pa'i mun sel mdzad// gti mug
441b6(rgyud 'grel): go bral shes rab mangs// gting dbugs byang chub lam dgod pas// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlo bos// 'khor ba'i dra ba chags pa'i rgyu mo// mtha' gnyis gcod mdzad byams pa'i mgon// shes rab rtags rgya
442a1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'dri la byin gyis rlobs// khro gtum rngam pa'i tshul 'chang bas// log par lta ba'i zhe sdang 'dul// ye shes 'bar ba'i ki la yas// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin
442a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlobs// mtshan ma'i yul rnams sel mdzad cing // srong dang mtshams kyi las mdzad pa// 'gab 'khor srung ba chen po 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus pa'o//
442a3(rgyud 'grel): dpe byang rtags kyi do shal chu// yid 'ong me tog 'bar ba yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rtags// rin chen mchog gsum mtshan brjod pa'i// gsung dbyangs drug
442a4(rgyud 'grel): cu ldan du la 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// mtshan ma'i bag chags kun sel ba'i// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// rgyal chen bzhis phul mchod mchog gis// dkyil 'khor 'di
442a5(rgyud 'grel): la byin gyis rlobs// chos rnams gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yi// rang bzhin dag pas rtog pa med// ma rmongs ston pa'i me long 'dres// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas shing // 'jig rten
442a6(rgyud 'grel): kun dang rgan mjug rtags// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// gzhan yang mchod pa'i rgyan 'os dang // lha gshos phyogs kyis gtor ma yis// rgyu drug 'gro tshom byed mthu yis/
442b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// gnyis pa bdag zhugs cho 'phrul gyis// cho ba'i don thabs brtan pas 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin dang byin gyis rlabs// dbang bskur mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo// bdag nyid dang /
442b2(rgyud 'grel): bo rnal 'dug dang // ting 'dzin zhugs pa rnam gnyis// bdag shar sgor 'dug 'dzin pa la// ngam bca' dbang thob snying rje yis// thabs dang shos rab don byed par// 'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs la// oM AH
442b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA lnga yis// byin gyis brlabs la swas dbang bskur// phyag rgya'i go cha haM giswa bsgo// tu Sh+ya ho dang san+di tiSh+Tha dang // ya ta badz+ra satwa tiSh+Tha ta a haM baM// dgongs pas grub pa zhugs dang bskyed// de nas khro bos
442b4(rgyud 'grel): bgegs mtshams bcad// zhugs pasna de bzhin nyid kun snang // rgyu las 'byung ba rim lnga bskyod// de steng gzhal yas khang rgyun ldan// nang du gdan dag bskyed pa'i stang // 'khor lo yid 'ong gru chang dang // sgo dang
442b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo khang bya dang bcas// sems can pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan// ci rigs par nr-i ni mdzes par bya// de snying sems nyid dag pa yis// rgyu las chosu nyid mngon byang chub// de gzugs zla ba yig 'bru dang // phyag mtshan dang ni sku rdzogs
442b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'bras bu lnga dang bskyod pa lnga// ston pa'i cho 'phrul lnga rgyu lnga// chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang mngon byang chub// gzugs brnyan zla ba mi bskyod mngon byang chub// yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mngon byang chub// phyag mtshan snang //
443a1(rgyud 'grel): ba mtha' yas mngon byang chub// gzugs sku don yod grub pa mngon byang chub// snang ston sra brtan sdug byed dang // dgyes 'dzin shugs bskyod zad par lnga// na mkha' sa me chu rlung gi/ dwe yi byin darlangs//

443a3(rgyud 'grel): sor rtogasems bskyed// sku ni sgo lnga bya ba nan tan bskyang// rtag chad gzung 'dzin bdag gzhan bya ba grub// chos nyid rgyu los rnam snang mngon bstan pas// bsam gtan tshul te sangs rgyas rjes dran sku// oM tsit+ta

443b1(rgyud 'grel): mya'o// ma rig sel cing yang dag rig bskyed pa// gsung gI rang bzhin che ba'i byin brlabs te// gsang ba bsgrub pa'i mchog tu bsngags pas na// don gyi snying po spros med byang chub dbyings// phyag mtshan sngo/
