445a1(rgyud 'grel): don du bcing bar 'dod// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya gram dril bu dbab brtan bdag/ kun gyi chos bdag gyur pa yang // bran du yang ni gyur cing zhugs// dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+yA hI b+ha ga ban//
445a2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kA ru Ni tri sh+ye hoHsa ma yA dzAHhUM/ oM lA sogs pa'i lha rnams sngags// rting lA a ka dzas brgyan cing // so so re sku gsung thugs kyi lha// ma lus pa rnams spyan drang ngo // // mdor na 'jig rten khama?
445a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams su// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram 'khor lo bskor du gsol// mgon po thugs rje tshor ldan pa// thams cad kun mkhyen rgyud rig pas//
445a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad du gsol// gtor ma las rnams kun gyi mchog/ las kyi sna la bsten pa ni// shar du bstan pa bsrung ba la// lhor ni srid pa mnyam po yin// nub du klu
445a5(rgyud 'grel): gdug bzlog pa'o// byang nas las la gzhug pa'o// de nas so sor srung mtshams bcad// e h+ya his bos la las la gzhug/ byin gyis brlab byas mchod bstod cing // smon lam gdab cing slar gting gtang // lag pa'i
445a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcas nas ni// snying po 'jug lag gdags pa ni// badz+ra satwa sa ma yang karma// gdags shing dbyangs dang sbyar ba'o// thugs rtse phan pa'i dgongs pa can// ji ltar 'phrin las bcol ba bzhin// 'khor ba yun
445b1(rgyud 'grel): ri nga srid du// don rnams mdzad cing brtan byor nI// lag pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// snying po 'jug la gdags pa ni// hUM baM hoHsA mU ya s+t+waM sa mA ya ho/ sa ma ya twA tiSh+Tha badz+nyA A gan+d+ha dzaH/
445b2(rgyud 'grel): oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pa da ban+d+ha na kA ro mi// oM s+yArba ta thA go ta pU dza pA sha At+ma na nir+ya ta yA miHoM sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Ta sa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dzaM a b+hi Sha ka yai/ At+ma naM nair+ye ta yA min+ta.au/
445b3(rgyud 'grel): nA mAHsa sarba tathA ga ta badz+rA rat+na a b+hi Shi sh+tsama?/ sau nu maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA pU dza prA brta nA ya At+mA/ naM nir+yA tA yU mo/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra d+harma pra bar+t+ta ya mAM/ oM sarba tA thA ga ta pU dza karma NaM/ id+g+ha na nIr+yA tA stU m+b+hi/
445b4(rgyud 'grel): oM s+yAr+b+ba tA thA ga t+yA badz+rA karma ku rA nA~M// / de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni// dang blo sbyin sgrog la swA b+hazhi ste// de nas lhag pa'i mchod sgrubs gsol// de nas mthun mo mchod rnam lnga// de nas brjod pa'i mchod
445b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de ma chod sprin bye ba ba shing // daM kun dag yid gdungs dbyangs mchod// mchod pa'i drung po 'di yi no// de 'og rdzas kyi mchod pa lnga// sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog/ sgrub sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i g+ha/
445b6(rgyud 'grel): mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste// rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog/ zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso// nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso// bsgrub pa'i mchog ni gsang sngags te// las kyi mchog ni rnam bzhi'o// gnas
446a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni dkyil 'khor bzhi// steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang // 'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// bstan pa'i
446a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni rdzogs chen po// rdo rje rgyud du sngags pa yin// bzlas pa'i mdun drang bar skabs dang // de bzhin bzlas pa'i 'og tu yang // sngags pas sbyini sreg bya ba ni// thams cad du yang bsngags pa yin//
446a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg byas nas bzlas bya ba// dang por shin tu 'dod pa yon// bzlas dang sbyin sreg 'brel pA ni// de ni bar du 'dod pa yin// bzlas pa'i mjug gi sbyin sreg gang // de nus shin tu gtso bar bshAng // drang
446a4(rgyud 'grel): pos bu lon rtog pa gsal// bar du lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir// tha mas lhag tshad skongs pa'i don// bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang byams yid kyis
446a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin bya// las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni// gtum chen rngam po 'ang lhan nar 'gyur// lha rnams dkar po byams dang ldan// zlum pa dkyile 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas
446a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan por bzhugs// ho ma mchog zlum gdengs pa la// rdo rje pad+mas rab brgyan te// phur pa dkar po drug btab par// yid la shon gsal byas te// byin pa dge ba'i ram sngar bstan// yam shing dkar
446b1(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyi me// rab s+pha ra rdo rje khro bo yi// dang byam swa bzhag ste snyoms zhugs la// til bsregs bzhin du sdig bsregs shing // che ge sarba pA paM da ha na hUM phaT dz+wa la raM// shar lho kha khyer de nyid l+ya//
446b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyid kyi rlung spros te// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zla dkar bzhin// zhi ba'i lus dang lta bI'i thabs// sbyi ni chen dkar po'i gdun gzhugs bsnam// yAM shes e ga ne'i thugas+t+ra dmau bskul// oM na mo/
446b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra pA na yA// nu mo dz+nyA naM sa ag+na ye de bA dz+wa la raM// wan gsum brjod pas zhal phyogs shing // spyan gzigs thugs dgongs de nyid laM/ dam tshig pa yi lcags kyu bcas// gnyis ma ni depyongs las
446b4(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba yi// ye shas drang srod chen po nyid// sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje yis// byin gyis brlab phyir gshegasu gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHai h+yaM hi/ au badz+ra ha rI bi ga/ pa ta tsi ba l+lo ke ti/ ya shaM de hi de ba
446b5(rgyud 'grel): ba te ye swA hA// nu mo badz+ra prA NaM s+ye/ oM dz+nyA nA ag+na yai/ ki li ki li/ dan+te la po tra/ au ha i h+ya A gan+d+ho hUM ta sha nA ya swA hA/ yaM shes me l+yA byon+da nas ni// dam tshig bskyed dang gcig gyur nas// mdun du
446b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa de nyid la// gnyis med drang srong ig naM la// bdug spos chur byas bsang ba ni// stong gsum kun tu dri mchog 'byung 'gyur bal// spos lnga sman sbyar chu gtsang rgyal ba'i khrus// ye shes sgron
447a1(rgyud 'grel): phung mkha' las char 'bebs pas// mi gtsang dri ma'i tshogs kun dag gyur cig/ swa b+hA ba sarba d+ha ra ma shud+d+ho haM// ngag pa nyid du byas nas kyang // mchod pa lba yi mchod de bzhag/ gnyis
447a2(rgyud 'grel): min drang srong a ga ne la// bdug spos me tog me dri ba shos// yon byang gi dron du 'bul lags nA// thugs rje sa dgongs nas bzhis su gsol// oM na mo dz+nyA na satwaswa mA ya satwe ag+na ya d+hA pe/ pu sh+ma A
447a3(rgyud 'grel): lo ke/ gan+d+he/ a ha ra sarba d+har+m+ma pU dza pany+tsa swA hA// de nas mchod bstod shong rta la// bzhugs pa nyid du baM bya bya 'am/ kha khyer bzhag la las mchod bstod // de nas me yi dngos nyid pa'i// rang bzhin rnam
447a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal khro bo phyogs// de la sogs pa gong nyid du// spyan drangs mdun du gsol bsgoms la// ting 'dzin+da gsal bausra de nyid sbyang // rnam par rgyal ba bos nas ni// gzugs brnyan shur g.yas
447a5(rgyud 'grel): som du pral ba'i// rnam rgyal de yi lus gnyis gcig/ de nyid na ni bzhugs par bsamA// dad pa dang nri dam tshig gis// tshu ro gshegs khams gsum rnam rgyal ga tso// 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs
447a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// bsregs blugs zhal zas bzhes me sbyongs// dzaHhUM dza ho \u0f7fi h+yaM hi/ au trai lokya bi dza ya sa ma ti mu tra hUM phaT/ A gets+tsha/ de ltar spyan drangs de nyis kyis// gdan mchog dam pa bstab pa ni//
447b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog lag tu thogs nas ni// mya dran mri 'dra' thugs rje'i dang // nyon mongs mi spong gos pa med// mra chags rang bzhin dgA pA sa? na// pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugasu gsol// pad+ma sa ma ye s+t+waM/ de ltar gdan la bzhugs pa
447b2(rgyud 'grel): yang // yang dag nyid du drag mo kyi// dri ma'i mtshan ma med mod kyang // 'jig rten srid zhu'i tshul gyis su// phyag drang zhal ni bsil mdzod tsog/ a ha ra bo ri shud+d+he swa b+hA ba// de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni// khro bo khams
447b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnam rgyal gyis// che ge mo yi sdig bshags nas// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur te// yang dog nyid du sgrub pa la// bar chad byed pa'i log rtogs ni// gnod sbyin skar mnga' gdong la sogs// chang
447b4(rgyud 'grel): bras bcu dra cing bka' phab ste// bka' 'am sngags kyi tshig tsam kyis// zhi ba la sogs rnam bzhu ni// blan bzhin du ni byed par 'gyur// de phyir dang po khro bo mchod// de phyir rnam par rgyal sogs la// mar khu shag
447b5(rgyud 'grel): tri'u shu rtsi'u 'di// yon bdag don du 'bul legs na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// snying ga'i thad nas dbul bar bya// oM trai lokya bi dza ya kro d+ha yA di bya daM bya na pU dzA yai swA hA/ lag g.yas mtheb srin
447b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma oM// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// blangs te sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir// mchod pa'i gnas dang mchod rdzas dang // mchod mkhan nyid las byang chub sems// dkar po shel dge byung ba yis// gang la
448a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa dang bsgrim pas// lA smA dang nyon mong sna b+hag chags zhi// khyo rgyul khams gsum rnam rgyul la// mngar gsum 'o thug nas kyi thug/ 'bras bu lag pan 'bras yos dang // 'bru
448a2(rgyud 'grel): swA lA la so gras pa 'bul// bdug spos mr-i tog me dri ba shos// au tre lo kya bI dza ya kro d+hA ya d+hA pe puSh+pe A lo ke gaun+d+haM a ha ra swarba d+harma pu dza pany+dzA swA hA// a dI bya dI bya tr-i ye swA hA// de nas bstod pa'i mchis
448a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// rdo rje dril bu dbyangs ldan la// sku yi 'gying 'gyur dang bcas par// zhi rgyas gnyis la sa rdor rdol nang // dab di drag rdor dril phyi bskor bsil// ye shes bskal pa'i ma ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// ma rig
448a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cad srig/ sprin gnyis 'thabs bzhin khro gnyer brjod pa'i zhal// zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms// dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can//
448a5(rgyud 'grel): log 'dren srin po bgegs kyi mtha' gnon pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po dug gsum 'joms mdzad pa// khams gsum sems can ngan 'gro las sgrol ba// mdog sngo rdo rje pad+ma zhugs pa bsnams// khams gsuM
448a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal che la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal sogs// me nyid sbyang ba'i las mdzod bzhugs// tiSh+Tha badz+ra khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma'i
448b1(rgyud 'grel): ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gang ba// dum bur byas la tshogs la bstabs oM trai lokya bi dza ya ki li a mr-i ta pany+tsa pU dza swA hA// bde gshegs khro chen rnam par rgyal// thugs rje che dang pad ga
448b2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel byas// gzhul-i yas nyid du bzhugs nas kyang // ma nyid sbyang ba'i las bcol ba'o// de nas lag g.yas kha phararA bstan// g.yon pa tshur bstan mkhrig ma bsnol// mthe bo gnyis mthil gzhag sor brgyud
448b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod// oM kI lI kI la badz+ra bi ma la ro'u tra~M prI kr-i ti/ mya hA kro d+ha badz+ra yau na dza ha gr-i gr-ih+Na ta hUM phaT/ sbyang ba'i las ni lha tshogs kyi// mdun du bya bar yang dag bshad// de nas dkon mchog gsum po ste// sbyar dang spyan dra ba gdon//
448b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // mchod pa la sogs rnam rgyal bzhin// mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po// gsod nams rgya mtsho yon tan gzhi// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// dog pa 'dod chags
448b5(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i rgyu// dge bas ngan 'gro las sgrol zhing // gcig tu don dam mchog gyur pa// zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal bstod// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// bslab pa dgo la rab tu gus// zhing gi dam pa yon tan
448b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi// dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal bstod// bla med dkon mchog gsum po yis// zhi ba la sogs grub par gsol// bde bar gshegs so dkon mchog gsum// khyod kyis byams pa'i las kun mdzad// dang ba'i
449a1(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis bskyed pa yi// gzhal lus nyid du gshegasu gsol// oM badz+ra be ga a kra ma ya hi ga dz+ya/ me lha gnyis min spyan drang ba'i// mdun du kI lIs me nyid sbyang // de nas g.yas pa'i mthe bo yi/
449a2(rgyud 'grel): mtheb chung mdung tshug g.yabs nas ni// ngang pa drang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs zhes nI bos nas nI// dzaHhUM bAM hoHe h+yaM hi/ ma hA bud+d+ha daM ba ra ri Shi// tA te dz+wa lI ni hi tA u ti ma hA raM/ a mr-i sa na hri do b+ha ba/
449a3(rgyud 'grel): ag+ne yai A gats+tsha/ hA bya ka byA ba ha nA ya swAh+ma/ dai nAsa? bzhugs par bya ba ni// lha yi drang srong kun dang ni// sreg smyon btab par kham+ba 'chus pA// thugs rje dam tshig brtan pa ni// pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugasu gsol/
449a4(rgyud 'grel): Ag+ni ye sa ma yau s+t+r-i tauSh+TA/ sr-i b+hA pra bi ga ta bi dza lo hi ta A ka sha dI pau ya shud+d+he swA hA// / phyag zhalpa bsil ba byas nas ni// gnyis min drang skyong me lha la// shag ti'u laM sogs bdun gsum dbul//
449a5(rgyud 'grel): oM r-i r+ya ag+na ye hAb+h+yAM k+ShA byAM daM pyA d+hip+tA nA ya pU dza swA hA// d+hU bAM puSh+paM a lo ke bin+d+hi bruM dza~M pany+tsa swA hA// de nas rdo rje dril byung bca so// 'byung 'gyur bcas la bskyod pa ni// tshangs pa 'jig rtenA mgon gyi sras// mau l+ya
449a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po drang srong mchog/ 'byung po yongs la bskyab pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i dbang gis sku sprul la// rig par grub pa'i drang srong mchog/ nyon mongs sreg pa'i shes rab 'od// bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjod 'bar//
449b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan// thabs kyis sprul po'i theg pa bcibs// bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags gsung // bdud rtsi bcud ldan g+hun d+he bsnams// chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la gsol// nyes pa'i skyon bral
449b2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par spyod// 'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das// zhi ba brnyes byar thugs rta che// de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// A ga na chen po'i thigs dam bzhin// mi gnyis ye shes mar byin rlobs// las kyi lha rnams mchod
449b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// sreg rdzas stobs pa'i las mdzod bzhugs// shing rta gcig la gzhug gsol la// phyogs mtshams lha la bskor zhing mchod// ag+na ya kiM ka r+ya pu dzA tiSh+Tha/ las kyi lha rnams ma ched pa yi// me sbyang spyan drang gdan
449b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul gsil// las brtan phyug mchod bstod dang dgu/ snang ston mchod rten chos nyid mkha'// chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal rnam par snang mdzad la'o// sku
449b5(rgyud 'grel): brten rdo rje gzugs brnyan sau// me long ye shes thugs kyi sku// sa gnon chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal sems dpa' mi bskyod le'o// sreg byed rin chen yig 'bru ma// mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan sku// mchod
449b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal 'byung gnas dpal khyod la'o// dgyes 'dzin pad+ma phyag 'tshal chu// kun rtog ye shes gsung gi sku// chos sgrogs chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal snang ba mtha' yas la'o//
450a1(rgyud 'grel): shugs bskyod rgya gram sku ste rlung // nan tan ye shes 'phrin las sku// skyabs mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal don yod grub pa la'o// baM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du
450a2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel bsdams bskyod// bcings 'gyur bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// thams cad g.yo bo med par 'gyur// shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo brgya mdung rtsi zlum po// ngos su lha rnams/
450a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas bsgom// btab na gdug rtsu bzhi bar 'gyur// kI l-i kI li shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi grub pa bsgom bya ste// byams bcas zhi ba'i tho ba yisi// brdungs pas gdug rtsub zhi bar
450a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// shAm pa ta shAn+tiM ku ru swA hUM/ dngul phye 'bras can dkar po la// 'o mes sbyar ba'i gtor ma yis// thams cad ma lus zhi bsgoms naso// gtor mas gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur// s+pho ra Na shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ las
450a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bya ba'i don bstan pa'o// bdag nyid byams pa chen po can// dkyil 'khor ha~M khro mchod rdzas tshogs/ dkar po nyid du bsgom par bya// lha rnams thams cad dkare po ste// sku yi gzi 'bar yon tan brjod// thams cad
450a6(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang 'tsher zhing zho// byams par bcas pa'i lag pa nas// gtong ba thams cad byang chub sems// rgyun mi chad par kuni khyab bsgomo// drang ba zhi 'gyur phur bu rgyas/ brdungs pas dbang mdzad gtor ma drag/ de ni spyi
450b1(rgyud 'grel): yi lasu gsungs// phyogs bcu gdug pa ma lus kun// gdug pa'i sems ni rab bor te// wAn ne dkar ba'i 'og tu 'gyur// bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'byur// 'jug rten gsum dang 'das gtum la// 'byuSh+Ta
450b2(rgyud 'grel): byams ldan byas nas ni// gal ba gdab par bya baM ni// lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dri za grul// lto 'phye dang ni na mkha'i lding 'dra ba// lus srul srin po gdon gyi rig rnams dang // se 'am mkha' la gnas pa'i
450b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul ce no// bud med g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas pa rnams// de rnams sdug bsngal zhi bar bya bo'i phyir// dang byams yid kyis lha rnams mchod byas te// lha yis byin brlabs sprul pa'i 'phro 'dra yis//
450b4(rgyud 'grel): las dang nyon myongs sdug bsngal wI gyur cig/ na maHsa mAn+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM A ma hU shAn+tiM ku ru shAn+tiM ku ru pra sh+yA ma d+har+m+ma nirdza tA/ A b+hU bA sAM b+hA ba d+har+m+ma satwAM/ pra ba ta shan+tiM ku ruM/ shi baM ku ru swA hA/ de ba shin+tiM ku ru
450b5(rgyud 'grel): sAh+mA/ nA pAshAku ru sI hA/ rek+tA shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// yak+Sha shAn+tiku ru sI hA/ kri h+yA shUn+tiM ku ru swA hA// myA tsi tse shAn+tiM ku r-I smaih+na// guM i gr-i i b+h+r-i ku ru swA hI// rai tsa ra tAM/ pra d+h+waM pr-i t+yai ts+tshin+ti ku ru smr-ih+ma/ kr-I R+Sha wAn+na bi rA lain+da
450b6(rgyud 'grel): shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ biM ha sa nan shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// oM ba ra ni shAn+tiM ku ru swA hUM// na mo bi shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ a nri su du pr-i Sh+yo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ko ka ri ki ka re shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mr-i tsi myi tsau re ro sr-i sr-i/ gaM gaM guM guM/ aM aM a~M/
451a1(rgyud 'grel): oM a ra lan shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// sho dur na mye tre shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// de nas las spyad rnam rgyal thabs// phyag mtshan na mkhar phyararA nas kyang // gaN+DI mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams
451a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rab 'byam kun// skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de// zhi bar gyur pas dbyingaswa su rol// byed par gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// dang ba'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi// gzhal yas nyid du re zhig gshegs// slar yang
451a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// de bzhin lha tshogs mang po kun// go rim de bzhin las bya'o// myo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brti do 'tsher ba la// snying rje dgra' bris mchod byas na// las rnams
451a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsam pa byas nas nI// tshe dang longs spyod dpal 'phel 'gyur// puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA// yoM yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'chang ba la// dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyini bya// las rnam
451a5(rgyud 'grel): brtsam pa byis nas ni// thams cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur e yi tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsol ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// btang snyoms khros pas mchod sbyin bya// lus rnams brtsam pa byas nas ni//
451a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus brlag par 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyud las 'byung ba'i las// sdig pa sreg dang tshe 'phel hom// srung dang ro sreg sgrub pa kun// cha shas tsam du bstan pa ni// hU~M gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/
451b1(rgyud 'grel): yeye shes tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ haM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ raM gyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor ho ma tshad bstan pa// gsang gsum dkyil 'khor tha ma 'bring //
451b2(rgyud 'grel): rab ni bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun// khru gang thams cad sgo gang bya// yan lag thams cad tshad bstan pa// de khru gang nas brtsams nas ni// ji srid dpag chad thug gi bar// 'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis// yang
451b3(rgyud 'grel): na tshad lce nges pa med// ho ma khung thu ma 'bring dang rab// khru gong khru dro khru gsum ni// 'byor pa'i dbang bya pad zla kham// gru gsum dang ni 'khor lo brtsabs// brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i 'od // dkar po dgod de/
451b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus rdo rje// rtse lnga shar ro rin chen lho// nub tu pad+ma byang rgya gram// de steng kha 'khor sor bzhi rdo rje re// sems dpa' sems dpa' pad+ma dang khong yon// 'jig rten pa ni tsA rigs mdzes par bya// nub phyogs 'dug
451b5(rgyud 'grel): ste zhi bya las// bram ze'i khyim+b+ha du yang dge bshad// lho phyogs rgyus pa nub tu dbang // byung du drag po hom du bshad// dkyil 'khor drug gam yang na ni// grong khyer phyir rol rje'u rigs dang // rgyal rigs
451b6(rgyud 'grel): smad 'tshong dmongs ma'i khyim// sngags pa nub dang lho shar byang // 'dug la mchod pa'i don dag ni// gang gi gtso dang thabs dang ni// shes rab tshul du ldan pa'i don// hom khung dag gi bye brag kyang // de ci
452a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs par bya bar bshad // de la sogs pa'i gtso yum ni// khung gi mthil du lhag par dgong // me 'od ngos la rdo rje khA// 'khor rnams phyi rol yang dag dgong ro sreg ma N+Da shu bru bcu gnyis// /
452a2(rgyud 'grel): khru bzhi pa na khru do zabs// brkos pa'i dbus su 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad pa la'ang byang chub kyi// mchod rten kun rig phyag rgya srogs// rigs bzhi dang ni yum bzhi'o// de mtha' rdo rje rtse lngas bskor// khA la mo 'od bri bar bya//
452a3(rgyud 'grel): de mtha' pad+ma pad+ma la// sems dpa' bskal bzang la sogs rnams// bri byaM grA la lha mo bri// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams kyang // phyi rim phyogs phyogs dag du bri// gzhung dang 'gal byas nyes sdig bshad// sdig pa chen po skur btab
452a4(rgyud 'grel): yin// ston pa'i bstan dang dge ba'i las// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // mched dang lham dral rnam ldan yin// dge ba mi dge mau dge dog/ rgyal ba'i chos lo skur btab yin// sdig can de ni mi thar zhes// rnam par 'byed pa'i thub pa
452a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung // dkyil 'khor 'jug 'byung byed pa'i phyir// ri mo 'am yang ni de bzhin gzhan ci bgyi tshad med bzhi bsgoms te// sha dang chang dang sgog btsong dang // rku dpe bud med spyang byas na// de ni yan lag skur btab yin// de las bshags
452a6(rgyud 'grel): pa byar yod thabs// ji bzhin dam l-i gnas byas sam// theg chen sde la mchod byed na// sdig can de ni myur du sgrol// pha ma bsad dang phrogs bcom dang // chos kyi mkhan po bsad pa dang // dam tshi ge lung dang shes rab rgyud//
452b1(rgyud 'grel): man ngag dbang gi slob dpon gsum// snying nas smad cing bsad pa dang // theg chen sde la gnas pa yi// mched dang lcam dral dbyen byas shing // dam las log cing mkhas pa ni// de ni mtshams med lnga zhes bya// de kun dkyil 'khor 'di
452b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar// las bzhi sdig sreg byas bcug na// sdig can de yang myur du sgrol// sngags dang phyag rgya yig 'bru rnams// lhag dang chad par byas pa ni// de dang nye ba'i sdig pa yin// ci phyir dbyings dang rnam par gyis// sgo rnams gzhan du
452b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas na// bskal par brjod kyang dngos grub ni// thob par mi 'gyur dpa' bos gsungs// shes bya'i sdig pa thams cad ni// mi shes sdig las bcur 'gyur cha// shes bya'i sdig bshegs thams cad la// 'bum lnga
452b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gis 'byung ngo zhes// tsham skor ba phyag dang ni// srog 'don mdo sde lnga drag las// 'bum 'bu moM dag du gsungs pa yin// nga nas sdom pa gnas pa yi// mtshams med lnga la sogs pa yi// sdig can da dag rnams
452b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// skad cig yud tsam smra mi bya// shr-is nas dam tshig gang nyams pa'i// de yi sdig pa brjod mi la // gso la nye bar mi brtson ni// de dag dang yang smra mi bya// skad cig yud tsam smras pas kyang // don gyi dngos po gang
452b6(rgyud 'grel): yin spangs// dmags la sogs don gcig pa bzhin// de yi gshags pa rgyud lngas so// pus 'gros thal 'bud tsher lcag dang // 'grang phyag srog sdom ngag giso// lkog dang chad pa'i kha skong ni// dkyil 'khor bdag po mnyes pa
453a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshe rab slob dpon pha ma dang // slob ma'i sdig zhi dbang bskur dang // mtha' mas sems can don byas pas// de yi sdig pa de yi 'byung ngo // ho ma bzhi yi gtso bo gang // bsreg rdzas bdun
453a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum nyi shu gcig/ mnyes pas bya phyir dbul bar bya// de nas tshe rabyas slob dpon dron/ dkon mchog gsum la bdun gsum gsum// dbul ba nyid du bya bar bshad// tshe rabs pha ma'i don gyi phyir// rigs kyi gtso bo
453a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la'o// de nas slob ma rim gyis ni// bgegs bsngal phyir ni spos chus bkru// de nasna g.yon phyogs tsog pur bzhag/ lag g.yas slob dponi lcag g.yon gyi// byams par bcas pas bzung nas ni// gtsa
453a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi sngags bdun bzlas// de nas sdigs pa zad bya'i phyir// rigs yum lnga la bdun bduno// de yi dbang bskor bsrung bar 'gyur// mtha' yas sems can kun don du// lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya// de dag bkra shes bya ba
453a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ yum bzhi gzungs kyi bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan ni tshim byed ma// dbang po zhi ba zla ba 'dra// bstod tshig gos bskul bsngags brjod bya// dri nus bshags pa gus par bya// de nAs sngags pas phyogs phyogs nas//
453a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ri satwa sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya badz+ra satwo ti no pau tiSh+Tha dr-i d+hi ma b+ha ba// su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ga/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sar sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha sarba karme su tsa mo tsit+to shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha haM hoHb+hU ba

453b2(rgyud 'grel): byas chos kyang de ltar lha// de ltar bsdu ba byas nas bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po la// bltas te lhag pa'i mchod pa dbul/ e ma bdag nyid spobs bcas pa'o// dri zhim ngo bo thams cad
453b3(rgyud 'grel): klon// sngon 'das dpyid kyi d+hA par ni// b+h+yonra rlobs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol// dI bi puSh+pe pu dz+r-i ho// oM ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i// gsal dro ngo bo thams cad kun// byon ma rag snron A lo kar
453b4(rgyud 'grel): byin rUbs mchod 'brel banas su gsol// daM bi A lo kaM prA dz+ye hoH/ a m+b+ha bdag nyid slob bcas po la/ brnyan bcas dri zhim thams cad kun// ma b+h+yon kun gyi gnas derar+ya nI// b+h+yon+ti rlobs mchod 'bul ba
453b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol// de be gan+d+he b+hu dza// de sbyar mA ng+ka nas skye bas gsol pa// dkyil 'khod sangs rgyas rten nyid de// rnam dag sgra las ting 'dzin dge ba'i sgo// skyil sku phyag rgya mtshan po'i lce tshogs kyi// glags pas

454a2(rgyud 'grel): nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// gus dang bcas pas phyag byas mchod // gtsang zhingang+ge gtsang mar bshams pa'i rdzas// khrus byas gdugs tog ma dri bshos// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la 'bul// thugs
454a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nI/ ga go na sa ma ye swA hA/ oM bi shwa bi shud+d+he swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he nAM/ d+hirma ta ta twe nu ga te swA hA// nA maHsa man+ta bud+ha nAM/ ma hA me trai byung ka Te swA hA/ na maH
454a4(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ da rtse s+pha ra Na a ga sa ga ne'u d+ha rA ya swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ bi shud+d+he gan+d+hota b+ha pi ya swA hA/ na maHswa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a re ra swa ra ra ka ra ra ba l-i te ma ni swA hI/ snang sngon mchod rten chos nyid mkha'/

454a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor rgyal ba gdugs kyi kha bos// byams pa'i tha bos dang shes rab kyis// badz+ra d+hU pe mchod par rol// rin chen 'byung ldan snying rje'i mchod// ut+pal mthing ka me tog 'thor// rin chen zla gem 'od du sbyor
454b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje thabs dang shes rab kyis// rat+na puSh+pe mchod par rol// smyung ba mtha' yas dag pa'i mchod// dpal gyi sgrol ma phyug na bsnams// chos kyi rgyu la mtshan rab 'bar 'dzugs// dga' ba thubs
454b2(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab kyis// pad+ma a lo mchod par rol// don yod grub pas btang snyoms mchod// tsan dan bdud rtsi char 'bebs ma// dkyil 'khor gtsang mo'i thog ler 'bebs// spros spar thabs dang shes
454b3(rgyud 'grel): rab kyis// rgarma gan+d+he mchod par rol// da ltar rigs la nyes pa'i gzungs// mchod pa phul ba'i lan dag du// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis// rdo rjes sems dpa' rtogs pa'i yul// dung mdog sgeg

454b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal rnon po'i dngos grub 'dzin// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes lA// rat+na ma le mchod pasau rol// snang ba mtha' yas mkhyen po'i yul// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan rma bya'i 'grin// spyan ras
454b6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kyi shes rab bskyed// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la// pad+ma gI ti mchod pas rol// don yod grub pa las kyi yul// gaur mkhan 'gyong ma gzi dang ldan// los kyi 'khor lo rnam par

455a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya shes pa la// rat+na pA sha'i mchod pas rol// don spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags// dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid// shes rab sgron ma mdzad pa la// pad+ma s+pho Ta'i mchod pas rol// snyan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtag/

457b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ljags su bsgoms nas ni// chos kyi phyag rgya can gyis ni// slob ma de la bshud par bya// oM d+har+m+ma hUM d+har+m+ma tA d+har+m+ma hi d+harma a d+har+m+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ d+harmA a na yas d+har+m+ma a ho su khaM d+har+m+ma/ s+yA d+hu sa d+hu d+harmA/ su pa ha sa
457b2(rgyud 'grel): d+harma/ r+yaM pu ho ta d+har+m+ma/ a thaM pra ba ti d+har+m+ma/ ha hA hU~M ha d+har+m+ma/ sarba ka ri d+har+m+ma/ duHkha ts+tshe de d+har+m+maHbud+d+ha bo d+h+r-i d+har+m+ma/ pr-i ti shaMdz+r-i d+har+m+masu ba ni staM d+har+m+ma/ nau bau ya d+har+m+ma/ shA b+hak+Sha d+harmA/ sarba sod+d+hi d+har+m+ma/ ma hA ra ti d+hAr+m+ma/
457b3(rgyud 'grel): paM sho be d+har+m+ma/ shu rod tra pe'u d+har+m+ma/ sarbe pu dze d+har+m+ma/ prI ha da nI d+hAr+m+ma/ pu taM d+harmA/ tsi kr-i d+hirmA/ su gan+d+ha ni d+hAr+m+ma/ A ya hi dza dza d+har+m+ma/ a yai hi hUM hUM d+har+m+ma/ twe s+pho Da bo bo d+hAr+m+ma/ g+han+tha a ai d+har+m+ma/ de ltar lha tshogs
457b4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor gang yin thams cad kyi// so so'i snying po tha mar ni// d+harmas btags l-i brjod pas ni// lha rnams thugs dgongs dngos grub stsol// kun rdzobs dang ni don dam gyi// byang chub sems ni

457b6(rgyud 'grel): oM d+ho tiSh+Tha hau/ de nas sku gsung thugs byin brlab// kA ya oM ba ka AHtsit+ta hUM// 'khor lo phyag rgya ting 'dzin sngags// bar du bcod pa gsal bar bya// oM dz+nyA na tsakra phaT// ngo yis bshad phog thams cad ni//
458a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pas gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas// khyod kyang de las ma 'da' zhig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ha tha/ byang chub rigs can nyid du ni// sngags 'di brjod pas gyur pa'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta a sa ma
458a2(rgyud 'grel): tri swa me ma hA sa ma ya swA hA// hUM hUM hU~M// gsum pa dkyil 'khor 'jug gzhug pa// slob dpon zhugs dang slob ma 'jug/ bshegs pa lhag chad kha bkang ba// mthun par slar gshegs gsol dang lnga// las
458a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mchod nas bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor sems kyis na mkha' la// btag nas byang chub sems kyis ni// zhugs pa nyid du thub pas gsungs// bdug spos lag tu thogs nas su// blo gros ldan pas lha
458a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// gus pas gsol ba legs par gadra ba// de 'og sgo bzhi dbye bar bshad// zhugs la gnyis su mang bsgoms la// 'gro ba dran pa'i las bya'o// bcom ldan na mkha'i sangs rgyas kun// thugs rje chen
458a5(rgyud 'grel): po mthur ldan lags// bdag nyid rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan lhas// bdag la dbang mchog dang stsol cig/ dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lo bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par
458a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ sangs rgyas bka' yi dkyil 'khor du// bdag nyid dad pas 'jug lags na// dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bsod
458b1(rgyud 'grel): nams can du bdag nyid gyur// sngon gyi las kyi 'brel pa lags// thugs rjes sras su dgongs par mdzod// At+ma ko haM maN+Da la sarba A be sha ya swa b+ha ba/ rdo rje mdzub sogs legs par ni// sbyar la bkan te/
458b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdams nas su// khros nas rab tu dbye ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi mtshan nyid do// gnas rab sgo bzhi zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal 'dod tshugs phrag dog bzhis// sngon mdu dus nas bcad lags na/ tshad med
458b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu brgyad rigs bzhi yi// thugs rje thobs las sgrol pa yi// lcags kyi zhags pa lcags sgrog deng // dril bu phyag rgya mchog nyid kyis// ding nyid thar sgo dbye ru gsol// oM badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma
458b4(rgyud 'grel): kro d+haM ga dau sa ma yA tsa tu ra// pra baM sha shi kran sma r+ya Ne sa ma ya hUM paT// de nas bdag nyid rdo rje rin chenA dang // pad+ma N+yo gra mau shugs kyis ni// rab tu brgal te zhugs nas ni// gnyis su med par smang
458b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'gyur// sI rje slo ba mA la sogs la// lha mo sbrul sras sgoms byas drang // de nas sngags g.yog dag gis ni// slob ma'i las rnams brtson bya ba// phyag 'tshal gsol 'jug khrus bkra shis//
458b6(rgyud 'grel): ngom bca' ma tog dor mig dbye// slob dpon lan skyal lhas dbang bskur// dam tshig de bog dang dbang bskur dang // smon lam lha ngo bstan yul dbul// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o// de nas shar sgo
459a1(rgyud 'grel): dag tu ni// bdug spos lag tu thogs nAs ni// shar phyogs mngon dga'i pho brang 'ding // bcom ldan rdo rje sems sogs lnga// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ ngag yid dang
459a2(rgyud 'grel): bas gus phyag 'tshul// lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan sogs// nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas sogs// byang phyogs
459a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pho brang 'di'i/ bcom ldan ngon yod grub pa sogs// bcom lden+da snying po'i phi brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// skal ldan rgyal skyes drag pa zhig/ ngag yid dong bros gus/
459a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal// bdag ni dam tshig rdo rje ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa'i 'di// de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol// bdag ni ngam tshig rin chen te/ bdag ni dam tshig pad+ma
459a5(rgyud 'grel): s+t+waM/ bAdag ni dam+ba tshig rgyu gram ste// bdag ni dam tshog 'khor lo ste// rnam par snang mdzad yin par grags// 'khor lo bla na med pa 'di// de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol// shAr phyogs mngon
459a6(rgyud 'grel): dga'i pheM brang 'dir// bla mod byang chub sems bskyed de// dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bdag gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi// lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'dir// nub phyogs bde ldan
459b1(rgyud 'grel): pho brang 'dirar// byang phyogs rnam dag pho brang 'dir// bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// phyogs su blta ba dgrol ba'i phyir// mtha' las 'das pa gun
459b2(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi// rdo rje soms dpa' me long yul// kun bzang phyag rgya'i bum pa ste// gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus// zhe sdang rnam smin dag gyur cig/ rin chen 'byung ldan mAnyam shes yum// na bza'i
459b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i bum pa ste// gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus// nga rgyal rnam smin dag gyur tsog/ snang ba mtha' yas kun rtog yul// ma ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste// gnyis man byang chub sems rtags
459b4(rgyud 'grel): chus// 'dod chags rnam smin dag gyur cig/ don grub nan tAn ye shos yul// sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste// gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chu sa// phrag dog rnam smin dag gyu cig/ rnam snang chos
459b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ya shes yul// spyan gyi phyag rgya bum pa ste// gnyis man byang chub sems rtags chus// gti mug rnam snang dag gyur tsog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan
459b6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang // dge mnyam bsam sems ldan po'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rgyan gyis brgyan byas shing
460a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag 'byor pa'i sbyin pas sbyin mdzad mi bslu ba// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis bang yin pa// bkra shris des kyang dang 'dir zhi byed lags gyur cig/ bsam gtan dam pa
460a2(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'o steng bzhugs dpyag med tshe ldan zhing // tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shrIs nges kyang dang 'dir zhi byed lags
460a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ sems can don phyir las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad tse // 'gro ba thams cad bcings pa bcings laso grol gyur pa// thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkre shis gang yin pa// bkra shrisau des
460a4(rgyud 'grel): kyong dang 'dir zhi byed lags gyur cig/ rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla bu nya 'dra sU mnga' srid pa'i mthar 'byin pA// dra gongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkr-i shis gang
460a5(rgyud 'grel): yin pa// bkra shaus des ni dang 'dir na byed legs gyur sho/ yan mai ga lan// su b+ha sha ma ne to// sa yA dz+nyo naM ta ka sha s+ya u k+Sho b+hU rU dzau/ gI shiM na t+ta s+ya/ sarbA ku ne/ mau ka la s+ya/ naM mau ga la da/ b+hU
460a6(rgyud 'grel): b+hA tu shAn+taM/ ka sa pra dz+nyA sta ban tu t+ye/ ya maM ga lan/ ma ni ku lan hi na pu ha ra/ pa pa shu sha sha tsi na sa ta/ no to ne/ kha la na pi pi pu ti ne/ taM maM ga lonau/ ta na maM gA lan/ b+ha b+ha du shAn+te/ ka ra na bad
460b1(rgyud 'grel): h+yayan maM ga lan/ a ga nI/ a yur byid te sa s+ye/ ma ne bu ra ta la yas s+ye/ g+ha rna badz+ra/ pa ri ga te s+ye/ ta thA ga te sbyi/ taM maM gU lan/ b+ha b+h+yA du shan+ta/ ka ra na r+ya phaT traM/ yan maM ga lan/ ma ma
460b2(rgyud 'grel): mu ne pa ra shA s+yai/ a mo g+ha sI d+hi swatwA tA rau gar mA na naM/ b+hu na sha ba na/ sha ta le s+yai yo tsi ta man sa sa s+yo/ mu na sa s+yai/ b+hon+na b+hA b+ha myaM bya/ tan mau gaM lAnaM/ b+ha b+ha du shan+te/ rna twe t+yaM/ ya na maM ga laM/ sa
460b3(rgyud 'grel): go laM/ ma to ro ta sa s+ye/ bau ro tsi na s+yai bai ra tA nyan+thi/ maM hU r+ya rna ba s+ye/ ma hA ra d+hA ra b+hu ra ra nA/ tsa tra b+hU she hau pan ta kA s+yai mi gA l-i nau/ b+hU b+hU du tsan+da te kar taM tAM nats+ya/ de la de gzhin gshegs dar+dz+dza

460b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs gtso chen po dang // chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro// las kyi rigs gtso chen po dang // las bzhi gzhon don spyod dbang bskur// bkra shis brjod pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jog rten drag tu
460b6(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams kun// grags pa rnams spel bgegs kyang med// sems nyid bde 'gro nges byed la// mthar yang nges pa kho nar ni// zhi ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// de nas dam bca' bya ba ni//
461a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo chen po rgyud dag pa'i// sdom pa legs par blang bar bya// de la sdom pa'i yon tan ni// dang po sdom las rgyud gnyis stong // tha ma'i sdom pas lha min spyong // rdo rje rIn tshun paH/
461a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ sdom pa yis ni ngan 'gro sbyong // de bas sdom pa gnos pa mchog/ de 'ogau dam bca' yang dag bya// sangs rgyas rnal 'a byor sdom po la// tshul khrims kyi ni bslabapa dang // dge ba'i chos
461a3(rgyud 'grel): ni sdud pa dang // sems can dron byed brtan pAr+ra bzung // de ni s+thi yi tshul khrims so// rdo d+hA rigs mchog chen po yau// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yAng // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob
461a4(rgyud 'grel): dben dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin ni ldan drug tu// sgron po rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang tshub chen po lngas byung ba//
461a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rigs mchig dag pA la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen+da po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang
461a6(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams te gzung
461b1(rgyud 'grel): bAr bgyi// nam du yang ni mi stong ngo // sems can kun+da gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung // de nus shar sgor gnas pa de// na bza' stong smad dar dmyur
461b2(rgyud 'grel): dkri/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyur 'char// bcug lA lag tu rin chen dang // ma tog phreng ba la sogs thogs// gdong g.yogs dar dkar gyis gra yo gasra nas// a sa me tri
461b3(rgyud 'grel): sa me ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra A ba tiSh+Ta hrI/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med nas// dge ba'i lus kyis bsnyen pa'i lha// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin+na pa// dA lnga nyid
461b4(rgyud 'grel): du 'bab par shog/ stangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// bdag lo thugs rtse dgongs nas kyang // 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hUM/
461b5(rgyud 'grel): AM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya stAM/ bo d+hi tsit+ta pu dza hor+N+Na me tog+na rin n+ma la sogs pra// gang la ba ba pA rigAs kyi lha// glatso bo rigs te sgrubs na nau// dngos grub myuR+Ya ster the tshom myed// de nAs lcags kyu'i phyag rgya
461b6(rgyud 'grel): yis// rin chen lhur bcas blangs nas ni// slob ma'i spyir bzhag thim gyur nas// mi gnyis gcig pa'i lhar bsams nas// oM sa ma ya hr-i da ya me// oM AHhUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa I/ daM ni
462a1(rgyud 'grel): dad pa rab tu bskyod// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di lta ltos// khyod ni theg chen 'di nyid la// gas ba chen po'i snod du gyur// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// thob pa mnyam
462a2(rgyud 'grel): med de ring thob// dam tshig gong+ga 'og me 'da' zhig/ bla med byang chub chen po 'thob// oM badz+ra ha s+yo g+ha DA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra pe sha hU~M pheT// slob dpon lan gnyis dbyangs sbyar te/ rdo rje'i phyag
462a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu legs bcas la// nga ni dam tshig rdo rje ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di// ngi ring khyod la sbyin par bya// oM badz+re sa ma yA a b+hi ShIny+tsa au/ nga ni dam tshig rin rgyun
462a4(rgyud 'grel): ti/ nga ni dam tshig pad+ma ste// da nI dam tshig rgyu zlum ste// d+ha ni dam tshog 'khor lho ste// snying po 'khor lo yin par grags// 'khor lo ye shes bla myed 'di// daM ri ng+ge khyud lA s+thAn+ti par bya// oM raH/
462a5(rgyud 'grel): pUng+ga karma tsAk+Sha/ a T+TAhUM aM aM sa ma rmar+dz+dza thA/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyalta ba'i rgyu// dAm+ba las 'das nA sgeg par byed// dam tshig bskyud nA dngos grub ni// rdo rje byidud chu 'dis 'grub/
462a6(rgyud 'grel): ciste dam tshig 'das na ni// de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal ba mi
462b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya// khyod kyis srog chags pasade mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// rdzun dang 'dod la spyod
462b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba min// chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing // she la sogs pa bza' mi bya// sems can+da gnod par sbyor pa ni// nam yang byi ba ma yin te// dkon
462b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum+ba ni yong mi spang // dusmr-i kun+na tu ni byang chub sem+b+has+yA// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dwang // wA dang b+h+ra ma de bzhin no// sdigo la sogs pa gang+gA yaun dang // bla mra'i bkra'
462b4(rgyud 'grel): las 'da' mi bya// lha la phul ba'i snye pa dong // de yi dI ma 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang dwa bzhin no// sngags dang lha la smad myi bya// gdon gyi la sogs
462b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba min// mr-i stegs can+da la'ang smad mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis dog mi skye// bidag gi de nyid sngags dang ni// thams cad 'dra bas de bzhin no// de nas da nga mchog
462b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba na// pi sh+tsi ma yi phyogs dge tu// khru gang ba yi dkyil 'khor lo// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa hU~M// tshen ni dmar pos legs par blo/ thikra shis brgyad kyi phyag rgya na
463a1(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan cod pan me tog phyung // phyag rgya bzhi dang rin chen bdun// gser byas thur ma 'khor me long // dung dang bkra shiswA ras thogs bzhag/ bdug spros ras
463a2(rgyud 'grel): snar gdugs sham can// rnga yub bsil ya ba zho phor gang // bum pa bzhi sogs mi r-is gzung // mchod pa lA sogs bkra shis brjod// oM pr-i ta pyA ta sarba a pA ra Ne ni hU~M phaT//

464a1(rgyud 'grel): srong a ga tis// byin gyis pUrlabs pa'i phyugs kyi dngos grub 'di// khyima? bdagra dbang phyug che la byin pa yis// skye dgu'i bsos gyur bcud ldan bkra shis shog/

464b1(rgyud 'grel): lags gnyis bcings te gung gzhi bas bsgrung // mdzub gnyis bkug sbyar gtsug tor ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM hUM hU~M hU~M/ lcag gnyis bcings to gung srin lag/ brgya ng+ga to mthe bo nang
464b2(rgyud 'grel): bcug mig/ na mUHsa man+te bud+d+hA nAM// gi ga ne ba ra la k+Sha Na/ ge ru no ma yaM/ t+ya thA ga ta tsak+Shu swA hA/ lag gnyis li m+bo khyod stong sbyar// mdzub granyis bkris lA srin lAg gad+hAg/
464b3(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo gnyis gzhibs ljags su bshad// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tA thA ga tA dzi tra sarba d+har+m+maHpr-i tI tISh+ThA/ lag pa gnyis ni khong stod sbyar+ya// mdzub gnyis ngos nas dkris pa ni// gr-I rgya
464b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya zhes su bshada?// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM// prA tsan+da bar+Ne l-i ya bi yu ra hUM/ dwe nas slob ma'i thog dag tu// gdugs mdzus gra ser gyi yu pa tsana?// thig chen chos kyi ngo bo ste// nyon

464b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas smon lam gong ba// shar phyogs sgo la pUrbas bsdu// sngon dang thog ma phur pas bsdu// de mthun rdo rje sems la sogs// sgrib gnyis byang bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// de bzhin
465a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma tshogs rdzogs nas// me long ye shesa? thob par shog/ lho sgo dA kI nA bsdu'o// sbyin gnas la yang da k+Shi Na brasdu'o// nub sgo pa sh+tsi ma bsdu'o// phyi mA ma 'ongs pash+tsi bsdu/
465a2(rgyud 'grel): byubyang sgo ut+ta ra yi bsdu// thugs rje gzung la ut+ta ra bsdu// gong gi rig dang ye shes dring // sngon gyi smon lam ston bstan pa// dr-i ma med pa'i dpe bzhin ni// dkyil 'khor rang bzhinA lha dag kyang //
465a3(rgyud 'grel): tsi rigs par ni bstan par bya// tan t+yA rgya mtsho dbyings kyi gting ru ma nas// don mchog che shas btus pa'i nying khu ste// sbyor ba'i lam rgyud phyogs 'ga' 'grel ba yi// mchog
465a4(rgyud 'grel): thob rnam snang mdzad kyi zhal mthong shig/ rgya gor gyi mkhan po s+thi ra ma tis yo ga'i gzhung rgyud phyi nang lhas nges don mdor bsdus te mdzad pa// rgyun dam pri'i le'u bam po gcig
465a5(rgyud 'grel): tu byas pa rdzogs so// / cog gru klu'i rgyal mtshanagyis skad phyi mo dang thug pa'o// @#bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis mtshan mar gyur 'gro ba yis/
465a6(rgyud 'grel): tshecher bos du mar bgags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun// dge 'dis dug lnga'i me lha chu yis bcil ba bzhin// rang min byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob shog/ ces mi dbang po lha bas sgo gsum tshag dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o//
